snod du byed pa'i cho ga dang gzhung dang / lam gyi khyad par dang 'bras bu'i khyad par gyis sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhal nas kyang gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni theg pa chen po'i yang chen po yin te/ 'di ltar

rten gyi gang zag gi khyad par dang / 'jug pa lam gyi khyad par dang / mthar thug pa 'dras bu'i khyad par dang / /mngon par 'byung ba'i khyad par ro zhes gsungs so/ /slob dpon rat+na A ka ra shAn+ti pa'i zhal snga nas 'dir/ dmigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / /grogs

kyi mthu dang spyod pa yis/ /blo ldan rnams kyi theg pa 'di/ /chen po'i chen po nyid du bsgrags/ /zhes gsungs so/ /bdag gi bla ma rje btsun dam tshig rdo rje'i zhal nas ni pha rol phyin pa'i theg pa las theg pa 'di gong du gyur pa yin te bla ma dang dbang bskur ba dang dam tshig

dang man ngag dang brtson 'grus kyis khyad par du 'phags so zhes gsungs so/ /de la 'dir dam tshig 'ba' zhig brjod par bya ste/ dam tshig ni sngags pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa dang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi lo tog skye ba'i sa gzhir gyur pa yin pas de bri bar bya'o/ /dam tshig

rnams kyang gang zhe na/ rten dang rgyu dang rtsa ba dang ngo bo dang nges pa'i tshig dang dbye ba dang ming gi rnam grangs dang rkang grangs dang brda dang bdud dang dgra dang nyams pa'i tshad dang skong ba dang / ma nyams pa'i rtags dang bskang ba dang bsngo bgrang bya ba dang bskangs pa dang bsdus pa'i dam

tshig dang nyams pa'i nyes dmigs dang ma nyams pa'i phan yon dang 'bras bu rnams so/ /des na rten ni theg pa chen po'i rigs can skyabs su 'gro ba gnyis sngon du song ba bla na med pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur ba thob pa'o/ /de la rgyu

ni byang chub kyi sems so/ /rtsa ba ni snying rje'o/ /ngo bo ni ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang / snying rje dang shes rab mtshungs par ldan pa shes pa'i rgyun no/ /nges tshig ni rtogs pa'i phyir ram/ mnyam pa nyid du 'gro ba'i phyir ram/ thob cing mi 'da' ba'i

phyir ro/ /de la dbye ba ni rtsa ba dang sbom po dang yan lag gi sgo nas dbye ba dang bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang spyod pa dang lta ba'i sgo nas dbye ba dang spyi dang khyad par dang lhag pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas dbye ba dang / rags pa dang phra

ba'i sgo nas dbye ba dang / bsrung bar bya ba dang nyams su blang ba dang spyad par bya ba dang spyod lam dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas dbye ba'o/ /de la ming gi rnam grangs ni dam tshig dang sdom pa dang brtul zhugs dang spyod yul dang dka' spyad dang spyod pa dang shI la la sogs pa'o/ /de la

rkang grangs ni thun mong gi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu gnyis dang kr-i ya'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu gsum dang / spyod pa'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi dang / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i

ltung ba bcu bzhi dang / yang lnga dang yang bzhi dang / rtsa ba'i ltung ba bdun cu tham pa'o/ /de la yan lag gi dam tshig rnams ni 'di rnams so zhes bgrang bar mi nus te/ mdo sde dang mngon pa dang 'dul ba dang rgyud sde rnams su blta bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig gi brda ni ji skad du/

mi shigs pa ni seng ge ste/ /gcan gzan rgyal po yin pas so/ /za ma tog ni rgyal mo'i mdzod/ /dug spyod pa ni der mi rigs/ /rat+na myu gu lcug phran dag /bregs te 'byung rgyun gcad mi bya/ /gangs kyi zhu chu phal ba yang / /mkhas pas btung bar mi bya'o/ /pad+ma'i ze'u

'bru kha ma bye/ /zla zer ma yin dbye mi bya/ /ma brtags bug rdol can snod du/ /bdud rtsi sman blugs zags par 'gyur/ /don med bcos pa'i tshul rtags can/ /bsrel zhing spyad par bya ba min/ /shel dkar rat+na sgo nga dang / /'dam rdzab khung du nub mi bya/ /seng

ge dkar mo'i 'o ma dag /gser snod ma yin blugs mi bya/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /bsreg par bya ba yong ma yin/ /khyung chen gshog pa gar brkyang ba/ /de dag bcag par bya ba min/ /gnam lcags me yi dur mo dag /brdab par bya ba ma yin no/ /rdo rje

drag chen gtams pa'i gzhi/ /gzhig par bya ba gal yin/ /bud shing bsregs pa'i sgron me de/ /'thor rlung drag pos bskyod mi bya/ /rdo rje tshig gi chu rgyun dag /'ol ka bkag par bya ba min/ /rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya dag /nam yang bshig par mi bya'o/ /gtsug

gi yid bzhin nor bu de/ /rgyal mtshan rtse las dbrog mi bya/ /zhes gsungs pas/ /zla ba'i dam tshig kyang brdar gsungs te/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje las tsa'u sa ma ya/ kaspur/ sih+la/ kab+pu ra/ bA la zhes pa dang / snyoms 'jug gi dam tshig kyang po la/ ka k+ko la/

kun du ru zhes gsungs so/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi yang brdar gsungs te/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ ri bong can dang mig dang yon tan rig byed dang / /mda' dang dbang po ri dang bkra shis gza' dang phyogs/ /drag po nyi ma yan lag sa rnams yin/ /zhes gsungs

pa lta bu'o/ /de la dam tshig gi bdud ni rnam rtog 'khrig pa'i bdud dang / btang snyoms le lo'i bdud dang / longs spyod g.yeng ba'i bdud dang / tshig rtsub mtshon cha'i bdud dang / khro gtum 'khrug pa'i bdud de/ /de la dam tshig dgra ni gsang ba 'phel bas bcos dkar

song ba'i dgra dang chos log par spyad pas bar chad 'ong ba'i dgra dang rtsa ba byung bas chad pa chen po 'byung ba'i dgra dang / sgrub pa mi brtson pas dge ba 'phrog pa'i dgra'o/ /de la dam tshig gi nyams pa'i tshad ni nyams pa che chung gi tshad dang dus kyi tshad do/ /de la nyams pa che chung

gi tshad ni kun du nyams pa chen po dang rtsa ba nyams pa dang / yan lag nyams pa dang zlas nyams pa dang zhar la nyams pa'o/ /de la dang po bla ma'i dam tshig ni de bskrongs pa dang de la mtshon la sogs pas brgyab pa dang sku la smad pa dang 'khus pa dang brnyas pa dang 'khon pa dang

bka' bcag pa dang ngan sems dang 'phya ba la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje spun pho mo'i dam tshig ni de bsad pa dang 'khus pa dang brdegs pa dang nor rdzas dang chung ma la sogs pa phrogs pa dang / lkog kha dang ngor kha dang man dur dang brnyas pa dang mtshang 'dru ba

dang ngan sems dang 'khon pa dang brtse gdung med pa la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems gtan spangs pa ni kun du nyes pa chen po'o/ /de la rtsa ba'i ltung ba bdun cu las bla ma dang rdo rje spun dang byang chub kyi sems ma gtogs pa drug cu rtsa gsum nyams pa dang /

gzhan yang rang gis dbang ma thob par gzhan la bskur ba dang mi shes par dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / rab gnas dang sbyin sreg dang tshogs kyi 'khor lor zhugs pa dang / gsang sngags rang shes su bla ma med par spyod pa dang thun mtshams kyi rnal 'byor chags pa dang lha dang bla ma la mchod

pa dus su chags pa dang mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams med pa lnga dang nye ba'i mtshams med pa lnga dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang rang gi gsang ba bzhi po bag med par gzhan la smra ba dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pas sdig pa ci la yang mi 'dzem pa

rnams ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhig ral du 'gyur ro/ /de la rtsa ba'i yan lag tu gyur pa yang lag gi ltung ba bdun dang bco lnga la sogs pa spyir bzhi/ bar skabs bzhi/ gsang ba nye bar gtad pa bzhi/ gsang bar 'os pa'o/ /sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa nas gsungs pa ji

snyed pa rnams dang / gzhan yang gzugs sku dang po ti dang rdo rje dril bu dang phur bu 'joms pa dang 'tshong ba dang 'gom pa dang mchog tu yi dam lha'i sku dang / glegs bam dang phyag rgya rnams sbyin pa dang 'tshong ba la sogs pa rnams ni yan lag gi ltung ba zhig ral du 'gyur ro/ /

de la byang chub kyi sems gtan spangs te rtsa ba mang du byung ba ni kun du nyon mongs pa chen po'o/ /de ma shor yang rtsa ba'i nyes pa gcig gam 'ga' byung ba ni rtsa ba nyams pa'o/ /rtsa ba ma shor ba yang nyes pa gzhan byung ba ni yan lag nyams pa'o/ /bla ma ngan pa dang grogs ngan

pas nyes pa byung na ni zlas nyams pa'o/ /mi shes pa dang ma gus pa dang bag med pa dang nyon mongs pa che bas nyes pa byung ba ni zhar la nyams pa'o/ /de la dus kyis nyams pa ni brtson pa rab kyi rab kyis ni nyes pa byung ba'i rjes nyid la ma bskangs na nyams so/ /rab kyi 'bring

gis snga dro nyi ma phyed dang phyed kyi phyed dang dgongs ka dang de bzhin du dus su ma bskangs na nyams so/ /rab kyi tha mas ni nyin par nyes pa mtshan mo la/ mtshan mo'i nyes pa nyin par ma bskangs na nyams so/ /'bring gi rab dang 'bring gi 'bring dang 'bring gi tha ma ni zhag bdun dang

dus khyad par can dang zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tshun chad du ma bskangs na nyams so/ /tha ma'i rab dang tha ma'i 'bring dang tha ma'i tha mas ni zla ba gcig dang zla ba bdun dang zla ba bcu gnyis tshun chad du ma bskangs na nyams so/ /shin tu dman pas kyang skye ba 'di la nyams pa lus

pa las 'chi kar skong na de bskangs pa las de ma bskangs na nyams so/ /de la dam tshig ma nyams pa'i rtags ni gdung sha rI ram dang khrel ma khrel dang rmi lam dang bar chad mang nyung las brtag par bya'o/ /de la dam tshig bskang ba ni so so dang thun mong gi'o/ /de la so sor

bskang ba ni spyod pa rlabs po che tsha tsha dang sbyin sreg dang gtor ma dang yan lag bdun pa dang chos spyod bcu dang tshogs kyi tsakra dang nye'u 'don pa dang dge 'dun la chos ston yon dang bcas pa dang / sgrub pa chen po'i gzhi bzung ba dang gzugs khyad par can dang rang gi lha'i

snying po bzlas brjod bya ba ni 'bum phrag lnga dang khri phrag gsum dang khri phrag lnga dang stong phrag gsum dang stod phrag lnga dang brgya phrag gsum dang brgya phrag lnga dang bcu phrag gsum dang bcu phrag lnga dang nyi shu rtsa gcig ste nyams pa chen po la sogs pa lnga dang rim pa bzhin du sbyar ro/ /

gzhan yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi nyams na slar yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba dang / rdo rje spun gyi dam tshig nyams pa na tshogs kyi tsakra la sogs pa ste nyes pa so sor bskang ba'i thabs so sor ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du bskang bar bya'o/ /de la thun mong gi bskang ba ni bshags

pa dang sbyang ba dang slar blang ba'o/ /gzhan yang gong du bshad pa'i dge ba'i las kyis bskang ba dang rdzas kyis bskang ba dang don gyis bskang ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyis bskang ba dang gsang ba'i thabs kyis bskang ba'o/ /de la dang po gong du bshad do/ /gnyis pa

ni bla ma spyan drangs nas rin po che dang rdzas khyad par can phul nas nyes pa bshags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas rdzas de dag slar slu ba'i tshul du bla ma las dam tshig bslang bar bya'o/ /gsum pa ni chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pas bsgom pa dang chos zab mo nyan

pa dang bsam pa dang bklag pa dang / kha ton bya ba de la brtag pa dang bri ba dang gzhan la sbyin par bya'o/ /de la bzhi pa ni sdig pa bkru ba dang sdig pa sreg pa dang sdig pa gtor ba dang dam tshig rdo rje bsgoms nas de'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bskang ba'o/ /de la lnga pa ni bla ma la rdzas dang

rang gi chung ma phul te/ gsang ba'i dbang dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang bzhi pa'i dbang zhu bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang yi dam lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzlas pas shin tu yang bskang ngo / /khyad par du rdo rje byang chub kyi sems bsgoms nas bskang du mi btub pa yang bskang ste/

mdzod kyi mdo la sogs pa la blta bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig rnams bsdo ba grang bya ba ni mdor bsdu na dran pa'i tshul gyis bsdo bgrang bya ba dang / kha thon dus gsum du bsdo bgrang bya ba dang / dus drug tu yi dam nar ma'i dus su bskang zhing bsdo bgrang bya ba dang / glegs

bam bltas pas bsdo bgrang bya ba'o/ /de la dam tshig bskangs pa dang ma nyams pa'i rtags sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de la dam tshig nyams pa'i nyes dmigs ni ji skad du dpal sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor gyi rgyud las/ dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ /

dbang bskur dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pas dang po dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang bskur ba thob nas dam tshig sdom pa mnos nas phyis ma bsrungs na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub mi 'byung la/ mi 'dod pa sna tshogs pa 'byung

bar 'gyur ro/ /yang / dam tshig med pa'i mi rnams la/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mi sbyin zhing / /de dang 'grogs par mi bya ste/ /snying rje bskyed la spang bar bya/ /zhes pa dang / dang por bla ma rje btsun las/ /dam tshig thob nas mi bsrung ba/ /mkha' 'gro srin pos bsad

nas su/ /ngu 'bod la sogs dmyal bar 'gro/ /shes rab snying rje mi ldan pa/ /gsang sngags la ni 'jug mi bya/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur/ /de bas dam nyams sdig can de'i/ /nyams pas grib ma 'go bas na/ /lhan

cig gnas par mi bya zhing / /de la snying rje bskyed par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dpal sangs rgyas thod pa las kyang / re zhig dam tshig nyams pa las/ /dngos grub thob pa lta zhog gi/ /mi yi skye ba'ang rnyed par dka'/ /gang yang bla ma brgyud pa yi/ /rims 'ongs de nyid

man ngag ni/ /de yis ji ltar 'grub mnyam dgongs/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan yang rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams na dper na shing chen po rtsa ba tshig pa'am skams pa'am bregs pa dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten dang de las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /spom

pa'i nyes pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shing chen po'i sdong po dang 'dra ste/ 'jig rten gyi dngos grub chen po brgyad mi 'byung ngo / /yan lag gi ltung ba ni shing gi yal ga dang 'dra bar phrin las bzhi'i dngos grub kyi bar du gcod do/ /gzhan yang 'di la g.yel ba dang mchod pa

dang gtor ma chags na byin rlabs chung ba dang rnal 'byor sdo skams so/ /bla ma'i thugs ma zin zhing bka' bcag na bgegs ldang ngo / /spyod pa rtsing ba dang / bag med na 'byor pa brlag par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dam tshig ma bsrungs kyang bkra shis pa 'dra na yang 'phral du

tshe 'di la gnod pa med kyang de nyid chad pa chen po 'byung ba'i rtags yin te/ dper na rgyal po'i bka' chad byung na de la zan dang chang mang po blud nas bzhi bar byas na phyis gsod do/ /dam tshig kha cig legs par bsrungs pa las sdug bsngal dang bar chad mang ba ltar 'dug

kyang de tshe rabs snga ma'i las kyi lhag ma lus pa yin pas des ni myur du phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa ni tshe 'dir yang bkra mi shis pa mang po 'byung la/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang / gshis

ngan du 'chi ba bcu gnyis kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shi nas kyang rdo rje dmyal bar skyes nas de nas thon pa'i dus med do/ /de la dam tshig ma nyams pa'i phan yon ni/ tshe ring ba dang longs spyod che ba dang ci bsams pa 'grub pa dang / mthu dang byin rlabs che ba dang bkra shis

par 'gyur ro/ /bsgom pa dang bzlas pa dang mchod pa la brtson pas rnal 'byor pa sngo ma skams par longs spyod che ba dang bla ma'i bka' ma bcag cing gus pas bar chad med pa dang rdo rje spun la brtse gdung byas pas mi ma yin rnams kyis bkur sti byed do/ /g.yo sgyu med pas mi

dang mi ma yin pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags 'chol bar ma spyad pas 'byor ba brtan pa dang bkra shis so/ /'chi ba'i dus su yang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bsu nas rig 'dzin gyi gnas su 'khrid do/ /gzhan yang des skye ba 'di dang phyi ma dang skye ba

bdun dang skye ba bcu drug tshun chad kyis 'grub pa la the tshom med do/ /de la dam tshig thams cad bsdu na gnyis te/ snying rje rus pa'i gting nas skye ba dang shes rab tshig tsam ma yin pa gting nas go ba'o/ /'di gnyis rgyud la brten na dang po nyid nas nyes pa mi 'byung la gal te byung na yang myur du

bskangs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dam tshig thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems su 'dus te de yang rnam pa bzhi'o/ /byang chub kyi sems dang bla na med pa byang chub kyi sems dang kun du bzang po'i sems dang rdo rje byang chub kyi sems so/ /de la so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni las dge sdig

gtsor ston to/ /mdo sde'i sdom pa ni snying rje gtsor ston to/ /gsang sngags kyi sdom pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi mi phyed pa gtsor ston to/ /de la so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsam pa brtan po las skye'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni lhag pa'i bsam

pa bzang po las skye'o/ /gsang sngags kyi sdom pa ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems las skye'o/ /de la so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni spong pa bdun no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni spong ba bcu'o/ /sngags kyi sdom pa ni spong ba gcig go/ /so sor thar pa'i gzhung du ni kha na ma tho ba

gnyi ga brjod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gzhung du ni rang bzhin 'ba' zhig brjod do/ /sngags kyi gzhung du ni de gnyi ga'i tha snyad ma brjod do/ /yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni rdzas kyi bdag nyid du yod par 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni brtag pa tsam du yod

bar 'dod do/ /sngags su ni de gnyi ga'i tha snyad ma brjod do/ /yang nyan thos kyi sdom pa la par chad kyi chos mang du yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la bar chad kyi chos nyung zad cig go/ /sngags kyi sdom pa la ni bar chad kyi chos bshad pa med do/ /yang sdom pa dang po

la ni pham ba byung na phyis blang ba'i skal pa med do/ /bar ma la ni pham pa byung na phyis blang ba'i skal ba yod do/ /tha ma ni rdo rje byang chub kyi sems dang ldan na nyams pa med do/ /de la sdom pa dang po la ni mkhan po dang slob dpon dgos so/ /bar ma'i sdom pa la ni bla ma gcig

pu'am yang na med pa'o/ /tha ma de la ni bzhi ste/ bla ma'i zhal nas byung ba'i dbang dang / ye shes lha'i phyin gyi rlabs kyi dbang dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro mas lung bstan pa'i dbang dang / rang nyid kyi sems kyi rtsal gyis thob pa'i dbang dang ngo / /yang snga ma ni gzhan la

gnod pa byed pa las ldog go/ /bar ma ni de'i steng du gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /phyi ma ni de'i steng du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad spyod nyams su len pa'o/ /yang dang po'i sdom pa ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o/ /bar ma'i sdom pa ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o/ /sngags kyi sdom pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slob pa'o/ /yang dang po'i sdom pa ni bdag 'ba' zhig gi don to/ /bar ma'i sdom pa ni gzhan 'ba' zhig gi don to/ /phyi ma'i sdom pa ni gnyi ga'i don to/ /yang dang po'i sdom pa ni ji srid

'tsho'i bar du mnos so/ /bar ma'i sdom pa ni snying po byang chub kyi bar du'o/ /phyi ma'i sdom pa ni nam mkha' ji srid gnas kyi bar du'o/ /sdom pa dang po'i 'bras bu ni mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis so/ /bar ma'i 'bras bu ni sa bcu 'am sa bcu gcig pa'o/ /

tha ma'i 'bras bu ni sa bcu gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang sgom sgrub dang chos spyod yi dam gyi lhas ma khrel ba dang / dad pa dang bsnyen bkur bla mas ma khrel ba dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis ma khrel ba dang / brtse gdung phan gnod rdo rje spun pho mos

ma khrel ba dang / bzlas brjod dang gtor ma dang cho ga'i nus pa dang byin rlabs mtshan mo rgyu ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs kyis ma khrel ba dang / rdo rje bla ma'i man ngag zab mi zab rang gi slob mas ma khrel ba dang / lta ba zab mi zab mkhas pa rnams kyis ma khrel ba dang / ji ltar

dam bcas pa'i don rang gi sems kyis ma khrel ba dang / spyod pa bzang ngan grogs pos ma khrel ba dang / gtong phod dang / gsal gshog dang / ro tshod dang / zhi des dang / mthun 'jug 'jig rten gyi mi rnams kyis ma khrel pa'o/ /mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor

ni/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /spyod lam rnal 'byor dus su ni/ /phyi nang thams cad gzhan min te/ /sems nyid lha nyid sgyu ma nyid/ /'od gsal yin te mnyam nyid gzhi/ /dag pa bzhi yang de nyid yin/ /nyin dang mtshan mo rtag par ni/ /sems

kyi skad cig re re la/ /de ltar mos pa yang yang bya/ /rdo rje shugs dang mi ldan yang / /snang ba byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /de lta bu yi sngags pa ni/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i dogs pa med/ /b+haM ga lar skyes dge slong ni/ /mar me mdzad dpal ye shes kyis/ /gzhung

dang bla ma'i man ngag gis/ /dam tshig thams cad bsdus nas bris/ /dam tshig thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dIM pa ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun bla ma chen po de nyid kyi zhal snga nas dang / lo rtsA ba dge slong tshul khrims

rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ karma pra ma tha sa ma ya sU tra saM gra ha/ bod skad du/ las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang sngags kyi rnam par thar pa'i

sgor zhugs pa'i las dang po pa rnams kyi dam tshig mdor bstan pa/ hUM rdor las byung mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sngags 'chang rnams kyis bsrung ba'i dam tshig ni/ /mdor bsdus brtse ba'i yid kyis bshad par bya/ /sdug

bsngal tshogs kyis bsregs pa'i sems can la/ /snying rjer ldan pas yongs la khyab pa dang / /g.yo dang mi g.yo'i chos rnams ma skyes par/ /rtog pa'i shes rab snying rje'i gzhir bya'o/ /rtag tu dad dang brtson 'grus dran pa dang / /shes bzhin ting 'dzin mchog la

gnas par bya/ /dang por sngags pas srog gcod rku ba dang / /'khrig dang brdzun smra chang 'thung la sogs pa'i/ /tshul khrims sngags kyi rtsa bar sangs rgyas gsungs/ /de bas srog bzhin bslab pa bsrung bar bya/ /zhes so/ /yul gangs ri'i rtsa na gnas pa'i slob dpon dz+nyAM

na bo d+hi'i mdzad pa'i gsang chen sgron ma'i dam tshig las/ nyan thos tshul khrims theg chen sdom pa dang / /sa bdag khrims las 'da' bar mi bya'o/ /zhe'o/ /rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las/ byang chub sems 'dzin gyur nas ni/ /lha gzhan dag la mi mos dang / /dkon mchog

gsum la dad pa dang / /de la gzhol zhing 'bab pa yis/ /gsod dang rku dang 'khrig pa dang / /brdzun dang chang ni rnam par spang / /khyim pa'i tshul du gnas nas ni/ /rig sngags rgyal po bsgrub par bya/ /gal te de ni rab byung na/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas par bya/ /

so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o/ /zhes 'byung bas sdom pa dang dam tshig mtha' dag la gnas par bya'o/ /de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas thog mar rig sngags gzung ba'i dam tshig la gnas par bya'o/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po

rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni sdom pa dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan por

gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa deng nas gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi/ /slob dpon nyid kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya

yang / /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po las/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa las/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i

theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po las/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung par bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub sems/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par

bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / /ma rgal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral/ /ma grol ba ni bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /mya ngan 'das la sems can dgod/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas

su/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /bdag ni rab tu gnas par bgyi/ /lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis/ /mi dge ba ni rnam bcu dang / /bag med pa yi gnas byung ba/ /'bru chang bcos pa'i chang dag dang / /theg pa dman la 'dod pa dang / /de bzhin lha dang lha min

dang / /gsang ba pa rnams brnyas pa dang / /phyag rgya mtshan ma bzhon pa dang / /mtshon cha la sogs 'gom pa rnams/ /dus 'di nyid nas bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /bdag ni rab tu ldog par bgyi'o/ /zhe'o/ /gal te rig sngags gzung ba nyid

du nges pas ni/ sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin ma bsrungs na/ 'phags pa rnams bslus pa/ bdag nyid la 'khu bar byed pa/ dngos grub chen po la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ /de ni g.yon can shing rul ba lta bu yin no/ /dam tshig la mi gnas par gsang sngags tshig

tsam gyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don du las sna tshogs byed pa'o/ /dper na mdze can nang na 'bus rnyings pa la phyi rol gyi gos dang rgyan gyis bkab pa lta bu yin no/ /des ni bdag gi don yang bya bar mi nus na gzhan gyi don lta ci smos/ /de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis smod

cing bshung ba yin no/ /gsang sngags kyi dngos grub sgrub pa dang / gzhan gyi don du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las byed pa ni/ dus yun ring por bdag gi sems kyi rgyud sbyangs pa dang / sdom pa dang dam tshig la sngags spyod pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas/ dben par tshul bzhin

du las byas nas dngos grub tu yang 'gyur la gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa yang 'grub bo/ /dam tshig spangs te gzu lums su gsang sngags dgongs pas bshad pa'i don/ sgra ji bzhin du bzung nas snod min pa'i slob ma dang / grong la sogs par log par spyad na ni/ de

bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rgyud khyad du bsad pas slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang / in+d+ra b+hU ti la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas kyi tshig gi bdud rtsi spangs pa yin pas bdag bde legs su 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis zas dug dang bcas pa bzhin du spang bar bya'o/ /de bas na dngos

grub kyi snod du rung ba'i sgrub pa pos/ /dang por dam tshig mnos pa nyid nas bzung nas byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mi nyams par bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pas ni dam tshig gnyis bsrung ste/ bza' ba'i dam tshig dang / bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ /de la bza' ba'i dam

tshig /ga bur mtshal dang pi pi ling / /tsan+dan dmar dang gur gum sogs/ /man ngag bzhin du sgrub pa pos/ /rtag tu bsten cing bza' bar bgyi/ /bsrung ba dag gi dam tshig ni/ /rang lus phyag rgya nyid bsgoms la/ /ma lus 'gro ba'i tshogs bsam bya/ /rdo rje slob

dpon rdo rje rnams/ /rdo rje de ni spun rnams la/ /gtso dang sems dpa' bskyed par bya/ /'di ni sku yi dam tshig ste/ /tshul khrims bsrung la brtson par bya/ /sred 'byung ngag gi skyon spangs te/ /rig sngags lha yi snying po dang / /rdo rje phra sogs rtse gcig

pas/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas par bya/ /de ni gsung gi dam tshig ste/ /rtag tu 'di las 'da' mi bya/ /rgyun du ting 'dzin gnyis po dang / /spyod bzhin dran pas zin par bya/ /thun mong ma yin gsang chen dang / /man ngag gzhan du mi spel lo/ /lta dang spyod dang lha

dag dang / /slob dpon mchog gnyis gsang ba ste/ /'di dag gsang chen gzhan du min/ /'di dag thugs kyi dam tshig go/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba 'di/ /srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ngo / /rgyal bas dgongs te gsungs pa yi/ /dam tshig bzhi la gnas par

bya/ /ji bzhin don ldan bcu bzhi ni/ /phas pham par ni rab tu bsgrags/ /spang zhing 'dor bar mi bya ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas pa dang / /bde gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang / /sdang bas spun gyi sngags min smra/ /byams pa chen po

rnam spong dang / /byang chub sems ni 'dor ba dang / /theg pa gsum la smod pa dang / /skal min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang / /rgyal ba'i bdag nyid phung po smod/ /dam pa'i chos la yid gnyis za/ /gdug la byams dang chags bral dang / /chos la gnyis su 'byed pa

dang / /dang pa'i sems la rab tu smod/ /dam tshig bsten pa ji snyed pa/ /brtags pa'i rig ma smod pa ste/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ba des/ /sngags pa'i dam tshig zad par 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin ni bzla bar bya/ /gal te nyams gyur

rnal 'byor pa/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /dam tshig dang ni mi ldan pa'i/ /rig ma bsten par dga' ba dang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lor rtsod pa dang / /gsang ba'i chos ni ston pa dang / /sems can dad dang ldan pa la/ /dam chos gzhan du ston pa dang / /nyan thos

dag tu rlom byed pa'i/ /nang du zhag bdun 'dug pa dang / /sbyor ba nges par ma byas pa'i/ /snod min gsang ba ston pa rnams/ /kha na ma tho bcas 'gyur te/ /sngags pa de yi dam tshig zad/ /zad pas 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing / /bdud dang sdug bsngal rab tu 'phel/ /

zhe'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang thob pas kyang dam tshig rnams/ dang po thob pa nyid nas byang chub chen po'i bar du yang dag par gzung ngo / /gal te nyams par byas na don dam par bsrung du med pa dang / dgongs pa'i don gyi tshig gi gzugs brnyan la brten nas dam tshig

mi bsrung bar gzu lums su dkyil 'khor la sogs pa byed pa ni 'phags pa dang 'gro ba kun bslus pa ste/ yon tan de gsang sngags seng ge'i 'o ma lta bu skye bo snod dang mi ldan pa'i mi la bstan pa dang / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las byas pas sems can dmyal ba la

sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i skye ba dang / bdag dang gzhan rlag par byed pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rgyab kyis phyogs pa de nam du yang dngos grub kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba yin no/ /de lta bas na dam tshig rnams lus dang srog la ltos pa med par bsrung bar bya'o/ /dam

tshig nyams pa gso ba ni gnang ste/ thun mtshams sbyor ba las gyur na/ /bde gshegs las rigs bsam gtan gyis/ /de yi nyes pa bsal bar bya/ /gser sbyangs dri med lta bur 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i yan lag sbom nyams na/ /mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya/ /

'phags la bzod gsol dam bcas na/ /phyin chad bsdams te gus par blang / /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid las/ /dang por rigs bdag dkyil 'khor du/ /tshul bzhin yang dag blang bar bya/ /de ltar ma bshags par blangs bas nyams

pa khyad du gsod cing de'i nyes pa 'phel ba dang bcas par gyur na skyon che ste/ gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /de bzhin chos kyi sems dpa' dang / /rmongs pa 'gal bar byas nas ni/ /tshal par 'gas par

gdon mi za/ /zhe'o/ /de lta bas na sangs rgyas dbu 'gas na mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ dam tshig nyams pas ni bdag nyid dang / gzhan phyogs su yang nyes pa sna tshogs su 'byung la/ /phyi mar yang bskal pa gsum la sogs par ngan 'gror 'gro'o/ /

dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig med cing ngan spyod pa/ /bslus 'gyur ngan pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yis zos nas kyang / /de las nga ni skyob mi byed/ /gsang ba pa yi nang nas ni/ /sgrub pa po de phyugs dang 'dra/ /zhe'o/ /bla

ma lnga bcu pa las kyang / slob dpon la ni smod pa de/ /yams dang 'tshe ba'i nad rnams dang / /gdon dang rims dang dug rnams kyis/ /rmongs chen de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po me dang sbrul gdug dang / /chu dang mkha' 'gro rkun po dang / /gdon dang log 'dren rnams

kyis kyang / /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /nam yang slob dpon dag gi ni/ /kun du sems dkrugs mi bya ste/ /gal te rmongs pas byed 'gyur na/ /dmyal bar nges par 'tshed par nges/ /mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i/ /dmyal ba bsten pa gang

yin pa/ /slob dpon la ni smod pa dag/ /der ni gnas par yang dag bshad/ /zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las kyang / /dam tshig sdom pa nyams pa las/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /byin gyis brlabs par mi mdzad de/ /spos dang me tog la sogs pa/ /phul

yang ba zhes par mi 'gyur te/ /nad dang dug dang dgra rnams kyis/ /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /zhe'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde mchog las kyang / dam tshig 'di las 'das gyur na/ /ji snyed sangs rgyas thams

cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin/ /lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang / /sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor bcas/ /de dag la ni snying ring nas/ /snying nas khrag chen drangs nas 'thung / /zhe'o/ /yang de nyid las/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang / /dam tshig rnam

par spangs pa dang / /gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas/ /bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub po/ /zhe'o/ /phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las/ dam tshig 'di las su 'da' dang / /sdang sems ldan pa de dag ni/ /mgo ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje rnams

kyis rtag tu 'gems/ /zhe'o/ /yang mtshams med lnga byas pa'i sdig pa ni bla'i/ gsang sngags log par spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /gzhan las ni/ dam tshig 'di las su 'da' ba/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du ni/ /mnar med shin tu mi bzad sogs/ /bcu drug

dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur/ /zhe'o/ /ye shes grub pa las/ dam tshig nyams pa sdug bsngal zhing / /lus dang de bzhin yid dang ni/ /de yi yon tan nyams 'gyur zhing / /myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /shi nas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ni/ /bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag tu/ /myong

nas gnas las 'pho 'gyur bas/ /gdol ba'am dman pa'i rigs su skye/ /lkugs par skye'am yang na 'on par skye/ /zhe'o/ /de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed/ /ce'o/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud

las kyang / drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse dang / /ma mo rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pas/ /gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying / /rtag tu 'jigs par byed par 'gyur/ /zhe'o/ /gal te dam tshig 'di las 'das gyur na/ /pha gsod 'gro ba yin pa dang / /ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba

gang / /'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pas/ dam tshig nyams na skyon che bas na lus dang srog gi phyir yang mi gtang bar bsrung bar bya'o/ /sdom pa dang dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsrung ba yang don che ste/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa zhes bya

ba'i rgyud las kyang / 'gro ba'i don dang de don du/ /dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas nas/ /bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung gang / /bsgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po/ /stong phrag brgya yi kha min par/ /kha cig gis kyang brjod mi nus/ /zhe'o/ /gzhan las ni/ dam tshig

sdom pa 'di rnams kun/ /tshul bzhin bsrung dang sgrub pa yis/ /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes gyur nas/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhe'o/ /dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /zhe'o/ /phyag na rdo rje

dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las kyang / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcas pa yi/ /brtul zhugs dang ni tshul khrims dang / /spyod pa bzlas pa'i gzhi rnams la/ /gal te gnas na de yi tshe/ /sngags pas 'di ltar sngags bsgrub po/ /zhe'o/ /slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa'i

sgrub thabs las/ sngags pas rnam pa 'di dag gis/ /dam tshig sdom pa bsrung byas na/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyis/ /rdo rje gsung nyid thob par 'gyur/ /zhe'o/ /gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las kyang / gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi bskal par byang

chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal yang byang chub sems dpar mi 'gyur te/ gsang ba 'dus pa la dga' zhing de'i dam tshig la gnas shing bsgrubs na tshe 'di nyid la mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/

dbang po gnyis ni mnyam spyor te/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsdus nas/ /nga yi snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs/ /rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan na/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa de tshe la/ /ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /zhe'o/ /gzhung gzhan las thabs kyi dam tshig thams cad la

spyod cing mi nyams par bsrungs la/ shes rab kyis bsrung du med par shes pa ni rnal 'byor pa mchog ces bya'o/ /gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rnam par mi rtog las byung ba'i/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rigs/ /theg pa mchog 'di bla

med pa/ /mchog tu blar gyur sgrub par byed/ /rigs ngan sme sha can la sogs/ /gsod pa don du gnyer ba rnams/ /theg pa bla na med pa yi/ /theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshams med pa la sogs pa yi/ /sems can dag gis bsgrubs na 'grub/ /srog

gcod pa yi sems can rnams/ /brdzun du smra par dad pa dang / /gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang / /rtag tu 'dod la spyod pa dag/ /de dag bsgrub pa'i snod du 'gyur/ /zhe'o/ /ye shes grub pa las/ de ltar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /yar ngo'i zla ba ji bzhin du/ /

rim gyis yang dag 'phel 'gyur gyi/ /nam yang 'grib par mi 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus dman pa la la zhig/ /sangs rgyas thob par ma gyur kyang / /'khor los sgyur rgyal bde ba ni/ /skye ba kun du thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bsod nams ni/ /phyogs bcu dus

gsum yod pa rnams/ /de yi ba spu'i khung bu zhes/ /rgyal ba mchog gis rab tu gsungs/ /zhe'o/ /le'u brgyad pa las/ sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig pas/ /rnam pa slu ba med pa'i sems/ /de bas brtan pa bskyed par bya/ /'di byas pa yis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /

dgyes pa'i bdag nyid can kun mnyes/ /bdud dang bgegs la sogs pa yang / /glags skabs tshol bar mi byed cing / /phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa/ /dgyes pas rtag tu bsrung ba mdzad/ /ce'o/ /gzhan las ni/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun

gyis bkang ste 'phags pa rnams la phul ba bas/ gang gis dam tshig la yang dag par gnas te 'du 'dzi spangs te dgon pa la gnas nas skad cig tsam ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyis mnyam par gzhag na de gnyis las mnyam par gzhag pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa 'thob

par 'gyur ba dang / dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtshan gyis brgyan pa ni gling bzhi la dbang ba'i mthu yod cing chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur to/ /de bzhin du rgyal ba'i sras dam tshig dang sdom pa la yang dag par gnas pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa ni ring por mi thogs par skye ba bdun

la sogs pas 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed pa yin no/ /yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni su'i spyi gtsug na yod pa la 'gro ba gang gis kyang bar mi chod do/ /de bzhin du sngags pa gang zhig sdom pa dang dam tshig gi nor bus sgo gsum

brgyan pa la bdud la sogs pa gang gis kyang bar du mi chod do/ /yang skyes bu mig dang rkang par ldan pa ni gang 'gro ba'i gnas su phyin cing dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig mig dang 'dra ba dang spyod pa'i dam tshig rkang pa dang 'dra ba la

brten te ye shes kyi lam drang du zhugs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i nor bu blangs te/ bdag dang gzhan gyi don lhun gyis grub par byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang dper na ri'i rgyal po gangs la sman 'bral bar dka' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de gang gis rnyed pa de ni dug dang nad la sogs

pa rtsa ba nas 'byin cing tshe ring ba yang 'grub bo/ /de bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyi thugs nor bu rin po che'i nor bu blangs te/ las dang skal ba dang ldan pa gang zhig dam tshig rnams kyi sman thob pas 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas bsags pa'i bag chags dang nyon mongs pa'i nad

thams cad zhi zhing byang la bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du mi 'chi ba'i tshe yang 'thob bo/ /dper na ded dpon bsod nams kyis gzi brjid dang thabs dang ldan pas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs te/ rin po che'i gling du phyin te nor bu rin po che blangs nas bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs

so/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'gro ba 'khor ba las 'don pa'i ded dpon la brten te/ tshul khrims dang dam tshig tu sbyar nas thabs la mkhas pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi skya ba bskyod nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral te/ dngos grub rnam pa gsum gyi nor bu

blangs te/ bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs so/ /de lta bas na rnal 'byor pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dag gis dam tshig dang sdom pa mtha' dag tshul bzhin bsrungs la/ rgyud dang sgrub thabs dang mthun par dgongs pa'i gnas su nam lhun gyis grub

pa'i bar du/ rdo shing ngam ri dgas shi ba'i ro bzhin du gnas te bsgrub par bya'o/ /bdag nyid dran gso rnal 'byor pa la phan gdags phyir/ /rgyud dang sgrub thabs dag las dam tshig mdor bsdus pas/ /'phags dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la gnong ste bzod par gsol/ /

des ni 'jig rten gsum bcas rdo rje 'dzin thob shog /dbang pos mtshan pa'i yul gyi rtsa na gnas pa'i slob dpon r+dz+nyA na bo d+his mdzad pa/ las dang po pa'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang / lo tsA ba bsod nams rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tri sam+ba ra pra b+hA mA lA nA ma/ bod skad du/ sdom gsum 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag zab yangs shes bya'i rgya mtsho las/ /bstan pa'i gru dang bdag blo'i ded dpon gyis/ /mkhyen pa'i dar

'phyar brtse ba'i rlung bskyod nas/ /sdom gsum yid bzhin nor bu kho bos blang / /ding sang bstan pa'i gsham 'di ru/ /sdom pa gsum gyi rnam gzhag la/ /mkhas pa'i rgyu skar 'ba' zhig gis/ /phyogs re'i cha tsam rtogs 'gyur mod/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /

rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa la/ /'thob tshul gnas tshul gtong ba'i tshul/ /gnyis ldan gsum ldan 'thad pa'i gzhung / /nyes pa phan yon rim pa dag/ /bdag blo nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs las rgyal bar byas te dgod/ /gling gsum skyes pa bud med kyis/ /rang

nyid 'khor ba bsgral don du/ /mkhan slob cho ga tshad ldan las/ /ji srid 'tsho yi bar dag tu/ /gnod pa bzhi dang bcas pa las/ /gtso cher lus ngag sdom pa de/ /nyan thos bye brag smra ba'i sdom/ /gang zag glang bu 'dra ba la/ /sdom pa khal dang 'dra ba zhig /thob pa'i

thag pas sbrel bas na/ /so sor thar pa'i gnas tshul yin/ /bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang / /mtshan gnyis dag ni byung ba dang / /rtsa ba chad dang mtshan 'das las/ /so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtang / /gsungs so pham pa spyad pas kyang / /so sor thar pa'i tshul yin no/ /lha

mi la sogs gang rung gis/ /'gro ba ma lus bskyab pa'i phyir/ /slob dpon cho ga tshad ldan las/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /smon dang 'jug pa'i bdag nyid can/ /lus ngag yid gsum rang don dang / /gzhan don thabs ma yin las sdom/ /kun rdzob byang chub sems

kyi'o/ /de nyid snang la rang bzhin med/ /'jigs sogs bzhin du goms pa las/ /yul dang yul can gnyis las grol/ /don dam byang chub sems yin no/ /sems dang sems byung sems bskyed gnyis/ /rang don gza' dang bral bas na/ /nyi ma

dang ni 'od zer bzhin/ /de dag gnas pa'i tshul yin no/ /rang don blangs dang nag po yi/ /chos bzhi la sogs zhugs pa dang / /'bras bu dag ni thob pa na/ /tsha grang grub bzhin sems bskyed gtong / /rigs bzhi la sogs bsod nams ldan/ /rang gzhan dgos 'dod

phun tshogs don/ /bla ma cho ga tshad ldan las/ /nam mkha' ji srid gnas bar du/ /lhan skyes ye shes brda don sprod/ /rnam rtog dri ma kun las sdom/ /rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal mtshan la/ /rim gnyis yid bzhin nor gyis spras/ /'dod yon

lnga yis kun nas mchod/ /dgos 'dod kun gyi 'byung gnas sa/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa'i gnas tshul yin/ /dgos 'dod med do skyon rnams 'byung / /dpag bsam shing bu 'gyel ba ltar/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung ba na/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom pa gtong / /rgyud ni sum brgya pa

las ni/ /'khor bzhi po la rjes su gnang / /rang gi bslab pa dang yang ldan/ /dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa bya/ /gsungs so dus kyi 'khor lo las/ /rten ni gsum las dge slong mchog /'bring ni dge tshul yin par 'dod/ /khyim na gnas pa tha ma'o/ /gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mo las/ /

gal te de ni rab byung na/ /sdom pa gsum dang yang dag ldan/ /so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin sngags kyi sdom pa'o/ /gzhung 'bum pa las 'di skad du/ /rdo yi rigs kyi bye brag bzhu/ /lcags dang zangs dang dngul du 'byung / /gser 'gyur rtsi yi dngos po

yis/ /kun kyang gser du 'gyur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin sems kyi bye brag gis/ /rigs can gsum gyi sdom pa yang / /dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/ /gsungs pa'i don la 'ga' zhig ni/ /sdom gsum gnas gyur ngo bo gcig /gong

ma'i rtsa ltung byung ba na/ /'og ma gtong zhes sgrogs pa yod/ /de la cung zhig brtag par bya/ /gsum ldan gsungs pa'i dgongs pa'i don/ /gcig ldan spong ba'i dgongs pa min/ /rigs pas kyang ni shin tu gnod/ /bud med la smod ltung ba yis/ /reg srung sdom pa

gtong ngam ci/ /gal te gtong na ha cang thal/ /mkha' la sprin chen 'khrigs pa yis/ /sa yi lo tog skam zhes bsgre/ /gzhan yang sdom pa gtong thob rgyu/ /sangs rgyas gsung las gzhan pa yi/ /cho ga mkhan du byed rigs sam/ /gzhan yang 'gal ba ltag sprod la/ /gnas

gyur brtsi ba'i rigs ma yin/ /rigs na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gang+gA'i chu las gyur zhes bsgre/ /des na rang gis brtags la blang / /sdom gsum ldan zhes gsungs pa de/ /shes rgyud gcig la brtsi na ni/ /gcig tu 'dod kyang gsum du 'gyur/ /ldan chos rdzas

gzhan tha dad phyir/ /'on te snga phyi la brtsi na/ /gsum ldan zhes pa'i sgra don med/ /'on te sdom gsum rdzas gcig tu/ /shes rgyud gcig la ldan zhe na/ /gtong thob cho ga gcig tu 'gyur/ /des na so sor thar ldan pas/ /byang chub mchog gi sems blangs na/ /dang po de ni kun

gzhi la/ /bag la nyal ba'i tshul du gnas/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa thob pa na/ /'og ma gnyis ka bag la nyal/ /dper na mkha' la skar ma shar/ /cung zad snang bar byas gyur mod/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba'i tshe/ /skar 'od nyams mod 'jig rten gsal/ /rta bdun tsha zer

byung ba na/ /zla ba'i 'od nyams 'jig rten gsal/ /gal te rig pa 'dzin pa yis/ /gdul bya gang la gang don du/ /'og ma'i sdom pa blangs pa na/ /gong ma zil gyis mi non mod/ /sdom pa cho gas 'thob pa yin/ /mkha' la nyi ma gnas gyur mod/ /zla skar 'char ba bkag pa med/ /

des thob tshul dang gtong ba'i tshul/ /rang rang cho ga bzhin du gnas/ /kun gzhi bag chags mang po can/ /yin yang shes rgyud tha dad med/ /'og ma'i ltung ba byung gyur mod/ /gong ma ji srid gnas kyi bar/ /rnam par smin pas gos pa med/ /dper na zla skar nub gyur mod/ /nyi ma

mkha' la gnas kyi bar/ /cung zad 'grib par byas pa med/ /gong ma'i ltung ba byung ba na/ /'og ma ji ltar gnas gyur kyang / /cung zad phan gyi skyob mi nus/ /rta bdun tsha zer nub pa na/ /zla skar gnas kyang mun pa'i bag /gser 'gyur rtsi zhes gsungs

pa'i don/ /zil gnon yon tan mchog la dgongs/ /zla skar gnyis kyi 'od zer yang / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas kyi bar/ /nyi ma'i 'od ces kun gyis sgrogs/ /gzhan yang kha cig sdom pa gsum/ /sa chu gru 'dra gzhi rten du/ /'dod ces sgrogs pa 'khrul pa yin/ /de yi

'khrul gzhi kho bos bstan/ /mkhas pa chen po rta dbyangs dang / /slob dpon sgeg pa'i rdo rje sogs/ /sdom gsum de nyid rig pa yis/ /don de ldog pa du mas phye/ /khyab bya khyab byed gsungs pa la/ /rten dang brten par byed na 'khrul/ /byang sems sdom pa'i don gcig la/ /

phan sgrub sgrub pa'i ldog pa dang / /gnod spong dgag pa gnyis 'dug mod/ /phan sgrub ngo bo gang yin la/ /gnod pa spong ba khyab pas na/ /khyab bya khyab byed rdzas gcig tu/ /ba lang rdzis kyang mi go'am/ /des na rig 'dzin gcig pu la/ /gsum ldan sbyor ba 'thad ma yin/ /

gal te 'thad na 'og ma gnyis/ /cho ga mi dgos skye bar 'gyur/ /sdom gsum cho ga thun mong du/ /thub pa chen pos gsungs pa med/ /phrag dog nor 'dod gti mug can/ /rang bzo byed pa su yis khegs/ /mdo rgyud spungs kyang phyogs su 'phen/ /sgra tshad byung na gtam gzhan

sgyur/ /bstan pa'i byi dor ji ltar bya/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa kho na bas/ /gsum ldan sngags pa'i dgongs pa ni/ /'bras bu'i sgo nas ma yin te/ /yin na kun mkhyen mchog dman 'gyur/ /des na lam dus gdul bya'i don/ /gcig dang gsum gyi khyad par dang / /sdom pa rdzas chos

gzhan nyams mod/ /gzhan yod pa yi khyad par yin/ /sdom gsum gang yang mi ldan na/ /lha mi'i lus kyang rnyed par dka'/ /nyams na mthong chos rnam smin gyi/ /rim pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya/ /de las so thar nyams gyur na/ /rang gis rang bslus gnod pa nyung / /rgyal

dang de sras thams cad kyis/ /cung zad khrel gyi shin tu min/ /pham pa lci yang bye brag gis/ /lo grangs ngan song gsum du gnas/ /byang sems nyams na 'gro ba kun/ /bslus pas gnod pa shin tu mang / /rgyal dang de sras thams cad dang / /'gro ba kun gyis shin tu khrel/ /pham

pa lci yang bye brag gis/ /bskal pa'i grangs kyis dmyal bar gnas/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa nyams pas ni/ /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs can/ /rgyal dang de sras kun brnyas pas/ /mi 'jig mnar med gnas dag tu/ /sdug bsngal chen po de yis myong / /rtsa ba kun nyams phyal

ba dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson na/ /rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste/ /dmyal ba phal pa thams cad kyi/ /sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdoms pa bas/ /de yi 'bum gyi char mi phod/ /'jig rten 'jig na gzhan du 'pho/ /se gol gcig gis phyin par byed/ /sangs rgyas stong gi 'od

zer dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i phrin las kun/ /rgyun du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su/ /de ni thon par ma gsungs so/ /so sor thar pa'i phan yon ni/ /gnas skabs lha mi mthar thug gi /dgra bcom 'bras bu nges par 'thob/ /byang chub

sems kyi phan yon ni/ /gnas skabs bde mang ring mo na/ /sangs rgyas nyid du nges par 'grub/ /rgyas par mdo sde blta bar byos/ /rig 'dzin sdom pa'i phan yon ni/ /gnas skabs kun mkhyen bde longs spyod/ /gal te bsgom pa dang bcas na/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs

rgyas 'gyur/ /ma bsgoms gyur kyang ltung med na/ /skye ba bcu drug nyid na'o/ /mkhyen brtse dung phyur ldan pa yi/ /phan chen blo yi rgya mtsho las/ /sdom gsum nor bu'i phreng ba blangs/ /bdag gzhan 'gro ba ma lus kyi/ /blo gros gtsug la legs gnas te/ /kun mkhyen

dgos 'dod spyod par shog /rgya gar shar phyogs dzA ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ras mdzad de rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra yA na mU lA pat+ti karma bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i las kyi cho ga//

bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje theg pa'i sgor zhugs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dpyad bya ba/ /las kyi cho ga 'di ltar mdzod/ /spyi bo nyi zla pad steng du/ /bla ma sangs rgyas bsams byas te/ /rtag tu dran dang gsol gdab bya/ /

srog gcod brdzun dang ma byin len/ /'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni/ /ci la bab kyang bsrung bar bya/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba ni/ /lus grib bzhin du 'bral mi bya/ /bum pa'i dbang thob gyur nas ni/ /lha dang bzlas pa rnal 'byor dang / /phyag 'tshal mchod dang sdig

bshags dang / /rjes su yi rang bskor dang gsol/ /dge bsngo sdom pa byul ba dang / /sbyin pa bla ma dran dang chos/ /dam tshig rnam pa bco lnga 'di/ /nyin re thebs re ma byas na/ /zhag gsum 'das na bum dbang gi/ /dam tshig nyams pas bshags par bya/ /de yang

brgya pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas te phyis ni mi nyams bya/ /gsang ba'i dbang thob rnal 'byor pas/ /mi 'chi lnga dang sgron ma lnga/ /rlung dang lta stangs 'khrul 'khor dang / /tshogs dang gtor ma brtul zhugs dang / /glu dang gar dang ni raM shu/ /dam tshig rnam pa bcu gcig po/ /

zla ba phyed du bral gyur na/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig nyams par gsungs/ /nyams na tshogs 'khor sbyin sreg bya/ /gsum pa'i dbang thob rnal 'byor bas/ /bde ba thig le rtsa gnas dang / /mi 'dzag bde ba skad cig dang / /phyag rgya ma dang sbyor ba dang / /zla ba gcig bral

nyams par gsungs/ /dbang dang sbyin sreg bshags pa bya/ /bzhi pa'i dbang thob rnal 'byor pa/ /spang blang rtsol dang dngos dang zhen/ /skad cig skyes kyang nyams pas na/ /mi dmigs bde chen spros bral gzhag /dbang bzhi spyi yi dam tshig ni/ /rgya mtsho'i dkyil du

gzings mi bshig /btsan dug gar ma bza' mi bya/ /'thab khang rtse nas dbab mi bya/ /za ma tog tu sbrul mi gzhug /pad+ma sad kyis bsad mi bya/ /g.yos legs gzhan la drang mi bya/ /de drug rdo rje dmyal ba'i rgyu/ /rgyal khrims bshig par mi bya zhing / /chung ma nyams par

mi bya'o/ /pha ma btsongs nas rin mi bza'/ /me mdag 'gam par mi bya'o/ /'di bzhi ngan song gsum gyi rgyu/ /spu gri'i sbrang rtsi bldag mi bya/ /g.yos 'gyed bza' ru phyog mi bya/ /sman zos mi gseb skyug mi bya/ /ri rab rtse nas [(]brnyil [,]bsnyil [)]mi bya/ /gnyen la snying ring mi bya'o/ /de lta

sems can dmyal ba'i rgyu/ /ma bu 'bral ba'i las mi bya/ /gdung sems thag pa rgyun mi gcad/ /chu zla bden par gzung mi bya/ /sbrang rtsi'i ro la chags mi bya/ /'di bzhi khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /dug chu khol mar lus mi bkru/ /rtsi dug sbyar ba'i dug mi bldag /rdza snod

seng ge'i zho mi bzho/ /chang rdza'i them bu gtang mi bya/ /de bzhi byol song phag gi rgyu/ /'dir yang tshe thung dngos grub 'gyang / /mthon po'i kha nas ldang mi bya/ /chags mi gseb bcag mi bya'o/ /ga zha gzhan la brjod mi bya/ /lam du tsher ma dgram mi bya/ /'di ni rang ngan sgrub pa'i

rgyu/ /lce thog zas zhim bskyur mi bya/ /mdzod phugs dgra la bstan mi bya/ /rkun nor gzhan la bstan mi bya/ /ser ra'i ro tshogs mi bya zhing / /mi la nga ba mi shes min/ /khyi rgod pang du blang mi bya/ /'di drug dngos grub yal ba'i rgyu/ /lha khang dud pas mi bdug cing / /mchod rten

bshig par mi bya'o/ /'di gnyis dman pa'i byang chub rgyu/ /me long g.ya' yis mi bsgo zhing / /khab rtse gnyis pas bcom mi bya/ /'di gnyis bdud kyis 'khyer ba'i rgyu/ /dug gi phyag tshang mi bya zhing / /stag la zhum bu mi bya'o/ /'di gnyis mkha' 'gros za ba'i rgyu/ /nam

mkha' tshos kyis bsgyur mi bya/ /ri bong rwas phug 'jigs mi bya/ /'di gnyis 'khor bar sdod pa'i rgyu/ /myu gu than par bskur mi bya/ /lcug phran rtswa gug breg mi bya/ /'gro ba'i lam sna dgag mi bya/ /'di gsum ngan song bskyur ba'i rgyu/ /mchog la dman par gzung mi bya/ /

byams tshig khyad du gsad mi bya/ /dgos pa yal bar dor mi bya/ /'di gsum gtan gyi bar chod yin/ /bde la skur pa gdab mi bya/ /ma la ngan tshig smra mi bya/ /bu mo sring mo skyi mi bya/ /'di gsum mkha' 'gro 'khrug pa'i rgyu/ /las kyi cho ga 'di rnams las/ /'gal na rtsa

ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/ /ltung ba chen po byung gyur na/ /dbang rdzogs bdun dang sbyin sreg khri/ /tshogs 'khor brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni/ /'khor gsum yongs su dag pas bshags/ /ltung ba bzhi po byung gyur na/ /dbang bskur gcig dang sbyin sreg brgya/ /tshogs

'khor bdun dang mchod sbyin gcig /smre sngags drag pos bshags par bya/ /ltung ba chung ngu byung gyur na/ /lus la tshab ma smre bshags bya/ /maN+Dal gcig dbul bzod gsol bya/ /brgya pa bdun nam nyi shu gcig /bzlas pas de las ldang ba yin/ /ngag la rgyal dang smre bshags

bya/ /maN+Dal dbul zhing bzod gsol bya/ /brgya pa brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni/ /lnga bcu nyer gcig bdun dag dang / /lan cig brjod pas 'dag par gsungs/ /yid la 'gyod dang maN+Dal dang / /brgya pa gong bzhin bzlas pas 'dag /kun gyi kha skong gtor ma dang / /maN+Dal bdun

po rnam dag shis/ /brgya pa rtag tu bzlas par bya/ /yan lag dam tshig ces bya ba/ /sngags med btsan dug bza' mi bya/ /rtsi med ri mo bkru mi bya/ /stobs med ral kha sprad mi bya/ /tshod med zhal che bcad mi bya/ /dpung med skyel ma mi bya ste/ /rgyus med sa mkhan mi bya'o/ /yang

rtsal med par mchong mi bya/ /dga' ba'i sa ru shags 'gyed min/ /bye ma'i ri la mkhar mi brtsig /rgya mtsho'i gling du yul mi gzung / /tsan+dan nags la me mi gzhug /me tog ldum sar sad mi bsad/ /rgyal pos 'bangs kyi g.yog mi bya/ /rang gi las la g.yo mi bya/ /rgyal po btsun

mo brdeg mi bya/ /'dod la mi ster spang bar bya/ /mi 'dod ster ba spang bar bya/ /lcags sgrog bcing bar mi bya'o/ /byis pa rnams dang 'dris mi bya/ /mgyogs po 'gran bang mi bya'o/ /g.yang lug rtag tu 'go mi bya/ /stan la 'dug pa spang bar bya/ /mtshon cha'i snod kha dam

par bya/ /rtag tu mda' ni bsrang bya zhing / /rtag tu gzhu ni bdung bar bya/ /rtag tu phub gzugs bya ra bya/ /mkhar dpe stod kyin 'obs btsang bya/ /shi ba'i ro la yang yang brtag /rang gi srog zon dus drug bya/ /mdor na de la sogs pa yi/ /dam tshig dpag tu med mod

kyang / /rang sems drang por bsrang byas te/ /rtag tu bla ma dran byed cing / /sgo gsum tha mal ma lus na/ /dam tshig sdom pa thams cad ni/ /gdon mi za bar bsrung bar nges/ /bag yangs chen po ci bder spyod/ /dam tshig dang sdom pa'i rnam par bshad pa rdo rje theg pa'i

rtsa ba'i las kyi cho ga /rnal 'byor gyi srog ces bya ba bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a b+h+ya ka ra gup+ta dang bod kyi lo tsA ba tsa mi sangs rgyas grags pas glen skad du bsgyur ba'o// //[ ]@##/ /zhen log sgron ma bzhugs/ / @##/ /mchod

gnas dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la 'jug thabs don 'di brtan par bya/ /gang zhig bdag gzhan sdug bsngal spang 'dod cing / /bde ba 'dod pas dam chos spyad par bya/ /mi rtag chos la bye brag bsam las 'das/ /ci phyir 'jig rten 'di

dag mi rtag ste/ /snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab lhun po dang / /gser gyi ri bdun rol mtsho chen po bdun/ /gling bzhi gling phran lcags ri mu khyud yang / /'jig pa'i dus na bskal pa'i me byung bas / /thal ba'i lhag ma tsam yang mi lus te/ /tha mar chu dang rlung gis 'jig pas

na/ /brtan zhing nges pa 'dra ste brtag mi bzod/ /lo zla tshes grangs shol ni mi thebs pas/ /lo zla 'das zhing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye/ /dus bzhi 'khor ba sdod pa med pas ni/ /dbyar dro skye la dgun grang skam pa dang / /lo legs lo nyes than zhod nges pa med/ /rtsi thog ljon

shing lo 'dab rgyas pa 'dra/ /dus kyi drod bral rlung gis mi rtag go/ /rtag pa lags na ci phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro/ /de la sogs pa mi rtag dgongs nas gda'/ /bcud kyi 'jig rten 'di yang mi rtag ste/ /nyin zhag 'das shing shi dang phar phar nye/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gsum

gyis rtag tu 'khor/ /skye rga na 'chi rang thag ri mo 'dra/ /'chi bdag bdud ni so bya nya sdod 'dra/ /'jig rten 'di na che chung phyug dbul kun/ /'chi bdag bdud kyi lag tu mi 'gro med/ /snga ma shi ba'i mi rnams kun gyis kyang / /rtag tu re zhing bu dang nor bsags kyang / /rang ni

dge sdig gnyis dang 'grogs te 'gro/ /bu nor phyir lus bdag la phan med pas/ /de phyir bu nor zas la chags mi bya/ /yod pas dge ba'i las la mi 'bad na/ /de ni 'jig rten 'di yi gter bsrung yin/ /shes pas dam pa'i chos la mi spyod na/ /

rtag pas gcam bu don med glen pa yin/ /de bas nor med dbul lo bsnyen dga' dang / /bram ze ldan pa phul ba dag la spyod/ / 'jig rten 'di yi pha ma bu tsha dang / /phu nu mdza' bshes bran khol nor rnams kun/ /sdug bsngal skal len 'ga' yi mi 'ong ste/ /'chi ba'i

phyir ni gcig kyang mi 'ong ngo / /don de ma rig sems can mang po kun/ /tshe 'di'i 'khor ba'i nye bshes ched dag tu/ /sdig pa'i bye brag rnam pa mang po spyod/ /phan med rang ni ngan song gsum du ltung / /de tshe 'gyod kyang phan med nyon mongs snon/ /tshe 'dir phrad pa'i las mthun nye

bzhi rnams/ /'gron po gnas mthun tsam ste so sor 'gro/ /sdig dang bsdos nas zas dang nor bsags kyang / /sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag gis khur/ /bsags pa'i nor ni phyir lus bu tshas khyer/ /sbrang bus 'bad de sbrang rtsi bsags pa 'dra/ /de bas longs spyod med

cing dbul ba yang / /rgyu 'bras mi slu chos la yid ches pa/ /mos pas dge ba dad pa'i yon phul nas/ /dge slong gser 'byig lta bur gyur pa yod/ /de phyir 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang du blang / /dad dang tshul khrims gtong dang thos pa dang / / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod

shes rab ni/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun lags par thub pas gsungs/ /dper na nor gyi nang na chog shes pa/ /rab mchog lags par lha mi'i ston pas gsungs/ /kun du chog shes mdzad cing chog mkhyen na/ /nor mi bdog kyang yang dag 'byor par 'gyur/ /bdag la shin

tu phangs pa'i lus 'di yang / /gos rnying lam du bor ba bzhin du 'gro/ /da lta sa stengs 'di na gnas pa kun/ /lo brgya tshun chad gcig kyang mi lus so/ /brgya thub 'bum la gcig kyang mi 'byung na/ /brgya la srid kyang phal cher yengs 'gyur te/ /mtshan mo nyal bas brgya phyed

gnyid dbang du/ /song ste de la dran med shi dang 'dra/ /lhag ma lnga bcu yod du zad kyang ni/ /ra ro nyal dang 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen/ /lnga bcu phyed ni der yang zad pas ni/ /legs par dran pa nyi shu rtsa lnga yod/ /de yang rang la dbang byar ma mchis te/ /de ring do nub 'chi 'am

gtol med kyi/ /da lta nyid du brtun te 'bad la bya'o/ /tshe 'di zil pa 'dra ste med la khad/ /dbugs ni na bun 'dra ste yal la khad/ /lus ni sgyu ma 'dra ste snang la med/ /sems ni glog dang 'dra ste skad cig ma/ /phung po mi rtag 'chi zhing 'gyur ba ste/ /dar ba'i mdog ni nyon

mongs nad kyis 'phrog /'chi ba'i srog ni 'chi bdag bdud kyis 'phrog /dper na chu 'gram g.yang sa'i sdong po 'dra/ /ring por mi thogs bya khyi ngur pa dang / /srin bya 'ug pa bya rgod khwa steg dang / /khyi ltogs wa dang 'bu sbrang gzan du 'gyur/ /de bzhin sgyu ma mi rtag mi rtogs

par/ /phung po 'di yi ched du sdig spyod pa/ /ma rig glen pa nyon mongs snying re rje/ /zas nor 'brel pa'i longs spyod 'ja' tshon 'dra/ /rmi lam longs spyod rnyed dang mtshungs pa ste/ /de ltar 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pas/ /dam pa'i chos la myur du 'bad par bya'o/ /de bas 'phags

pa'i gzugs brnyan mchod gnas la/ /mos pa'i dad pas dge la brtson pa ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i dpe/ /rgyal po gsal thub lta bur gyur pa'o/ /de phyir mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya/ /cis te mi lus thob pa shin tu dka'/ /khom ldan mi lus thob par gyur pa

na/ /phyi ma'i phan pa 'di la ma bsgrubs na/ /phyis ni mtho ris thob par ga la 'gyur/ /ngan song skyes nas sdug bsngal 'byung ba'i tshe/ /tshe 'di'i btsan phyug bde skyid ci la phan/ /snga mar ci spyad dran pas shin tu sdug /de phyir 'khor ba'i chos la ma yengs par/ /zhe sdang chen po me ltar

'bar ba la/ /snying rje chen po'i chu yis myur du sod/ /'dod chags ser sna'i mdud pa dam po de/ /chags med sbyin pa chen po'i sems kyis khrol/ /gti mug mun pa chen po 'thibs pa de/ /shes rab gsal ba'i sgron me chen po theg /nyon mongs kun la gnyen po bcug nas ni/ /

'khor ba'i chu bo chen po bzhi rnams la/ /brtson 'grus gru bcugs nas ni rgal bar bya/ /do cig yod pas sang phod yod pa bzhin/ /tshe 'di yod pas phyi ma yod par nges/ /sang phod lo dang sku tshe slad ma ni/ /gang sngar 'ong ba su la'ang gtol med pas/ /sang phod don

du so nam 'bad pa bzhin/ /phyi ma'i don du dam chos spyad par rigs/ /de ring do nub kho na mi 'chi zhes/ /bag med bde bar 'dug pa rigs ma yin/ /tshe 'di mi sdod ri gzar chu dang 'dra/ /ring por mi rtag rtswa kha'i zil pa 'dra/ /yang na skye shi chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /'khor bar skye ba

shing rta'i 'khor lo 'dra/ /de bas rang gi lus la ma chags par/ /skyabs kyi sbyin pas 'gro la phan btags na/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur ba'i dpe/ /rgyal po shi byin lta bur gyur pa'ang yod/ /mi yi chos lugs legs par spyad pas na/ /mtho ris lha yul bgrod pa thag

mi ring / /mtho ris thar pa'i go 'phang gang yin pa/ /'jog na thar pa gam na 'dug pas na/ /de bas mi dge bcu spang dge bcu spyod/ /grags pa nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos drug spong / /dge la mi skur sdig la mi bstod de/ /'bras bu gang spyad de dang mnyam par gsungs/ /ngan

song sdug bsngal shes kyang mi 'jigs par/ /mi rtag lus la chags nas sdig spyod pa/ /e ma'o rang gis rang rlag snying re rje/ /yi dgas byol song sdug bsngal skyi re bung / /dmyal khams bco brgyad sdug bsngal ya re cha/ /skye rga na 'chi'i sdug bsngal rgyun re ring / /phung po sgyu ma zas

nor bsnyen ma yin/ /'khrul pa'i gnyen bshes 'khor ba'i bshal thag pas/ /de ring rang dbang yod pa'i mi rnams kyis/ /rang dang 'brel pa'i zas nor gnyen bshes la/ /ser snas mi bcing chags sems mi skyed do/ /sems can rtsal shugs med la skur mi bya/ /chang ni ha la'i dug

bzhin rab tu bsrung / /gzhan gyi bud med dag la chags mi bya/ /rnam smin med pa'i so nam mi bor zhing / /gzhan gyi nor la brtsi bdag chom rkun spang / /don du lus ngag yid gsum spyod pa gzab/ /mdor na mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga/ /lci bzhi log brgyad kha na ma tho gsum/ /'di

spyod ngan song gsum du gdon mi za/ /mi rigs sdig pa sngon du spyod pa las/ /'gyod pa drag po sems ni bskyed nas su/ /sdig pa 'phro bcad dge ba spyod pa ni/ /'bras bu mtho ris thob par gdon mi za/ /de yang cis mngon ston pa'i bka' las ni/ /dang po rgyal po ma skyes

dgra yis su/ /mtshams med pa yi sdig pa byas pa las/ /nags kyi drang srong dag las sems bskyed nas/ /'gyod pa'i sems kyis 'bras bu thob pa 'dra'o/ /de phyir nges pa 'phral bshags dge la sbyor/ /gzhan yang dang po kha na ma tho ba'i/ /tshig gis skur ba btab ste smad pa las/ /

mod la 'gyod de bshags pa phul na ni/ /bu mo rdo rje lta bur skyes pa'o/ /mdor na gzhan don spyod par gsungs pa ste/ /bdag phyir gzhan la gnod byas bde bar 'gyur/ /ma rig skye bo rang gi don byed dang / /ston pa sangs rgyas gzhan gyi don byed gnyis/ /'bras bu che chung khyad par de 'dra

bas/ /sems can bkres pas nyen par gyur pa la / /zas nor lus kyi sgo nas phan 'dogs pa/ /rgyal po shud lo gar ne lta bu de / /gzhan don spyad na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /'di dag shes nas dge med sdig spyod pa/ /mi shes sdig spyod sdig pa brgya 'gyur che/ /de bas don med

las la ma brtson par/ /dge ba'i las la rtag tu spyad par bya/ /rgyu 'bras shes rkyen dge ba'i bshes gnyen pas/ /de phyir dge bshes dam pa btsal bar bya/ /de ni legs pa kun ston nyes pa skyob/ /yang dag lam ston 'bras bu skyed byed pas/ /pha ma sa mkhan dus kyi dbyar dang 'dra'o/ /

de phyir dge bshes dam pa rtag tu bsten/ /chos kyang shes pas mi chog spyad pa gces/ /ci yi phyir na mi chos so nam 'dra/ /chos kyis bdag bshad bdag gis chos ma bshad/ /don rtogs bya phyir dang po mnyan yang dgos/ /nges pa rnyed nas tshig mang bslab mi dgos/ /tshig mi zad

phyir nyan pas mthar thug med/ /nyan cing 'chad pa spyad thabs btsal phyir yin/ /mi spyod nyan 'chad don chung tshi re chad/ /gzhan la 'chad pa tshig gi than pa yin/ /gzhan gyi than 'byal rang la mi phan te / /bro mkhan sgrung mkhan bro sgrung 'chad pa 'dra/ /de ni mi nag chos kyi lo rgyus

mkhan/ /thos pas brgyags nas rang sems ma thul na/ /mkhas kyang phan med slar la 'khor ba'i rgyu/ /thos mang tshig la mkhas pa ne tso 'dra/ /'gro ba gang zhig rang la med pa yi/ /nor bu rin po che yi yon tan dag /ji snyed brjod kyang rang la phan med 'gyur/ /de bzhin

chos shes chos dang mi ldan pas/ /spyad thabs che ba'i yon tan ji snyed cig /brjod kyang rang gi don la phan med 'gyur/ /gzhan yang shes nas dam chos ma spyad na/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du skom nas shi ba 'dra/ /gzhan yang khe phyir gzhan la chos 'chad pa/ /rin chen rnyed kyang sprang po 'dra zhes

gsungs/ /dper na sman mkhan nad la mi gtong dang / /dbul mos phyug po'i nor bgrangs ba dang 'dra/ /lam rgyus shes kyang ma phyin 'dra zhes gsungs/ /de bas 'gro ba kun kyang chos la gzud/ /pha ma bu tsha gnyen 'dun thams cad dang / /'khor g.yog las kyis 'brel pa

thams cad kun/ /gros btab gal gyis gcu de dge la gzud/ /chos la chud na byang chub spyod pa yin/ /dge ba nyam chung sdig pa stobs chen dang / /bla med byang chub sems ni ma bskyed par/ /dge ba gzhan gyi zil gyis mi non pas/ /'khor ba'i btson ra bsdams shing nyam

thag pa'i/ /bdag gzhan mi bde bsal bar 'dod pa des/ /byang chub sems gnyis rtag tu gtang mi bya/ /sdig med dge ba'i sems dang ldan de la/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi sras su dgongs pa dang / /lha mir 'god pa kun gyis phyag bya'i 'os/ /mdor na byang chub rnam pa gsum dgos

te/ /dang por smon dgos bar du 'jug kyang dgos/ /tha mar don de nyid la gnas par bya/ /smon kyang ma zhugs don la ma gnas na/ /yid smon byas pas 'bras bu mi thob pas/ /byang chub spyod pa rlabs chen spyad par bya/ /rgyu ni dka' ba dang du ma blangs par/ /'bras bu byang chub thob

par mi 'gyur te/ /gang la sbyin pa mchog tu gtang dka' ba/ /yan lag kun gyi dang po mgo bo yin/ /sbyin par btang ba rgyal po zla 'od yin/ /de bzhin spyad na byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir 'khor ba'i chos 'di gtan du spang / /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par bya/ /sbyin

pa'i pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /sa ni dang po rab tu dga' ba thob/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i sa yang thob/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /gsum pa 'od byed pa yi sa yang thob/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yongs

rdzogs na/ /bzhi pa 'od 'phro ba yi sa yang thob/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /lnga pa shin tu sbyang dka'i sa yang thob/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /drug pa mngon du gyur pa'i sa yang thob/ /thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /bdun pa

ring du song ba'i sa yang thob/ /smon lam pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /brgyad pa mi g.yo ba yi sa yang thob/ /stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros sa yang thob/ /ye shes pha rol phyin pa yongs rdzogs na/ /bcu pa chos kyi sprin gyi sa yang thob/ /

'bras bu sku gsum lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs rnams kyis su/ /byang chub mchog tu thugs ni bskyed pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po che/ /rim par gnas nas 'bras bu thob pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag dang gzhan la phan don du/ /

sems bskyed nas ni dge ba gzhung du spyod/ /de ltar dam chos gzhung du spyad pa na/ /nyon mongs 'chi bdag bdud ni 'joms pa yi/ /bdud rtsi mchog nyid kyang ni de yin no/ /de phyir dam chos gzhung bzhin spyad par bya/ /chos gzhung mi spyod chos pa'i ming ci yod/ /tshul khrims mi

srung dge slong ci la zer/ /dam tshig med na sngags pa gang la zer/ /sdig ni chung yang mi brnyas spang bar bya/ /dge ba chung yang dang du blang bar bya/ /mdor na tshad med bzhi dang bsdu ba bzhi/ /gzhan don spyad na bdag don chung mi za/ /de phyir sgrib gnyis spongs la tshogs gnyis

bsgrub/ /ston pa'i bka' dang don du mthun byed cing / /chags med dge bar gtong ba'i gang zag ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can yin pas na/ /de la phrag dog dbang gis sgro skur zhing / /thabs kyis smod byed 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung / /dge ba'i sngon la zhugs pa'i gang

zag gis/ /nyon mongs 'du 'dzi med pa'i dge gnas na/ /mtshan mo stod smad dge la gnas nas ni/ /gung la nyal tshe dge dran 'phro la nyal/ /de yis bag chags dge la gnas par 'gyur/ /bag chags rtag par gnas na dang po'i drod/ /yin pas dge ba

nyams 'og chud de bya/ /zas kyang chags phyir ma yin brgyags phyir min/ /dge rtag bya phyir tshod ni zin par bza'/ /rgod dang 'gyod dang gnod sems rmugs pa dang / /gnyid dang 'dod la 'dun dang the tshom ste/ /sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag dge ba'i nor/ /'phrog pa'i chom rkun

lags pas rig par mdzod/ /ston pa'i bka' la brdzun pa mi mnga' bas/ /the tshom nem nur yid gnyis mi bya'o/ /don la spyad cing tshig phyir mi 'brangs te / /don ni gser 'dra tshig ni sgron ma bzhin/ /gser rnyed nas ni sgron ma gdeg mi dgos/ /don la spyad cing bsgoms na rang

rig skye/ /tshig phyir nyan cing 'chad pa mang byas kyang / /rang rig mi skye nyon mongs 'phel ba'i rgyu/ /mdor na theg pa kun la blo sbyangs te/ /nges pa gcig la zhugs te mi sgrub par/ /ye rngam zos nas byang chub 'khrul pa ste/ /des ni 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /chos kyang

rang gi nyams dang dpyad cing spyad/ /'bras bu gong ma che la gtang byas na/ /nyams kyis mi lcogs bzhin du khas len pa/ /thang stong sdig pa rang gis blangs pa yin/ /theg pa'i grangs ni gcig tu ma nges la/ /theg pa'i khyad par shes rab che chung ste/ /nyams 'og chud par spyad na

chud mi za/ /dam chos gzhung du spyod pa'i mi de la/ /dam can kun yang ma bskul rang bzhin 'go/ /mkhas pa chen po'i mthu ni nyi shar 'dra/ /'gro ba kun kyang dad cing 'dun pas na/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi dge ba la/ /thun mong dag tu spang len med par bya/ /spang len

byas na ston pa'i bka' dang 'gal/ /theg chen sgor zhugs gang zag rnams kyis kyang / /shes rab snying rje gnyis kyis gzhi bzung ste/ /thams cad dbyer med rtogs pa shes rab yin/ /kun la bu bzhin byams pa snying rje yin/ /de gnyis mi ldan theg chen khas 'che ba/ /long

sprang rgyal po yin zhes zer te brdzun/ /da lta'i gang zag sngags kyi sgor zhugs pas/ /gsang sngags zab mo nor rdzas brnyan mar btsongs/ /'khor ba'i bu tsha pho mo khyim thab byed/ /gsang sngags shes pas bdag phung snying re rje/ /des ni tsan+dan sol bar 'tshod ba dang / /gser

phye sbang phyer 'tshong dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /gzhan yang dad pa can gyi nor blangs nas/ /dge bar ma spyad mi chos nor du spyad/ /'bras bu dag ni rnga mo'i lus su skye/ /de yi nor la nor bdag longs spyod bya/ /spyod res sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /lcags rdo dngul

rdo bzhu ru btub pas na/ /dad pa can gyi nor ni bzhur mi btub/ /tshig tsam ma yin sems kyis mnyam pa nyid/ /rtogs nas klong du gyur cing drod ldan dang / /chags med dge bar spyod pa'i gang zag gis/ /ma byin blangs nas spyad kyang mi sgrib bo/ /mdor na sngags kyi rtsa ba

dam tshig bsrung / /bya ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig bstan pa ni/ /thun mong bslab pa bzhi po nyams mi bya/ /bla med rnam gsum mchod cing bla ma bkur/ /grogs la gdung zhing mi mthun kha zas spang / /mtshan mar byas shing lha la phul ba yi / /khrus la brtson pa bskyed cing lus spyod bzang / /

ma nyams bsrungs na rigs gsum dngos grub thob/ /rnal 'byor phyi pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ni/ /spyi yi dam tshig gsum po nyams mi bya/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig drug ni gzhung du bsrung / /yan lag dam tshig gsum dang ldan par bya/ /ma nyams bsrungs na 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /

rnal 'byor nang pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ni/ /dam tshig bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab kyang / /mdo ru bsdu na rtsa ba gsum du 'dus/ /lus srog bskyed pa'i dus gsum pha ma dang / /ma rig sgo 'byed 'dren ston slob dpon dang / /dam pas 'brel pa'i grogs mched rnams la ni/ /lus

ngag yid gsum don dang mthun par bsrung / /yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin g.yang mi bya/ /de yi sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad / /dam tshig nyams dang ma 'dres snod med la/ /gsang ba'i man ngag spel bar mi bya'o/ /da lta gang zag sngags par khas 'ches nas/ /sku yi dam tshig

gzhung du mi srung bar/ /pha ma spong brdung bla ma smod mi khur / /phrag dog dbang gis grogs la brtse gdung bcad / /ngan song gnas su the tshom med par 'gro/ /gsung gi dam tshig gzhung du mi srung bar/ /ting 'dzin 'dod sgrub 'dzab tu mna' 'cha' zhing / /phyag rgya

ma byin zas nor len byed pa'i/ /sngags par khas 'ches 'khor ba'i g.yang sar lhung / /gsang sngags zab mo dgon par ma spyod par/ /snod dang mi ldan nyan mi rnyed thad la/ /beg co bcas nas man ngag lhug par bshad/ /thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pas dmyal bar skye/ /

gsang sngags gab pa'i don rnams ma rtogs par/ /dam med mi nag khral theg kun bsdus nas/ /sbas pa'i gsang ba mngon sum 'chol bar spyod/ /bka' dang 'gal bas 'khor ba'i g.yang sar ltung / /dang por dam tshig gzhung du mi srung dang / /bar du dbang rnams rim par

mi nod dang / /tha mar bka' gzhung bzhin du mi sgrub par/ /sngags par khas 'che gang zag snying re rje/ /bza' shing ra bar dug gi sdong skyes nas/ /dug des bza' shing byin yang med byed pas/ /bdag pos dug de ngo ni shes ma thag /rtsa nas phyung ste myur du med byed ltar/ /gang

zhig rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dang / /'dres nyams 'gyur ba nyes pa 'phel 'gyur bas/ /don rig nas ni myur du spang bar bya/ /dper na 'o ma nyung ngu'i thigs pa gcig /rul bas 'o ma kun kyang rul ba bzhin/ /dam nyams snod ngan de dang 'dres pa na/ /nyams pa de dang de ni

'dra bar gsungs/ /de bas lung gcig chu la'ang mi btung ngo / /dam tshig sa gzhi 'dra ste kun gyi rten/ /dam tshig nor bu 'dra ste 'dod pa 'byung / /dam tshig mkhar dang 'dra ste 'jigs pa skyobs / /dam tshig gru dang 'dra ste chu bo sgrol/ /mdor na chos kyi rtsa ba dam tshig bsrung / /phyi

rabs rnal 'byor rnams kyi sems la 'jog /rnam smin gzhan ni khad dang rim gyis smin/ /gsang sngags thun mong ma yin rnam smin drag /sgyu mar sbrul zhugs bzhin du 'gro ba'o zhes/ /gsang ba'i rgyud rnams kun las gsal bar 'byung / /gang zag sngags par khas len rnams

kyis ni/ /rang gzhan ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gsum/ /dam tshig dbang dang mchod pa'i sgor zhugs nas/ /rang nyid zab mo'i don dang ldan par bya/ /theg pa 'og ma'i sgor zhugs bsrung sdom dang / /chos spyod byed pa mi dgag mi smod do/ /ci phyir chos la spang len

phyogs ris dang / /bzang ngan gnyis su stan pas ma gsungs bas/ /'di ltar snang ba'i chos 'di thams cad la/ /gnyis med mnyam pa chen por rtogs pa ni/ /'bad rtsol ci byas dge bar gyur pas na/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba phyogs ris med par bya'o/ /da lta'i gang zag theg pa 'og

ma pa'i/ /rgyu 'bras don la zhen pa kha cig ni/ /gsang sngags zab mo'i don rnams ma rtogs par/ /sngags kyi tan gan chos spyod 'phrigs mthong nas / /ban de log chos spyod cing rtsing chos byed/ /gsang sngags chos min ston pas ma gsungs zer/ /man ngag zab mo'i don la skur

btab pas/ /'bras bu mnar med dmyal ba'i yang steng du/ /skye bar gyur pas rmongs pa snying re rje/ /ston pa'i zhal nas nges par gsungs pa yi/ /man ngag don dam gsang sngags zab mo la/ /bka' bslad gzhung bzhin dang du mi len par/ /mtshan nyid chos spyod dag la blo zhen pas/ /

bskal pa gsum du sangs rgyas zhal mi mthong / /skal ba chung zhing shes rab zhen pa dang / /blo ngan don la rmongs pa'i gang zag gis/ /zab mo'i don la ma zhugs skur pa btab/ /rnam smin dpag gis mi lang brjod las 'das/ /gsang sngags zab mo'i don la yid ches nas/ /

lta spyod dam tshig gzhung du ldan pa dang / /sgrub la shin tu brtson pa'i gang zag ni/ /sangs rgyas sa la the tshom med par 'gro/ /skye bo ma rig chos la gzud pa dang / /chos pa chos dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi/ /don du bdag gis yi ge 'di brtsams pas/ /kun kyang dad cing don la

'jug par smon/ /zhen log sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi sgrub thabs/ @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA rA dza bai shra ba Na sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi sgrub thabs/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /nor gyi dbang phyug rin chen gter mnga' ba/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi nor 'chang kun gyi rje/ /byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal po rnam thos sras/ /dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad la phyag 'tshal te/ /ngal bso dge ba stobs po che/ /sgom zhing seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /

phyag gnyis be con ne'u le bsnams/ /de sgrub cho ga bshad par bya/ /ga bur la sogs lci ba yis/ /sngags brjod sa gzhi legs par byug /tshom bu dgur ni me tog dgod/ /dam tshig bdun dang ldan pa yis/ /rgyal po'i rten gsum gzugs par bya/ /bdag nyid cho ga

rdzogs byas la/ /sngags brgya bcu pa gsum bzlas pas/ /phyogs mtshams kun du bsang gtor bya/ /snying gar sa bon bsams pa las/ /byang phyogs 'od zer rab spros te/ /gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum gyi gtso/ /rgyal po rnam thos spyan drangs te/ /mdun du legs par bzhugs

par bsam /de la bsang gtor nas brtsams te/ /rgyal po 'khor bcas legs par mchod/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de la mchod pa'i yi ge la/ /yi ge gsum dang ldan pa yis/ /so sor legs par sbyar te dbul/ /spyi gtsug shog ma snying ga yi/ /oM AHhUM

gi 'od zer gyis/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /'od zhu stong pa'i rang bzhin bya/ /de nas mdun du zlo las ni/ /rin chen khang pa brtsegs mar bsgom/ /zur bzhi rim gsum khang brtsegs pa/ /dbus ma'i pho brang sum brtsegs te/ /rtse mo rin chen nor bus brgyan/ /dra ba dra ba

phyed pas bskor/ /shar phyogs shel dang bai DUr+ya/ /pad+ma rA ga gser gyi ni/ /ka ba stong phrag bcu yis brgyan/ /de yi phyi rol phyogs mtshams su/ /bum pa bzang po dpag bsam shing / /rin chen rdzing bu 'dod 'jo ba/ /brgyad brgyad lnga yis rab tu mdzes/ /rin chen 'bar bas

yongs su bskor/ /dbus su sa bon yi ge las/ /'od zer sna tshogs rab 'phros nas/ /don byas slar 'dus bai la thim/ /de las rgyal chen 'khor bcas rdzogs/ /rin chen pho brang dam pa dang / /mi 'jigs seng ge'i gdan steng na/ /bai las byung ba'i mgon po ni/ /ngal bso

dge ba stobs po che/ /g.yas na rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon na gter kyi ne+e'u le bsnams/ /sku ni gser gyi 'od pas mjes/ /zhal nas rin chen char pa 'bebs/ /thugs rjes phongs pa las sgrol mdzad/ /sku la rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /phrag gong g.yas

g.yon nyi zlas brgyan/ /nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi mdangs can/ /dbu la rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /gnod sbyin bye ba'i 'khor rnams dang / /nam mkha'i sprin tshogs bzhin du bsam/ /nam mkha' mdzod la mnga' brnyes pa/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /de nas rgyal

po spyan drangs te/ /mgon po kun gshegs dam tshig can/ /da lta snyigs ma lnga yi dus/ /mtshams med lnga ni kun spyod cing / /thams cad nyon mongs 'dam bying sar/ /gzigs shing gshegs pa'i gnas ngan yang / /shAkya seng ge'i spyan sngar khyod/ /thugs dam gang

bzhes de dgongs la/ /'dren pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang / /sems can kun la sman slad du/ /byang phyogs gnas na bzhugs pa rnams/ /sems can don phyir gshegs su gsol/ /phyag na rdo rje thugs gnas pa'i/ /hUM las spros pa'i 'od rnams kyis/ /rang bzhin rgyal po

rnam thos sras/ /gnod sbyin 'bum bcas bkug nas ni/ /nor bu'i gong khyer de dbus su/ /mdun gnas rgyal po de la bzhugs/ /rin chen dbang bskur byin brlabs nas/ /de nas bsang gtor nas brtsams te/ /rin chen bdun dang bkra shis brgyad/ /'dod pa'i

yon tan lnga yis mchod/ /gu gul dud pa dbul zhing bstod/ /de nas thugs ka'i zla ba la/ /sa bon sngags kyis yongs bskor te/ /lce la rdo rje sbu gur bsam/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa spro bsdu ni/ /so so'i thugs kar dmigs la bzlas/ /tar+ya thA/ oM hi li ma Ni b+ha dra/ hi li hi

li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ ku ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/tu ru tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ oM e h+ye hi hiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha a ba ta ra tiSh+Tha a ba ta ra tiSh+Tha me tsa ya/ tar+ya thA/ bud+ha

ni su te ne+e/ su ra me ne+e/ su pa de re/ su su sh+ye/ hi li mi li swA hA/ hUM bai shra ba Na ye swA hA/ 'di brjod bsnyen pa 'bum phrag bcu/ /zla ba yar ngo'i bco lnga la/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor byas/ /der ni rgyal po la dmigs nas/ /a ka ru bsregs sngags

bzlas bya/ /'dir ni brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan drug tu/ /rgyal po la dmigs sngags bzlas na/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyid/ /dpag tshad brgya ni tshun chad du/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis srung bar byed/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs shing / /kha na

ma tho med pa yi/ /zas dang skom dang bca' ba dang / /nor bu dbyig dang gser sprul bgyid/ /rin po che yi gter la sogs/ /bsod nams tshad med 'grub par 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub/ /de la sogs pa ma lus 'grub/ /ngal bar gyur na gshegs su

gsol/ /mchod bstod bzod par gsol ba dang / /dkar gtor btang la phrin las bcol/ /zlo la sogs pa'i snod bskyed la/ /khaM las zhal zas bskyed par bya/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+has+thA rde Ar+ya nut+pan+da tAta oM AHhUM/ sangs rgyas spyan gyis spel byas la/ /sngags rgyal

bcu gsum pa bzlas bya/ /hUM bai shra ba Na ye i rda ba li kr-it+nabye sa sam ya rak+Shan+tu ma ma se d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ ma ma sarba karma sA d+hu a mo g+ha swA hA/ so so'i sngags la btags la dbul/ /hUM byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes nas kyang / /

bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /bu sdug bzhin du bskyang bar mdzod/ /bdag la gnod par sems pa yi/ /log par zhugs pa'i sems can kun/ /de yi phru ma gzhom pa dang / /gtan nas brlag pa'i phrin las mdzod/ /bai yig sum cu rtsa gnyis bsring / /snying ga'i

lcags kyu bkrol la gshegs/ /oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub sprul/ /byang phyogs gnas su gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /dam tshig sems dpa' 'od zhu bya/ /rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan byas pa

la/ /rang bzhin rgyal po bkug la bstim/ /zhabs kyis mnan la dbang du bsdu/ /hU~M bai shra ba NAya a nu ra tsa ku ru hUM/ de ltar rdzogs par byas gyur na/ /rgyal po rnam thos sras bcas kyis/ /'dod pa thams cad skong bar byed/ /nam mkha' mdzod la mnga' brnyes 'gyur/ /
