slob dpon chen po 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i rnam thos sras kyi bde byed kyi brtag pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta te dza de ba dang bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA rA dza bi rU pa kA ya karma

kalpa sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi las brtag pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs gtso phyag na rdo rje yis/ /dngos su lung bstan byin brlabs pa'i/ /spyod mdzad chos kyi rdo rjes ni/ /grags 'dzin la sogs pha rol te/ /cho

gas bsad sogs las rnams ni/ /bla ma brgyud pa las byung ba'i/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po gtsor gyur pa'i/ /stong phrag brgyad dang gnyis lhag pa'i/ /de sgrub cho ga bshad par bya/ /dpal ldan khro rgyal rdo rje can/ /sngon 'gro rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /lha tshogs gdug pa gzhom

pa'i phyir/ /dang por cho ga la 'jug bya/ /ske tshe nyungs kar dug sna tshogs/ /bong bu'i chu dang sbangs sogs dang / /tsha dang gdug pa'i tsher sbangs chus/ /hUM brjod sa gzhi legs par byug /kho ra tsher ma can gyi shing / /nam phyed byang bltas me tog blang / /tshom bu dgur ni legs

par dgod/ /khrus byas bsrung ba bdun byas la/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bde stan la/ /byang du mngon phyogs 'jug par bya/ /de nyid rigs kyi me tog dang / /sna tshogs dug phye mi rus phye/ /legs par sbyar ba'i de bzhin spos/ /mi rkang las byung mar me dang / /sA lu dmar po sha

lnga sogs/ /gcig tu byas pa'i lha bshos dang / /mi dang bong bu'i dri chu dang / /rma bya'i sgro dang ku shar bcas/ /bsang gtor dri yi chu dang ldan/ /sngags rgyal bcu gsum pa bzlas bya/ /phyogs mtshams kun du bsang gtor bya/ /de nas bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa/ /gdong

bkrus nas brtsams sgrub thabs gzhung / /bdag nyid cho ga rdzogs byas la/ /yi ge bcu gsum bzlas pa ni/ /'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas byas la/ /snying gar yi ge bsams pa las/ /'od zer byang du rab 'phros te/ /gnod sbyin bye ba 'bum gyi

gtso/ /klu chen brgyad kyis bskor ba yi/ /rnam thos rgyal po spyan drangs te/ /mdun gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /rim pas legs par bzhugs par bsam/ /de la bsang gtor nas brtsams te/ /gong gi mchod pa'i rim pa yis/ /yi ge gsum dang ldan pa rnams/ /rgyal

po 'khor bcas legs par mchod/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de la mchod pa'i yi ge ni/ /so sor legs par sbyar te dbul/ /spyi gtsug lkog ma snying ga yi/ /yi ge gsum gyi 'od zer gyis/ /rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /'od zhu sa bon rang bzhin bya/ /

de la rang sngags bskor ba dmigs/ /'od kyis gdug pa bcom byas te/ /slar bsdu hUM sogs la thim nas/ /rgyal chen 'khor bcas yongs su rdzogs/ /klu rnams yi ge phuHlas bskyed/ /de nyid rgyal po chen po ste/ /sku mdog sngon po gzi brjid can/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag

gnyis pa/ /khro gnyer mche ba cung zhig gtsigs/ /cod pan sbrul mgo chun 'phyang lding / /phrag gong g.yas g.yon nyi zlas mtshan/ /nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can/ /seng ge la sogs 'jigs pas mtshan/ /sku las nam mkha' gang bar 'phro/ /g.yas na rdo rjes rab mtshan

pa'i/ /dbyug pa ba dan bcas pa 'dzin/ /g.yon pa phyag na sku gdung 'dzin/ /klu rnams gdug pa'i rang lus 'chang / /gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs rnams ni/ /nam mkha'i sprin tshogs bzhin du bsam/ /thugs ka'i sa bon las 'phros pa'i/ /'od kyis rgyal po rnam thos

sras/ /'khor dang bcas pa bkug nas ni/ /mdun gnas dkyil 'khor dag la bstim/ /de nas bsang gtor nas brtsams te/ /gong gi sngags kyis mchod pa dbul/ /gong gi gtor ma'i cho ga bzhin/ /legs par byin gyis brlabs nas ni/ /oM badzra bi ru rA ga /ku be

ra At+ma ka /ma hA yak+Sha rA dza/ aSh+Da nA ga bi ra bai ka sarba yak+Sha pa ri wA ra i daM ba liM gr-i hA n+tu/ sa ma ya rak+Sha n+tu/ ma ma sid+d+hiM phra ya ts+tsha/ ma ma sarba karma/ sA d+ha a mu ka mA ra ya hUM phaT sA hA/ yi ge bco lnga sngags la ni/ /btags te gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /de nas bdag nyid

bsrung bar bya/ /gser la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la/ /hUM ngam khroM gyi phyi rol du/ /yi ge bcu gsum bskor bar bya/ /nyungs kar dang bcas spyi bor gzhag /gla rtsi ba yi rnam lnga la/ /gos sngon can gyi sngags bzlas te/ /mgo lus khyab par byugs la bsrung / /de nas

rten 'brel sngags kyis ni/ /lus la go cha dgod par bya/ /spyi bo klog ma snying ga ru/ /kha dog gsum ldan yi ge bsam/ /so sor sngags kyis bskor bar bya/ /thugs kar zla ba la gnas hUM/ /de la sngags kyis yongs bskor te/ /lce la rdo rje sbu gu bsam/ /spro bsdu'i

sngags kyi bzlas pa ni/ /rgyal po'i thugs kar dmigs la bzlas/ /dal min myur ba ma yin dang / /gsal min mi gsal ma yin par/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas par bya/ /oM nI lA m+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni ma hA yak+Sha rA dza ku be ra bi ru rA ga sid+d+hi m+me phra ya ts+tsha hUM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di brjod

bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig /rdzogs nas rmi ltas 'byung ba ste/ /chu bo skams dang sbrul mthong ngam/ /sbra khyim nags la me mched mthong / /sog po srin pos bskor ba yi/ /dbus na gnas pa mthong ba'am/ /seng ge la sogs gcan gzan tshogs/ /mdun 'dus gus par mthong

ba na/ /de nas las sbyor brtsam par bya/ /gnas gsum thig le byas nas su/ /gong gi bsrung ba'i chog rnams/ /bsrungs te byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dur khrod rdo leb thog tu ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bris byas la/ /steng du dug dang lan tshwa dang / /khrag dang chu 'gram gnyis kyi

sa/ /rkang rjes sa la sogs pa la/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs sam gdug pa'i gzugs/ /rang gzugs mtshan nyid ldan par bya/ /dgug dang bcing ba la sogs pa'i/ /bsad pa'i cho ga byas nas ni/ /de la sbyin sreg brtsam par bya/ /me thab gru gsum thab khung la/ /zur

la khru re'i tshad yod de/ /zabs su khru phyed la sogs la/ /sbyin sreg cho gar gsungs pa bzhin/ /thab kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /de yi dbus su mchod rten ni/ /dur khrod tshon ni nag pos bris/ /de dbus rdo rje dbyug pa ni/ /ba dan rtse lngas mtshan par bya/ /

de yi phyi rol phyogs mtshams su/ /kha dog nag po sbrul brgyad bri/ /gzhan dag dkyil 'khor phyag mtshan rnams/ /sbyin sreg cho gar shes par bya/ /tsher ma dug shing khru gang la/ /dbus su zur gsum brtsig bya ste/ /mi skra'i skud pas bcing bya yis/ /tsher ma khru gang dbus

su gzhag /de nas mngon spyod rdzas rnams gzhag /sreg rdzas ling+ga gnyis su bya/ /dug dang khrag dang ske tshe dang / /yungs kar chu 'gram gnyis kyis/ /rkang rjes sa dang da du ra/ /bra'o sran ma mi rus phye/ /byang du mgo bstan shi ba'i skras/ /kun la bsreg pa byas nas ni/ /dug

shing tsher ma sor brgyad la/ /khrag dang dug chus sbags pa yi/ /de yi yam shing dbul bar bya/ /rus phye la sogs mchod pa rnams/ /gong du gsungs pa bzhin du bya/ /de nas me ni sbar bya ste/ /dbus su rgyal po chen po ni/ /klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs bskor ba'i/ /thams cad

rdzogs par bsam par bya/ /rang bzhin rgyal po bkug la bstim/ /sku stod khwa dang 'ug pa dang / /gcan gzan 'jigs tshogs spro bar bya/ /rked par gnod sbyin 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa spro/ /sku smad seng ge la sogs pa/ /gcan gzan

'jigs pa'i tshogs su spro/ /de dag gzugs kyis bsgrub bya dang / /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams bkug byas te/ /gong gi ling+gar bstim pa dang / /nam mkha' dum bur gtubs nas ni/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po'i zhal du dbul/ /dug dang khrag la sogs pa ni/ /bdun nam

nyi shu rtsa gcig bar/ /gong gi rdzas rnams dbul bar bya/ /oM badzra bi rur ka ku ba ra ma hA yak+Sha rA dza/ che ge mo a na la ha na sarba du Sh+TA na/ sarba b+ha smi ku ru che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ des ni sbyin sreg dbul bar bya/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag rgya yis/ /stong phrag gcig tu bsreg

par bya'o/ /thal ba lan tshwa ske tshe dang / /dug dang khrag gis sbrus nas ni/ /bsgrub bya'i gzugs ni khru gang tshad/ /legs par byas pa'i snying ga ru/ /'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa/ /'khor lo de yi lte bar ni/ /hUM gnyis bar du ming bkod de/ /de yi lte ba'i mu khyud la/ /yi

ge bcu gsum dgod par bya/ /phyi rol rtsibs ni bcu gnyis la/ /badzra bi rU ra ka ma hA yak+Sha ku be ra/ yi ge de la bsgrub bya dang / /gsad pa'i yi ge gdags par bya/ /mchod pa snying gar gdags par bya/ /dug la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis/ /gzugs la legs par byug par bya/ /

de yi steng du rdo leb la/ /rdo rje rgya gram bris nas ni/ /ling+ga'i snying gar gzhug par bya/ /de yi steng du mchod rten ni/ /sngon po khru gang tshad du brtsig /bum par rgyal po chen po yi/ /gsad pa'i sngags ni bris te gzhug /slob dpon chen po 'gro bzang snying pos mdzad pa'i rnam thos

sras kyi drag byed kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar dbus kyi paN+Di ta chen po te dza de ba dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ yak+Sha rA dza sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ /gnod sbyin rgyal po sgrub pa'i

thabs/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag ye shes dngos rang bzhin/ /skyob pa'i stobs chen la phyag 'tshal/ /bstan pa dam pa'i gnas 'chang ba'i/ /de yi dgos pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gnod sbyin kun bdag sgrub thabs bri/ /de la dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i

gnas su sdig bshags lan chags sbyang / de nas phan gnod gang gi las kyang grub cing bdag gir sgrub ste stegs bu khru gang ba la rin po che'i gzhal yas khang bris te/ de ru rgyal po sku dmar nag /g.yas pa na mdung dmar ram dbyug to/ /g.yon pa dbyig gi rkyal pa/ dbu cod

pan gyi dbus na rin po che yod pa/ seng ge dang sprin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i phreng bas phyag dang zhabs brgyan pa/ g.yas kyi dpung rgyan rin po che dang seng thod kyis brgyan pa'o/ /g.yas g.yon du dung rna/ bum rna/ rna gsum/ rna ba che/ ser ljang / dmar ljang / ljang

nag /dkar ljang gsus pa ldir ba mdung dmar dang / rgyal mtshan dang mdung dang dbyig to bcas pa dang ne'u le'o/ /mdun du yum rgyal po dang mthun pa la phyag g.yas pa bum pa/ zhabs brkyang bskum mo/ /de lta bu legs par bris pa bzhugs par bya'o/ /

de la dar ser po'am za 'og gi gdugs/ /dar dmar po'i yol ba/ dkar po'i rgyal mtshan/ ljang gu dang mthing ga'i ru mtshon bri bar bya'o/ /spos dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa dgram par bya'o/ /de nas dri dang ldan pa'i steng du mchod yon dang / me tog dang / spos dang / mar me

dang / dri chab dang / lha bshos dang / lha bshos khru gang ba gcig la smyug ma gtsang ma la rtse mo rtsi tra ka dang snying zho sha//de'i 'og tu chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan/ de'i 'og tu rin po che sna lnga/ spos lnga/ za 'og dang / dar sna dang / stag ras dang / bse'i me long / de'i steng du bu ram

dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sman sna tshogs dang / mar dang thud dang / lug dang g.yag gi snying dang dkor cha rnams kyis brgyan te thad du gzhag go/ /de'i rtsar chang la rin po che dang ldan par bya'o/ /de nas byang du kha bltas te stan la 'dug nas/ bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje sku gsung thugs su bskyed

do/ /mchod pa rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ spos la sogs pa rang rang gi sngags kyis rgya che bar byin gyis brlab bo/ /rten gyi dkor cha swa yongs su gyur pa las rten rnams mang zhing mdzes par bya'o/ /chang a yongs su gyur pa las bdud rtsir bya'o/ /de nas rang gi mchod pa dang bstod pa

yan chad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas nyams dga' ba nyid kyis chos skyong ba mnyes par bya ba'i phyir bsnyen pa byas te de la 'jug pa ni/ oM sarba de wa maN+Dal ye dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e ma ho sa na ka ga nan+ta pa ka re sle dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya swA hA/ /mchod pa'i dus su gdags so zhes

brjod pa'i don to/ /thugs ka'i hUM las brjod pa'i nyi zer ltar 'thon nas rgyal po'i thugs kar thim pas/ des chos skyong ba'i thugs sngon bzhin du g.yos nas gdan seng ge'i shugs kyis rin po che'i khang pa dang nyid la so sor thim par bsams te stong brjod do/ /de nas mchod pa

dbul te/ rtsa ba'i sngags sbyar ba dang bcas pas dbul te/ oM ni ri te hUM khaM/ zhal du'o/ /badzra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ me tog spyi bor ro/ /oM badzra d+hU pe hUM swA hA/ dri thugs kar ro/ /oM badzra dI p+pe hUM swA hA/ mar me rgyab tu'o/ oM badzra gan+d+he hUM swA hA/ dri chab mdun du'o/ /oM badzra nai bi bye hUM

swA hA/ lha bshos phyag tu'o/ /dkor cha dag thogs te sngags kyi tshig brjod/ rang gi lus zhing gi rdul snyed du sprul te nyes pa ma lus pa dang bas mthol zhing rdzas gcig kyang 'jig rten gang bar sprul te/ nyes pa byang zhing rjes su mthun pa'i tshig gis gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas

bstod cing bskul ba ni/ /sngon tshe gsang bdag spyan snga ru/ /dam chos bsrung bar zhal bzhes bzhin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gdung 'tshob pa'i/ /sems bskyed ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /gnod pa'i bar chod mang po rnams/ /stobs ldan rgyal chen yab yum dang / /gnod sbyin

pho mo sde brgyad bcas/ /bstan pa bsrung bar gnyer gtad bzhin/ /rdzu 'phrul bye ba sna tshogs kyis/ /gnod pa thams cad rdul du rlog /dam bcas las la ma brtson na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sems gyur pa'i/ /rang gi byang sems gnyen por 'gyur/ /de dran byos la las

rnams gyis/ /zhes brjod la/ dam tshig rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi zhal du dbul lo/ /de nas dgongs pa sngags zhal du thim pas nyid kyi dam tshig de thugs ka nas phyung la bdag la thim pas rgyal po dang dbyer med par bsgoms pas brtan par bya'o/ /mchod pa rnams stong ngam lnga

stong zhing dbul lo/ /de ltar byas pas nyes pa byang ba'i rtags rim par 'byung ste/ 'khru ba dang / bkur ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / sems la dogs pa med pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo / /de ltar 'bum tsho gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /de de la yid brtan pa dang / chang gi nang du sha dang

bdud rtsi dang / mi rta'i dngas ma'i khrag blugs la bsgrub par bya ste/ nye bar dgug pa la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo bai shra ba Na ye ma hA yak+Sha ku be ra pa ra mA r+tha ni dzaHdza he dza hi zhes brjod pa'i don ni bdag la rgyal po bstims la/ 'khor gnod sbyin pho mo sde brgyad khugs par bkug la

drang / rgyal po yang mdun du bzhugs te 'khor dang bcas pa'i dgug pa gnyis ni bsnyen pa'i nyams las rig par bya'o/ /dgongs pa ni sngags nyid dgug bya'i srog yin pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 'khor lo phreng ba lta bu so sor bstims pas/ rab tu dang bas

mang po dbul zhing gus pas bdag gir gyur pa'i rtse gcig pa'i bsam gtan gyis bzlas te/ de la ma brten na nus pa 'ga' byung yang dbang du mi 'gyur/ mchod pa sngags dang bsdoms la dbul la bzlas pa drug 'bum du bya'o/ /rtags rab sku 'byung ba dang / 'bring sa dang

bar snang la sgra dang 'od 'byung / tha ma dmag tshogs dang 'gro ba la dbang byed pa'o/ /cho 'phrul ni tha dad do/ /phan pa ni bzlas pa 'di rdzogs pa dang rdzas ci 'byor pa phul la gshegs su gsol/ rdzas ri rtse la bskyal lo/ /dus kyi mchod pa bya'o/ /des ni chad pa dang bral bar

'gyur ro/ /chad pas gnod pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /sbyor ba'i rim pa nus pa rdzogs pa dang khru gang pa'i brub khung gyen thur du phyed phyed brtsig cing brus la ra khyi phag gi brus pa dur khrod kyi sol bas byugs la/ de'i nang du 'bru sna lnga'i ling+ga byas la/ ming rus pa ma chad pa'i rgyu gro ga la bris

la snying gar bcug la mar gas gdab/ sha'i gtor ma dang / rag+ta dang / bdud rtsi dang / lha bshos gru gsum mthing nag go/ /a nu ru ki pi khA hi/ su ru pa na khA hi/ ku be+e ra tsan+d+ra khA hi/ ku be ra marta khA hi zhes dbul zhing bstabs so/ /de nas khrag gsum dang tsha gsum dang

pad+ma'i sha khrag la thun sngags la/ dun dun rmugs shang ha la ha la/ tsa la tsa la/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hi ma hi ma/ rbad na rbad na/ rbad pu le rbad me sha ya mA ra ya mA ra ya phaT ces zhag bdun bar du ma chad par brdeg go/ /tha ma be con dang gris btub cing brdung ngo / /de'i don ni rlung la

sngags zhon nas srog gi gnas su thim pas sems 'khrul nas gnod sbyin pho mos sgo kun nas bcud bsreg cing bzhu bar bya'o/ /de nas gzugs kyang mchod par dbul zhing bstabs la gtor ma dug zor du 'phang bar bya'o/ /de nas mchod pa'i ring lugs kyis bshags pa

phul la gshegs su gsol lo/ /las rjes snang ba med par bya/ /'grub na ming dang rjes la btab pa chad pa 'byung ngo / /rgyun du mchod cing bsnyen pa byas na ci yang 'grub nges pas yal bar mi gnas so/ /rnal 'byor dge sbyor brtan pa yis/ /dngos grub brtan pa'i rgyas

bstan phyir/ /stobs ldan rgyal chen nyer sgrub byas/ /mi mthun kun gyi gnyen por shog /rgyal po rnam thos sras kyi gsang ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA rA dza ku be ra sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad

du/ rgyal po chen po lus ngan po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ ngal so rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por snod ldan gang zag gis/ /gnas rnams shin tu dben pa ru/ /rdo rje 'chang ba bsgrub par bya/ /de nas las rnams myur 'dod na/ /bka' yi pho nya bsgrub par bya/ /de yang

rang rgyud dag dang ni/ /gtso bo 'khor du gnas pa'o/ /thabs ni tshogs bsags tshad med bsgom/ /srung ba stong nyid dang du bya/ /pad+ma'i gdan steng hUM las ni/ /mchod rten la ni sku bskyed do/ /ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas na mchod rten gdug pa sel/ /

g.yon na nor ldan ne'u le 'dzin/ /rang bzhin gnas pa spyan drangs la/ /dbang bskur byin brlab tshul bzhin bya/ /mchod pa rnams ni phul nas ni/ /bstod pa 'di dag brjod par bya/ /bstan bsrungs rgyal po chen po ni/ /mchod rten gyis ni don rnams bsgrub/ /rin chen ne'u le

bsnams nas ni/ /dgos 'dod ster ba'i ljang gu bstod/ /bskyed rim rdzogs nas bzlas pa bya/ /sems dpa' sum brtsegs ldan pa la/ /'od zer spro bsdu 'khor lo'i tshul/ /sgrub pa'i dus su spro bsdu spang / /dgug sogs man ngag bzhin du bya/ /rtags ma byung bar

'phro mi gcod/ /sngags ni/ oM nI lA m+ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM bai shra ba NA ya yak+Sha d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ a mu kaM mA ra ya phaT/ dam tshig brtan zhing gtor ma sbyin/ /de nas rang rgyud sgrub 'dod na/ /gtso bo 'khor du bcas pa yang / /tshogs bsags la sogs gong ma

ltar/ /'khor lo chen po'i lta bar gtso/ /mdun du rgyal po bskyed par bya/ /bka' bsgo la sogs las dang sbyor/ /dgug dang bsad la sogs pa yi/ bsgrub pa ci rigs shes bya ste/ /'khrul 'khor sbyor ba dag tu shes/ /rnal 'byor sgrub par byed 'dod na/ /

gnod sbyin g.yas su bskyed byas la/ /bka' bsgo rgyal por bya bar rigs/ /klu rgyal g.yon du bkol ba'i phyir/ /bde gshegs sprul pa sgrub 'dod na/ /mdun ma ma g.yon du pad+ma la/ /cho ga gsum mam skad cig las/ /sku mdog dkar po sbrul zhags can/ /de 'dra'i klu rgyal

spyan drangs bstim/ /mchod bstod gang 'dod bzlas pa bya/ /dam la ma thogs klu rnams ni/ /sgrub pa po la bar chad byed/ /dang po zhi bas gdul bar bya/ /ma nyan drag po'i las rnams brtsams/ /gsod na dong du gzugs brnyan gzhug /dgug la bsad sngags shes

par bya/ /khro bo'am yang na mtshon cha yis/ /lus rnams gtub cing gsad par bya/ /yang na sbyin sreg rnams kyang bya/ /yang na 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba bya/ /yang na ma mo rnams kyang bskul/ /gnod na gro ga rnams la ni/ /gzugs bri 'od zer rnams kyis dgug /de nas zhing

chen nang du gzhug /kha dgab mtshon bcing thal bas dgang / /yang na pha bong dug la sogs/ /gong ma bzhin du shes par bya/ /bskrad sogs gzhan yang man ngag sbyar/ /rgyal po chen po lus ngan po'i sgrub thabs/ grub pa brnyes pa'i slob dpon chen po dpa' bo rdo rjes mdzad pa

rdzogs so// //sgra pa chen po rgyal ba'i snyan la legs par zhus shing bstan bcos kyi skad cung zad shes pa'i lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos dpal thar pa'i gling gi gtsug lag khang du legs par bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bai shra ba Na sA

d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnam thos sras kyi sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mang / /'gro ba kun gyi don gzigs nas/ /drang srong rnam mang thos pa dang / /lha mo dpal tshul bzang mo yi/ /sras

su smon lam btab pa yis/ /'gro ba'i bsam pa yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /lha rnams 'byor pa 'dod pa yi/ /lha rnams kyis ni phyag byas pa'i/ /bcom ldan lha yi lha zhes bstod/ /de yi sgrub thabs brtsam par bya/ /b+hUM las skyes pa'i 'khor lo la/ /drod mtha' nga ro lnga pas

brgyan/ /steng du rjes 'jug dbyangs dang ldan/ /'od zer 'phro 'dus 'gro don mdzad pa yi/ /rang gi phyag mtshan las skyes gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje ljang ser 'gying bcas bri/ /bsod nams tshogs bdun don dam stong nyid las/ /skyes pa'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs ngo

bo/ /ye shes sems dpa' gzhug dang dbang bskur dang / /gnas gsum byin brlabs dbang sdud rdo rje bskyed/ /rdo rje dril bu rgyan rnams bcu dang ldan/ /'od zer spro bsdus khams gsum lhar bskyed nas/ /gsal byed oM dang chu yi yi ge dang / /gsum pa me yi bu dang yang

dag ldan/ /lnga pa'i thog ma bzhi pa'i tha ma la/ nga ro bzhi pa yis ni mnan pa la/ /gtum po chen po ma rungs tshig gis mnan/ /hUM gnyis phaT dang ldan pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /dus rnams kun du gtso bo'i thugs kar bskor/ /rgyun mi 'chad par rtse gcig yid kyis bzlas/ /

de yi mdun du b+hUM las ni/ /rin chen khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom/ /shar du shel gyi ka bas brgyan/ /lho ru rin chen bai DUr+ya/ /nub tu pad+ma rA ga ste/ /byang du gser gyi ka bas mdzes/ /zur bzhi rim gsum khang brtsegs dgu/ /dbus ma'i pho brang sum brtsegs ni/ /rtse mo

rin chen nor bu bzang / /rnam pa bcu yis spras pa po/ /de dbus 'jigs byed yi ge las/ /seng ge'i gdan la legs bzhugs pa/ /ngal so dge ba'i lag pa na/ /g.yas na rin chen rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon na gter gyi ne'u le bsnams/ /rin chen cod pan rna rgyan dang / /

mgul rgyan dang ni do shal dang / /dpung rgyan dang ni lag gdub bcas/ /ske rags phreng ba do shal can/ /nying lag rgyan gyis rnam par mdzes/ /gsus khyim che ba skyil krung bzhugs/ /bum pa bzang po rnam brgyad dang / /dpag bsam shing dang rin chen shing / /rdzing bu bzang

po'i rgyan mdzes pa/ /me tog bzang po 'dod 'jo'i ba/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i ra bas bskor/ /de yi dbus na mgon po ni/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rin chen bdun gyi char pa 'bebs/ /de nas rgyal po spyan drangs te/ /mgon po kun gshegs

thugs rje can/ /da lta snyigs ma lnga yi dus/ /mtshams med lnga ni kun spyod cing / /thams cad nyon mongs 'dam bying bar/ /gzigs shing gshegs pa'i gnas ngan yang / /shAkya seng ge'i spyan sngar khyed/ /thugs dam gang bzhes de dgongs la/ /'dren pa'i bstan pa

bsrung ba dang / /sems can kun la phan slad du/ /byang phyogs gnas na bzhugs pa rnams/ /sems can don phyir gshegs su gsol/ /spyan drang nas ni mchod pa dbul/ /dbang bskur nas ni na bza' gsol/ /rin chen bdun dang bkra shis brgyad/ /phyag tu phul la dngos

grub blang / /bza' btung 'dod yon la sogs pa/ /rtag bsten lha la dbul bar bgyi/ /snying po chu yi yi ge la/ /dbyangs yig bcu gnyis pa yis brgyan/ /mig btsums sum cu rtsa gnyis bsring / /nye ba'i snying po ni/ /oM bai shra pa Na ye srA hA/ 'bum phrag gcig gis

mkha' la g.yo/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis sa rnams g.yo/ /'bum phrag gsum gyis phyogs rnams sreg /'bum phrag bzhi yis bza' btung 'thob/ /'bum phrag lnga yis nor dang ldan/ /'bum phrag drug gis 'khor mang rnyed/ /'bum phrag bdun gyis rigs rgyud 'phel/ /

'bum phrag brgyad kyis tshe 'phel zhing / /dgus ni bcud len sman rnams rnyed/ /bcu yis mngon par shes pa 'thob/ /gshegs su gsol tshe bzod par gsol/ /smon lam btab cing phrin las bcol/ /yang phyis 'byon par gsol ba gdab/ /sna tshogs rab tu sgrub rgyud

dang / /gar mkhan mchog gi rgyud las ni/ /phan pa'i yan lag gces pa bsdus/ /'gro kun gnas srung thob par shog /slob dpon shUraMg barmas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta te dza de ba dang / lo tsA ba zangs dkar 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /

bai shra ba Na'i rtogs pa bzhugs/ /[ ]@##/ /dang por bdag nyid yi dam gyi lhar bskyed la/ bcom ldan 'das rnam thos sras seng ge la bcibs pa/ mdog ser po lag na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'bar ba thogs pa/ /gnod sbyin gyi bdag po brgyad kyis bskor ba/

mdun na rmugs 'dzin rin po che thogs pa ser po/ g.yas su gang ba bzang po bum pa thogs pa ser po/ rgyab tu nor bu bzang po rin po che 'bar ba thogs pa dkar po/ g.yon du rta bdag ku be ra lag na ral gri thogs pa nag po gos sngon po can/ mtshams bzhir yang dag shes ser po

lag na ral gri thogs pa/ 'brog gnas lag na mdung thogs pa nag po/ lngas rtsen ser skya lag na khang bu brtsegs pa bsnams pa/ pi tsi kuN+Da li lag na ral gri dang phub thogs pa dkar po de rnams rta la chibs pa/ 'khor gnod sbyin bye bas bskor ba/ lag na mtshon cha 'phyar ba

bsams te/ gu gul gyi dud pa'am/ 'bras kyi phye'i dud pa btang la/ dung dang rnga brdungs te spyan drang bar bya'o/ /oM bai shra ba Na sa pa ri bA ra badzra sa ma ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM bai swA hA/ de mdun du byon pa'i rtags snying 'dar ba dang / mgo sbrid pa dang / grogs la babs pa dang / mthong

ba na bdug pa dang / me tog dang / gtor ma byin la phrin las bcol nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /sgron ma'i phyag rgya bcas la/ /oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba bi shud+d+honya haM zhes brjod pas stong par bsam/ de la gtor ma'i snod rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa dpag tshad

kyi tshad tsam bsams la/ de'i nang du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya bsams te/ oM AHhUM gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la/ oM a kA ro zhes bya ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la/ kha dog bzang po'i 'od dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o/ /de la bsngo ba ni/ oM bai shra wa Na ye srA hA/

oM dzaM b+ha la yi swA hA/ oM pu rna b+ha dra ye swA hA/ oM ma N-i b+ha dra ye swA hA/ oM ku be ra ye swA hA/ oM saM pra dza na ye swA hA/ oM gu h+yasta na ye swA hA/ oM pany+tsi ka ye swA hA/ oM pi tsi kuN+Da li ye swA hA/ de rnams la zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod kyi phrin las bcol la/ snying ga'i lcags kyu dgrol/ oM

bai zhes yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad du gdon/ nir ba tsa na bsreg pa bslab/ bar bar du gtor ma rgya chen po gtang / bai shra wa Na'i rtogs pa rdzogs so// //bstod pa ni/ byang phyogs skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /'jig rten

skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /sde po che la stobs po che/ /pha rol dgra rnams 'joms par byed/ /gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /bdag nyid chen po de dag la/ /mchod cing bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal/ /byang phyogs

skyong ba'i rgyal chen rnam thos sras/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' nyan dam tshig can/ /rig pas byin rlabs nam mkha'i mthas klas pa'i/ /'dod yon lnga bcas gtor ma phul ba bzhes/ /sras dang btsun mo gnyen dang dmag dpung bcas/ /'di dag dgongs shing 'go bar gyur nas kyang / /

sngon gyi thugs dam phrin las ma bsnyel bar/ /bdag gi phrin las 'bras bu yod par mdzod// #/ /rnam sras rtogs pa bzhugs/[ ]@##/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /zla ba yar ngo'i bco lnga la/ /dam tshig ldan pa'i

rnal 'byor bas/ /thun mong ma yin mchod pa ste/ /gang gis bdugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /dngos grub myur du thob byed pa'i/ /sgrub pos bdug spos bdug pa ni/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'di ltar bya/ /'bras dkar btags pa'i phye ma ni/ /sardza ra dza dag dang ni/ /ga pur tsan+dan dkar dmar dang / /

cha mnyam nas ni de dag bsre/ /a ka ru nag gis bsgos nas/ /be ta dkar mo'i char rgyun gyis/ /rnam par sbrus nas rab bsngags te/ /rtsa ba'i rig pa gang de la/ /dbab pa'i gsang sngags rab tu sbyar/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /dngos grub phyir ni rdzas de yi/ /de nas mkhas

pas ri lu bya/ /gang zhig mchod pa'i dus su ni/ /sems kyi dbang phyug ting 'dzin gyis/ /rnam par sbyangs pa'i sa gzhi la/ /rten sogs dgram par byas nas ni/ /chogs gter bdag mdun bkug nas/ /rdo rje can gyis bdug pa dbul/ /gser sogs mdzes pa'i snod du ni/ /tsan+dan la

sogs mdag me la/ /sngar bshad pa yi ri lu bsreg /des ni rten la bdug par bya/ /sbyor nges skyob pa mnyes gyur na/ /gter rnams de yi mod la ster/ /gal te de ltar ma gyur na/ /gter bdag nyams par gdon mi za/ /'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste/ /gsang ba'i gnas su spyad par bya/ /bdug

spos kyi sbyor ba'o/ /de nas dam tshig bshad bya ba/ /rtag par khrus dang gtsang sbra bya/ /rnga dril la sogs rol mo'i sgra/ /sna tshogs me tog dri ldan dang / /sna tshogs 'bru yi chan dang bshos/ /mdzes pa'i dar snas rtag mchod bya/ /chang rnams dbul bar mi bya ste/ /sha ni brtags te dbul bar

bya/ /rtag tu sngon po'i gos 'chang zhing / /lung thang 'bras bu'i bgrang 'phreng bgrang / /myur 'gro sha yi bza' ba spang / /nyams shing chag pa'i snod mi bza'/ /rtsub cing nag po'i stan mi 'dug /bza' bral mas bstabs bza' btung rnams/ /rnam pa kun du mi spyod do/ /srog bral ba

la reg pa spang / /bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go/ /de nas rten ni bshad par bya/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag gi/ /gter bdag brten pa'i rten yang ni/ /rnam pa gsum du mkhas pas brtag /phyi rten rta mchog rab sngo la/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan btags mgon la dmigs/ /rtag tu yang

ni bcang bar bya/ /yang na gzugs legs rab tu gzung / /gsang rten gro ga'i shun sogs la/ /gur gum dri bzangs rab spel bas/ /bai yig bris la sngags kyis bskor/ /rin chen dang bcas rin chen gzugs/ /'bru mchog btags nas bsnos byas la/ /mkhas pas byas te

snying po gzhug /tshon byugs nas ni mdun gzhag go/ /gnyis pa bram ze'i ras dag gam/ /gzhon nu ma yis legs bkal ba'i/ /ras la dri yis rab bsgos nas/ /gter bdag sku mdog phyag char ldan/ /lugs nas 'byung ba'i rim pa yis/ /dam tshig ldan pas myur bris la/ /

phyi rol shing sogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /sngags rig pas ni mdun dgram bya/ /rten gzugs pa yi rim pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba bshad bya ste/ /sgrub po gsang bdag phyogs bltas te/ /gtor ma'ang de nyid phyogs su sbyin/ /gsang rten ne'u le'i rlud bur gzhug /sngon dmar kha spro

rgyun 'chang zhing / /'bras sogs 'bru rnams der gzhug bya/ /gzhan gyis mthong na dngos grub nyams/ /gtor sgrub pa la gsang ba shis/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /nam mkha' mdzod la rnam par rol/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi rtogs pa bde byed cho

ga sna tshogs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/[ ]@##/ /dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs ni/ /lha mo skal ba bzang mo nyon/ /ma mo'i khyim dang nyams dga' bar/ /bsgom pa bzang

po bya ba nyid/ /'bar ba'i bris skur dmigs nas ni/ /sngar mchod blo gros ldan pa yin/ /gar stabs 'gying bas stan gnas pa/ /sku mdog dmar po 'od zer dmar/ /zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa/ /ral pa'i cod pa na dag gis brgyan/ /dmar po 'bar 'khyil 'jigs pa ste/ /

mche ba gtsigs pa yang dag bri/ /dgra sta gtun shing nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin du yang mda' gzhu nyid/ /kha TAM ga dang lcags kyu dang / /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /rdo rje ral gri de bzhin gzhan/ /sha chen thod pa 'dzin pa dang / /phub chung ba dang rtse gsum dang / /'phang

mdung dang ni bcu gnyis so/ /oM gaHgaHsid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ sarba ar+tha ye bra sA d+ha ya hUM hUM dz+dzaHswA hA/ dgug pa'i sngags so/ /oM AHhUM swA hA/ bzlas pa'i sngags so/ /stong phrag brgya yis 'grub 'gyur bas/ /phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam/ /lan cig yongs bzlas thig le bya/ /sngags

pa skal bzang mthong na dga'/ /rgyal po'i sgo ru ches mchod cing / /dgra rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /bgegs rnams nye bar skrod byed yin/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster bar/ /the tshom med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de lta'i cho gas sgrub pa nyid/ /ma mo rnams ni sgrub pa'i mchog/

de dbus khro bo chen po ni/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /zhal ni mche ba cung zad gtsigs/ /khros bcas zhal ni bzhad pa dang / /sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /yi dgas zhon zhing nyi mar gnas/ /gar stabs sum cu 'jigs

par mdzad/ /stag gi pags pa'i gos 'dzin cing / /spyan gsum bzang po'i gzugs can te/ /ba dan gsum par rdo rje dang / /thod pa dang ni mtshan mo 'dzin/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag dag na/ /de bzhin mda' dang gzhu nyid do/ /sgrub thabs 'di rgyud rdo rje mkha' 'gro las phyung ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ga Na pa ti gu h+ya sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro don phyogs med spyod pa la/ /bsod nams tshad med bskyed dgos pas/ /tshogs kyi bdag po bsgrub par bya/ /mi

skad khyi skad mi thos pa'i/ /gangs sam ri bo mthon po'i rtse/ /lha chen gnas pa'i sa yin pas/ /sgrub pa'i gnas su shes par bya/ /zangs kyi maN+Dal gru bzhi'i steng / /bum pa lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bri/ /de steng ka ra wa di gzhag /chu dang 'o ma bsres pas dgang / /bskyed pa'i sa bon shel rdo

gzhug /ga bur dzA ti tsan+dan gdab/ /de steng tshogs bdag bzhugs pa'i rten/ /byang shar kha bltas lung pa yi/ /sa chu bsres pa'i 'dag pa la/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku bzhengs te/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog dmar/ /g.yas pa srid pa'i mes po la/ /g.yon par nu'i

mtshan ma rnams/ /phyag gnyis thal sbyor spos sdong 'dzin/ /zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum mjug ma can/ /skyil krung phyed pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /ka ra wa di'i steng du gzhag /khong par spre snying du ma gcig dang / /yig 'bru bcu pa'i gsang sngags gzhug/ /de yi mdun du mchod pa dang / /

gtor ma bzang po bsham par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed la/ /stong pa'i ngang las gaHde las/ /spre'u phyag bzhi bskyed bsams te/ /de yi thugs kar gaHla ni/ /sngags kyis bskor bar bsam bya ste/ /rang gi snying ga'i 'od zer gyis/ /tshogs bdag bkug la sku la bstim/ /

sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab/ /hUM rang bzhin dag pa'i lha yul nas/ /lha chen yab yum bshos pa'i sras/ /nor bu dri ma med pa ni/ /gzhon nu stobs kyi rgyan gyis spras/ /phyag bzhi gling bzhi khyab par nyul/ /lha dmag dkar po'i kha lo bsgyur/ /gang gis khyod kyi mtshan

'dzin pa/ /de la nor gyi char pa 'bebs/ /thugs dam rgyud bskul spyan 'dren na/ /thugs rjes dgongs la gshegs su gsol/ /oM ga Na pa ti A kaR+Sha ya dza dzaH/ de nas mchod pa'i tshogs rnams dbul/ /de nas bsnyen pa bskyal bar bya/ /tshogs bdag

thugs kar zla ba la/ /rtsa ba'i sngags dang gzungs kyis bskor/ /sngags bzlas spro bsdu'i sbyor ba bya/ /oM ga Na ma ga Na dz+nyA ya swA hA/ oM rat+na rat+na rat+no rat+no ga Na pa ti ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga Na pa ti swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma nu pa tra/ tu ru tu ru/ g+ha g+ha ta ya ga Na pa ti swA hA/ rtsa sngags gzungs

sngags bcas pa la/ /zhag bdun bar du bsnyen pa bskyal/ /de dus ting 'dzin rim pa ni/ /rang las 'od 'phros mchod pa'i tshogs/ /spros nas tshogs bdag sku la 'bul/ /tshogs bdag sku las 'od zer 'phros/ /stong gsum nor gyi bcud bsdus nas/ /lha chen tshogs

kyi zhal du gsol/ /khong du zhu nas gsang bar 'dzags/ /'og gi bum pa khengs par bsam/ /bum chu skabs su lto chu bya/ /de nas las la sbyar bar bya/ /pho dang mo yi dbang po dang / /'khor lo las la sbyang bar bya/ /zangs las srid pa'i mes po bya/ /lto bar skyes pa'i pho

mtshan gzhug /rtsa ba'i sngags la las sngags gdags/ /sham bu kha sgyur shes par bya/ /de ltar zhag gsum las la sbyar/ /srid pa'i mes po dar snas brgyan/ /yul 'khor mthong sar g.yugs byas na/ /lha mo rnams kyang 'du bar 'gyur/ /yang na ra nu'i mtshan ma

la/ /las sbyor sngags de zhag gsum gdab/ /gsal shing rtse la phyar byas nas/ /skyes pa 'du ba'i sar phyin na/ /lha rnams 'tshogs par gyur pa na/ /brgya byin mdzes pa lta bu ru/ /skyes pa thams cad sems 'dus nas/ /bkur sti phun sum tshogs par byed/ /yid 'phrog

sngags ni 'di yin no/ /oM ga na ma ga Na dz+nyA ya swA hA/ oM ba ba/ se se/ khang khang / yer yer/ rab rab g+hur mi/ ha sa mang kha mi/ skyes pa'i tshogs wa shaM ku ru ye swA hA/ 'khor lo las la sbyor ba ni/ /mdun du zangs kyi maN+Dal khar/ /mda' bzhi btsugs la 'khor lo

brgyad/ /yul dang grong dang rgyal blon tshogs/ /'khor lo 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /rang dbang med par 'gugs par bsam/ /sngags kyi 'od zer zhag gsum mo/ /srid gsum dbang sdud las sbyor yin/ /de nas gtor ma phul byas la/ /bstod pa bya zhing bzod gsol

dbul/ /ye shes gshegs la dam tshig bsdu/ /mis ma mthong bar sba bar bya/ /skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe/ /mchod bstod gtor ma gtang bar bya/ /de ltar brtson 'grus ldan gyur na/ /gang bsams pa ni 'grub 'gyur zhing / /yid du 'dod pa char du 'bab/ /'di brtsams

dge ba ci yod pas/ /byang chub spyod pa la zhugs nas/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed shog /tshogs kyi bdag po spre'u yi mgo can gyi sgrub thabs/ dpal dngos grub brnyes pa'i paN+Ti ta a mo g+ha badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //slad kyis mkhan po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsA ba

nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o/ /tshogs bdag gi phyi sgrub gra sta dkar po/ nang sgrub chags pa rdo rje/ gsang sgrub spre'u'i dbu can rnams dang / gzhan yang tshogs bdag dmar po phyag bcu gnyis pa/ tshogs bdag sprin gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba sngon po phyag bzhi pa

rnams bla ma chos dpal bzang pos bdag la gnang ngo / /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ A r+ya ga Na pa ti rA ga badzra sa ma ya stod tra nAm/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po chags pa rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag dgyes/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan zhi ba skye/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan khro bo che/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ni/ /ci 'dod par ni stsol bar mdzod/ /lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni/ /sgrub pa po la stsol bar mdzad/ /shin tu

thugs rje'i bdag nyid pas/ /tshogs bdag chen po thugs rje che/ /thugs rje chen pos dbul ba skyob/ /nor lha chen po khyod nyid la/ /bdag nyid gus pas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpal ldan tshogs bdag chen po ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ba/ /glang chen byi la spe'u'i

zhal/ /la phug ral gri rin chen dang / /chang snod la du dgra sta 'dzin/ /brkyang bskum skyil krung yum steng bzhugs/ /zhal nang rin chen char pa 'bebs/ /sgrub pa po yi dbul ba sel/ /gsus che rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag

la'o/ /chang dang la du la phug dang / /'bras chan khur ba'i gtor ma bzhes/ /tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /nad dang 'byung bzhi bar mdzod/ /mi dang 'byung po gnod sbyin bdud/ /thams cad bran du 'gyur par shog /lha yi longs spyod mang po las/ /'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung bar

shog// dngos grub sgrub pa'i dbang phyug can/ /'dul pa'i dbang gis skur sprul pa/ /lha chen tshogs bdag chen po ste/ /'jig rten 'dir yang bsrung ba dang / /byang chub thob pa'i grogs mdzod cig /ces bstod la gsol ba gdang pa ste bzlas pa thon nas gtor ma dbul bar

bya'o/ /tshogs kyi bdag po chags pa rdo rje dam tshig gi bstod pa paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //pan+Di ta chen po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /me g+ha a lo ka ga Na pa ti sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/

sprin gyi sgron ma chogs kyi bdag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ tshogs kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro rgyal khyu mchog phongs pa sel/ /mdog sngo de la bdag btud de/ /gter gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i/ /sgrub thabs bdag gi legs rtogs dang / /rgyud dang man ngag legs dran

pas/ /yang dag bdag gis bshad par bya/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /yid 'ong legs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /sngar langs khrus byas me tog gtor/ /tsan+dan chu yis man+Dal bya/ /me tog dri zhim tshom bu dgram/ /de nas rang nyid yi ge maM/ /de las 'od 'phros spyan

drangs la/ /mchod cing gu gul nag po'i spos/ /btang zhing 'od kyi ngo bor bzhu/ /rang nyid nang du legs par gzhug /de yi stobs kyis bdag nyid kyang / /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /sku mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa/ /dbu la ral pa'i cod pan te/ /zla tshes dang

ldan sbrul gyis brgyan/ /phyag g.yas dgra sta mche ba dang / /g.yon pa rtse gsum zhags pa bsnams/ /stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing / /klu rgyal dkar po'i do shal can/ /'od zer tshogs ldan de bsgom bya/ /rin chen rten la ye shes gzhug/ /mchod pa bya zhing yi dgas

'jigs/ /de yis de la bdag nas ni/ /sku yi sa bon dang po ste/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pa e yis brgyan/ /dang po'i gsum pa de 'og ste/ /de 'og dbyangs yig dang po'o/ /drug pa'i gsum pa'i sa bon la/ /o yig mgo bo legs par brgyan/ /dang po'i dang po de 'og gnas/ /rlung

gi sa bon de 'og ste/ /zhi ba'i yi ge'i gdan du ni/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa steng du sa/ /khro bo'i skad gdangs rjes la brjod/ /A li kA li legs par rtogs/ /de ltar btus pa'i rig pa de/ /nyin re khri tsho re re dang / /gu gul nag po'i ri lu la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi sbyin sreg

bya/ /de ltar 'bad pas zla re la/ /dong tsa 'bum 'bum rnyed par byed/ /rgyal gyi nyin par sngar langs nas/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma dang / /dri zhim spos kyis legs par mchod/ /rten ni gtsang ma'i gzhi'am ni/ /khyu mchog pags pa'i gzhi la ni/ /sgrub pos mtshon gang

gong gzugs bri/ /rgyal gyi nyin par rdzogs pa la/ /rmugs 'dzin rgyal po khyod kyis mdzod/ /zhes brjod gar yang bcing bar bya/ /za ma tog gi nang du ni/ /me tog bzang dang dri bzangs kyis/ /legs par bsdams nas der gnas bya/ /rtag par de la mchod bya ste/ /rgya chen

tshogs kyis legs par mchod/ /de ltar rgyun du byas pa yis/ /gter chen thams cad thob pa dang / /'byung po'i tshogs kyang 'dun par 'gyur/ /kun la gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar ldan/ /'di ni 'di yi dam tshig go/ /'di la 'bad gyur thams cad la/ /gter gyis re ba skong ba

dang / /dus rnams kun du khyod kyis gzigs/ /zhes ni legs par rtogs par mdzod/ /tshogs bdag gzigs gzugs gsal ba yi/ /sgrub thabs gter gyi sgron ma 'di/ /'gro rnams phongs las grol ba dang / /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /tshogs kyi bdag

po sprin gyi sgron ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon bram ze rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI adz+nyA bi ni ba tra ga Na pa ti sA d+ha

naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal tshogs kyi bdag po 'jur gegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun la snyoms pa'i thugs rje yis/ /rtag tu 'dzin byed de yi sprul pa ni/ /tshogs [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]bdag la gus pas phyag

'tshal te/ /gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bdag gis bshad par bya/ /dang po tshogs bdag rten bzhengs pa/ /rta yi khru'am ras bzangs la/ /'phags pa sku mdog gangs ltar dkar/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi pa/ /glang chen byi la spre'u yi zhal/ /phyag g.yas la phug

rin chen dang / /ral gri g.yon pas la du dang / /chang gi thod pa dgra sta'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang ba g.yon pa bskum/ /gnyis kyis skyil krung legs par bzhugs/ /'og tu lha mo dkar mo ni/ /spre'u yi zhal du 'phags pa yi/ /gsang ba phyed tsam nub par bya/ /zhabs

rten pa yi lha mo gnyis/ /yum gyi kha nas rin chen 'bab/ /bum pa zed cing sgrub pa po'i/ /dbul ba sel zhing re ba bskong / /skar chen dag la bri bar bya/ /de yi logs bzhir gi wang gis/ /tad+ya thA/ na maHstu te ga Na ba ti/ kaT+Ta kaT+Ta/ maT+Ta maT+Ta/ raT+Ta raT+Ta/ da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/

pany+dza pany+dza/ na maHstu ste/ ga Na pa ti ru ru tsa na ya swA hA/ oM a b+hu tra bi na bu kha m+ny+tsa d+ha ra b+h+ra ma gats+tsha ti/ ha ha ya/ ma hU ta ti k+Shi ta nan pra ye ba ye mi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ na mo na ma swA hA/ tshar re ming dang spel ba bri/ /de rgyab gzungs ring bri bar bya/ /rab tu gnas pa

de yi mdun/ /maN+Dal dkar po 'dab brgyad la/ /tsan+dan chu yis byugs pa'i steng / /me tog dkar po sil mar bkram/ /chang dang la phug la du dang / /'bras chan khur ba la sogs pas/ /'phags pa mchod la bdag nyid ni/ /yi dam byas la sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM gaM

ga Na pa ti ma ma rat+na sid+d+hi ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga Na pa ti swA hA/ zhes pa grangs kyi rtags dang sbyar/ /zla ba gcig gis nges par 'grub/ /de nas sku gzugs mchod byas la/ /dar du dril la mi yi rkang / /dbus su bcug la tho rangs khar/ /lags pas btsugs te gtor ma sbyin/ /

oM gaM ga Na pa ti rat+na sid+d+hi ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga Na pa ti swA hA/ oM gaM ga Na pa ti ba liM ta khA hi khA hi/ bdun gyis sngags la dbul bar bya/ /de nas bstod la sngags 'di bya/ /oM ga Na pa ti rat+na rat+na sid+d+hi mA ma rod+d+ha rod+d+ha ga Na pa ti ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ga ka Ta ka Ta swA hA/ ga Na pa ti pad+ma na buSh+Ti

ku ru ma Ta ma Ta swA hA/ ga Na pa ti sid+d+hi wa shaM ku ru ra Tar Ta swA hA/ ga Na pa ti rat+na bau ShaT gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis/ /yid la re ba rdzogs par 'gyur/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal nyid thob nas/ /'bad pa med par nor rnyed 'gyur/ /spogs mi dgos par 'grub 'gyur

te/ /de'i phyir gtor ma 'bad par bya/ /'phags pa 'jur gegs kun sel ba'i/ /sgrub thabs 'di brtsams dge ba des/ /'jig rten nor la dbang byed cing / /bla med 'bras bu thob par shog /'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i sgrub thabs 'jur gegs sel ba zhes bya ba slob

dpon chen po in+d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges yam bu karta rir legs par bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ utsuSh+ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'chol ba'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa

dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi bskyod pa'am tha mal snying gar ni/ /a las zla steng hUM nag gser 'od can/ /las byung rdo rje rtse dgu'i lte ba la/ /zla steng hUM gi 'od kyis lha spyan drangs/ /mchod pas mnyes te rang gi snying gar zhugs/ /tshad med bzhi dang byang chub sems bskyed la/ /

rdo rje 'od kyis dngos kun lhar bsgyur thim/ /oM As spyan drang der bstim lhar gsal bya/ /pad+ma nyi mar nor bdag rgyan spras ba/ /nor skyug mgo rkang gnon pa khro ba'i gzugs/ /mi bskyod dbu mdzes thod khrag ne'u le 'dzin/ /klus brgyan thugs kar zla ba sngar bzhin bsam/ /

dbu zhal dpung pa g.yas g.yon thugs ka dang / /g.yas g.yon brla dang gsang gnas byin gnyis la/ /zla bar yi ge bcu gser 'od 'phro/ /'od kyis mchod dang lhar bsgyur nor bslus skyug /lag mthil baM las gser bum rin chen skyug /mdzub mo

gung mo ming med mthe'u chung dang / /mthe bong nor 'chang g.yas g.yon yi ge bcu/ /oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ oM dza luM swA hA/ rim bzhin byin gyis brlab dang dbul sngags so/ /phyag dang zhal dang gsang gnas nang nas phyag /de nas zhal du dmar ser chu rgyun 'jug /na mo

rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA/ lo phyed thun drug chu phul 'byor chen 'grub/ /spogs na hUM mdzad khros pas dug khrag dang / /tsha ba ske tshe mar khus byugs te bskam/ /raM las khong par gru gsum me bsams dbul/ /sa'am

rdo las mkhyid gang sku gzugs bya/ /lha bstim thab khung gzhug ste mchod par bya/ /rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor sku'am sngags bris te/ /lha bstims dril te rin chen 'bar gzugs 'chang / /sna tshogs rgyun du zhabs nas chu 'dzag pa'i/ /'og tu lha sku ye shes bstims pa gzhug/

mal logs sngas sam sku bri ye shes gzhug /gzugs brnyan snod nang 'chang byas chu dbul lo/ /u tsuSh+ma sgrub pa'i thabs thun mong ma yin pa slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ u tsuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig spyan gsum grags pa'i gtsug phud kyi/ /rgyan gyi nor bu la reg zhabs ldan pa/ /thub

pa'i gzhon nu des ni thub dbang sras/ /rnams kyis phun tshogs mchog mang rgyas mdzad gyur/ /bla med yon tan gnyis med pa'i/ /rin chen grong khyer 'dren pa ste/ /'gro ba rang gis phun tshogs la/ /myur du len 'dod 'di bstan bya/ /de la dang po re zhig bdag gis dzam+b+ha la mnyes

par byas nas/ sa rtogs pas de'i bdag nyid du gyur te/ 'gro rnams mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pas snying gi nang gi bu gar thig le dang bral ba'i yi ge a dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba de las skyes

pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /der hUM yig dbus sngo ba phyi rol kun nas cung zad ser ba/ 'od zer gyi tshogs 'gro ba mgo gyen du bstan pa ste/ de las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ kha dog dang bya ba hUM yig dang 'dra ba ste lte ba'i nang du son pa'i zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM de lta bu dang ldan pa

bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas oM a zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas hUM yig dang rdo rje dag las 'od zer 'phros te/ phyogs bcu nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i dzam+b+ha la'i gzugs mtha' yas pa rnams mar me blang ba'i tshul gyis spyan drangs nas mdun du de'i sku gcig tu

rnam par bsgoms la/ 'od zer rnams kyis mchod pa lngas mchod pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa nas btang snyoms kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su hUM dang rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams la lus mtha' dag bstims la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin

zla ba dang rdo rje dang / sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams la oM a zhes bya ba 'di dang / 'od zer spros pas bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs la gzhug par bya'o/ /gzhug pa'i mjug thogs su skad cig gis zla ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba

gzhon nu lo lnga lon pa lta bu mi'u thung gi rnam pa can sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i steng du nor sbyin ser po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan can/ zhal nas rin po che skyug cing gan rkyal du nyal ba'i dpral bar zhabs g.yas pa dang rkang pa gnyis kyi steng du g.yon

pas mnan pa/ g.yon brkyang gi gom stabs can/ gcer bu rtags gyen du 'greng ba/ gsus pa 'phyang ba thugs kar phyag g.yas na thod pa khrag gis gang ba bsnams pa la g.yon du phyogs nas gzigs pa/ brla g.yon pa la brten pa'i phyag g.yon pas ne'u le kha nas 'og

tu rin po che'i tshogs skyugs pa bsnams pa snyan ma phug cing gug pa/ zhal mche ba zla ba phyed pa lta bur gtsigs pa/ spyan dmar la zlum pa/ dpral ba'i dbyes su khro gnyer byas pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'greng ba/ dbu la thub pa mi bskyod pa sngon po sa

gnon gyi phyag rgya can gyis rgyas btab pa/ mtha' yas sngon po ta ma la'i lo ma lta bus dbu skra bcings pa/ 'jog po dmar pos rna ba dkris pa/ pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar bas do shal byas pa/ stobs kyi rgyu ljang gu dUr ba lta bus tshangs skud byas pa/ nor rgyas dkar

pos ske rags byas pa/ pad+ma me tog kun+da ltar mdzes pas rkang gdub byas pa/ dung skyong ser pos lag gdub byas pa/ rigs ldan du ba'i mdog can khra bos dpung rgyan byas pa/ sku mdog sngon po 'od zer ser po'i tshogs 'phro ba bsgoms nas dpral ba dang / kha dang dpung pa

g.yas g.yon dang / snying ga dang / rdo rje'i steng dang / brla g.yas g.yon dang / zhabs g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i nang gi rtsa'i bu gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu rnams la/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA zhes bya ba'i yi ge ser po rnams ni 'od zer ser po can du blta bar bya'o/ /de'i

rjes la sna'i rlung phyir 'byung ba'i dus su oM yig la sogs pa'i 'od zer rnams dang thugs ka'i hUM dang / rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyogs thams cad du spros te rig pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo bor gyur pa rnams rlung 'jug

pa'i dus su hUM yig la bcug la sems brtan par byed pas brtan par bya'o/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs pa rnams kyang klu dang / ne'u le dang / nor sbyin kha rnams su gzhug par bya'o/ /slar rlung 'byung ba na klu la sogs pa rnams kyis mid pa'i

rin po che rnams mdun du skyugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar yang dang yang du spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa yang ngo / /de'i rjes su dal bar gyur na/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags sam/ yang na

dgod pa'i sngags yi ge bcu pa bzla bar bya'o/ /chu sbyin pa'i dus su ni lag pa g.yas pa gan rkyal gyi dbus su baM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis lag pa bum pa bzang po lta bur byas la/ lag pa'i rtsa bar oM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis gdu bu'i rnam pa dang ldan pa dang / baM yig

gi dbus su dzaM dang / mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / ming med dang / mthe'u chung dang / mthe bo rnams kyi rtse mo la dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra zhes bya ba'i yi ge rnams rim pa ji lta ba dang / oM dang baM gyi yi ge dag gi bar du ya yig dang / ya yig gi g.yon dang g.yas ngos dag tu swA hA zhes bya

ba'i yi ge dag ste/ oM yig la sogs pa 'di rnams rang rang gi gnas kyi bu ga rnams su zla ba la gnas pa ser po can du bsgoms nas/ lag pa'i nang du me tog chu dang bcas pa kha dang nye bar byas la/ oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan bdun du mngon par

bsngags par bya'o/ /de'i rjes lag pa brkyang bas sbyin par bya ba'i chu rang gi kha nas zhugs pa dzaM yig gi 'od zer rnams dang / thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / hUM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis kha dog ser por byas pa rdo rje'i kha nas 'thon nas lag par son pa skad cig gis mdun

du bcom ldan 'das zhal mngon du phyogs par bsgom pa'am/ sku gzugs kyi zhal gyi nang du oM dz+luM swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / na mo rat+na tra yA ya zhes bya ba la sogs kyis lan bdun du dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa lan cig

brjod pas 'bras rngos pa bu ram dang bsres pa la sogs pa rnams kyi gtor ma bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar ji ltar nus par thun gsum mam/ thun gcig la rjes su bsgrubs te bstod pa dang smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bsgoms pa'i bcom ldan 'das

oM badzra muHzhes bya bas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang smin drug gi zla ba dang / dpyid zla ra ba dang / dpyid zla tha chungs dang / dbyar zla 'bring po rnams gang yang rung ba'i nya'am/ dge ba'i nyi ma gzhan la yang rdo ma gas pa la skad cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo

bor bsgrubs te yang dag par mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /bzo bo bsnyen gnas kyi sdom pa bzung bas nyin zhag gcig nyid la dpa' bo'i yon gyis sku gzugs byed du gzhug go/ /byas pa la yang bdag nyid la bkod pa bzhin du rim pa ji lta bar bcom

ldan 'das kyi gzugs la yi ge dgod pa dang bcas pa rnam par bsgoms nas/ chu sbyin pa la sogs pas mnyes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag go/ /de'i tshe ni gshegs su gsol bar mi bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das sku gzugs kyi rnam par rtag tu bzhugs pa la bkur sti dang mchod

par bya'o/ /paN+Di ta a b+ha ya ka ra gup+tas mdzad pa'i u tsuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta a laM ka de ba dang / lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas sbas pas chos 'khor shong ma'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur te gtan la phab

pa'o/ /slad kyi paN+Di ta ma hA bi b+hU ti tsan+d+ra dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing dag par bgyis so/ @/dzam+b+ha la'i sgrub thabs bzhugs//[ ]@##/ /na mo u tsuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la/ oM a zhes byas pas spyan drangs/ rang gi snying gar a yig yongs su

gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las/ rdo rje rtse dgu pa de'i dbus su in+d+ra go ba dang mnyam pa'i dza yig las/ sngar brjod pa'i spyan 'dren pa'i sngags kyis/ dzam+b+ha la'i mgon po rang gi snying gar gzhug ste/ u tsuSh+ma byis pa'i gzugs rna

ba ma phug pa/ sku mdog nag po skra gyen du brdzes pa/ mi thung gi rnam pa khro gnyer can/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dbu rgyan can/ phyag g.yon pas rin po che skyugs pa'i ne'u le 'dzin pa/ g.yas pas khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ lho phyogs su mgo bstan pa'i gser gyi

mdog can/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ nor gter gan rgyal du bsgyel ba zhabs gnyis kyis mnan pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba skyugs pa'i bdag nyid las 'od zer gyi phring ba'i tshogs 'phro bar bsam/ u tsuSh+ma'i phyag g.yas na oM yig las skyes pa'i gdu bu'o/ /baM yig las

skyes pa'i bum pa bzang po dang 'dra ba 'phro bzhin pa/ lag pa'i dbus su dzaM yig go/ /mdzub mo la b+ha yig go/ /gung mo la la yig go/ /srin lag la dza yig go/ /mthe chung la len yig go/ /mthe bo la dra yig go/ /mkhrig ma la ya yig go/ /de nas swA hA'o/ /'di

ni sngags dgod pa'i rim pa'o/ /kha sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la chu skyor sbyin no/ /oM dz+luM swA hA chu skyor sbyin pa'i sngags so/ /oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ lag pa nas kha dang / kha nas lag par de dben par sbyin no/ /'di ltar snying rjes sems can thams cad phongs pa'i

sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i don du dzam+b+ha la bsgom par bya'o/ /u tsuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rgyal po Ar+ya ma tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dge slong dar ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya u tsuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la kriSh+Na sA d+ha naM/

bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba nag po'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun dzam+b+ha la'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal gyi dbang phyug dbang chen bcu gnyis rin chen rnam pa mang ldan pa/ /thabs mang stobs chen dri med thugs rje drang srong lha mi'i sras gyur de'i/ /sras

gcig mtshungs med ma lus srid dang zhi ba'i nor bdag gter chen ni/ /mi'u thung cha byad thod khrag ne le 'dzin mdzad khyod kyis bdag la srungs/ /re zhig sgrub pa po dam tshig can gzhan la phan par brtson pas 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la mi phyed pa'i dang ba thob pas skyabs su song la

pad+ma'i 'dab ma mchog gi snod dang / gnod sbyin mo kun du rgyug gi lus ling+ga chen po'i rdzas dang ldan pas nor bu brtsegs pa lta bu'i gnas su 'dug ste/ thog ma kho nar mi bskyod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin mnyes par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu de'i nga rgyal gyis bdag dang

gnas dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba byas la/ rang gi snying gar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa la gnas pa'i hUM yig nag po gser gyi mdangs can las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse dgu pa gyen du langs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i ngang tshul can/ dbus kyi rwa rtse rnam pa dkar po nor bu'i tog

gis mtshan pa dang / rwa gzhan gnag cing kun nas bgrad pas 'jigs par byed pa de nyid kyi lta bar zla ba dri ma med pa la hUM yig bai DUr+ya'i 'od 'bar bas mtshan pa blta bar bya'o/ /yi ge de'i 'od kyis nam mkha'i dbyings khyab par bkang nas zhing gi dkyil 'khor

yongs su sbyor ba'i don gnyis byas te/ tshur 'dus pa las rje btsun rmugs 'dzin nag po sras dang bcas pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang mnyam pa spyan drangs la/ khrus gsol ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa'i yan lag bcu gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /mnyes pa'i 'od

kyi phreng ba bdag gi snying la zhugs te bskul ba'i yid kyis tshad med pa bzhi spel zhing / byang chub kyi sems brtan pa yang dag pa goms pa bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer chen pos brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po mtha' dag rnam par bzhu nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor

thim pa dang / yang ches cher 'bar bas rang gi lus kyang nye bar bsregs nas gzi brjid kyi phung po sgyu ma lta bu'i bdag nyid du bsam mo/ /de'i 'og tu oM a zhes skad gsang bstod de sbran pas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi mgon po byang phyogs kyi tshal rdo rje'i ri bo'i

zom nas spyan drangs te/ kun nas dang zhing sim la gdung ba'i yid kyis rgyu'i sems dpa' de 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'bar ba la bstim par bya'o/ /de dag yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das nor gyi dbang phyug /lha dang klu dang mi'i nor thams cad 'dzin pa mthing nag 'jigs

pa'i gzugs can mi'u thung gi cha byad rigs ngan gyi rnam pa/ rna ba ma phug pa/ lhag ma za zhing mi srun pa/ gsus pa cher 'phyang zhing rab tu brjid pa'i bdag nyid/ khye'u lo drug lon pa'i na tshod can/ gcer bu mtshan ma 'greng ba/ zhabs gnyis 'dor stabs su nye bar gnas

pas nor 'dzin ser po kha nas nor bu skyugs pa'i mgo g.yas su rnam par mnan pa/ mche ba cung zad gtsigs shing / ljags rkan phugs su nye bar 'dril ba/ zhal dang spyan gsum me'i phung po ltar 'bar zhing / spyan kun nas zlum zhing bzlog la rnam par bsgyur ba can/ dbral

ba la rin po che mig gsum pa'i gzugs can gyi khro gnyer gyi rim pa dang ldan pa/ dbu skra dang sma ra dang smin ma rnams kyi spu kham pa re re nas gyen du langs shing 'od 'phro ba'i me stag thur du 'dzag pa/ phyag g.yas dang g.yon gyis pad+ma'i snod du ti ras bkang ba dang / ne'u le'i rkyal pa

lha dang klu dang mi'i nor bu rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba du mas khengs par byas pa'i kha nas rin po che'i rgyun sna tshogs skyugs pa 'dzin pa/ sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i cod pan gyi rgyan can/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang / pad+ma chen po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / rigs

ldan dang / dung skyong dang / nor rgyas dang / pad+ma rnams nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po dang / khra bo dang / ser po dang / dmar po rnam pa brgyad kyis go rims ltar thor tshugs dang / rna ba dang / do shal dang / tshangs skud dang / dpung pa

dang / lag pa dang / rked pa dang / rkang pa rnams la brgyan pa'o/ /thugs kar zla ba la ji skad bshad pa'i snying po can gyi mtshan ma bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i yi ge bcu'i go cha bgo bar bya ste/ dpral ba dang / zhal dang / dpung pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa dang / thugs

ka dang / zhabs ngar g.yas g.yon dang / chu so dang / zhabs bol gong g.yas dang / g.yon dang / grangs bzhin du/ oM dang / dzaM dang / b+ha dang / la dang / dza dang / len dang / dra dang / ye dang / swA dang / hA rnams kyi yig 'bru rnams zla ba'i gdan dang / rdo rje phyed pa la

gnas pa nyi ma'i snying po 'bar ba'am gser gyi mchod sdong rnam par dag pa ltar bsam par bya'o/ /thugs dkyil mi phyed yi ge las 'phros phyogs bcu'i 'dren pa kun mchod cing / /go cha bcur bcas skyob dbang nyid 'phros ma lus 'gro rnams rang 'drar byas/ /ne'u le klu dbang nor

bdag 'od ldan lha klu mi yi nor rnams bsdus/ /zos shing zos te 'grangs gyur btsir bas de skyugs dngos grub yang yang blang / /de nas chu sbyin par bya ste/ lag pa'i mthil du baM ser po las gser gyi bum pa bzang po rin po che sna tshogs skyugs pa kha phyir bsgyil ba'i yi ge baM de nyid kyis

mtshan par blta'o/ /baM gyi nang du dzaM yig go/ /mkhrig ma la ni oM mo/ /mdzub mo la ni b+ha'o/ /gung mo la ni la'o/ /srin lag la dza'o/ /mthe'u chung la len no/ /mthe bong la dra'o/ /nor bu mching ba'i gnas su ye'o/ /lag mthil gyi lto g.yon du swA'o/ /de'i

g.yas su hA'o/ /thams cad kyang zla ba la gnas shing / gser 'od dri ma dang bral ba lhag par 'tsher ba ltar bsam mo/ /de nas yang chu khyor ba gang kha la nye bar gtugs te/ oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA zhes bya bas sor mo lnga la lan re re dang / kha dang lag pa byin gyis brlab pa

la gnyis te bdun gyis byin gyis brlab bo/ /de'i 'og tu nag po chen po mdzes pa'i sku yongs su rdzogs pa zhig mdun gyi pad+ma'i rin po che'i snod du zhugs te/ rang gi thugs ka nas ci 'dra ba'i sku gzugs phyung ste bstims la/ rin po che'i bum pa rgyan thams cad kyis spras pa

yongs su gang bas rgyun mi 'chad pas chu sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ltar bya ste/ oM dz+luM swA hA zhes bya bas rin po ches brgyan pa'i lag pa nas zhal du'o/ /zhal nas rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo ru'o/ /de nas slar lag mthil du 'bab pa'i rim pas mthar chu'i bdag po'i zhal du 'jug par

bsams te/ cho ga de nyid kyis khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad 'khrul pa med par sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i tshe phyag gi mthil gyi bum pa dang / ne'u le dang ltos 'gro rnams kyi kha dang sna'i sgo la sogs pa bu ga'i rnam pa thams cad las rin po che'i rigs mi 'dra ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnam

pa du ma'i char chen po phab pas gnas khang la sogs pa mtha' dag yog cing nor gyis gang bar gyur par bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la yi ge bcu pa la mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i sngags sbyar bas mchod cing / thun mong dang khyad par gyi sgo nas bstod do/ /sngags de dag nyid kyis gtor ma byin

gyis brlabs te dbul bar bya'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM dzaM m+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA/ zhes lan bdun nam brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas te ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas yang mchod pas gtang rag phul te me tog

dbu la bzhag nas yi ge brgya pas lhag chad kha bskang la rten spyi bo dang chu'i phud srin lag gis reg ste lce la bzhag cing / chu'i tshogs rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ngogs su dor bar bya'o/ /de ltar zla ba drug la sogs par nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bar ma chad par chu sbyin pa la brtson

par byed na/ des ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i 'byor pa thams cad gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug snying po gter bum las/ /lcags kyus lcag btab zas nor ster/ /bram ze'i tshangs skyogs lnga tshan lngas/ bkang te bcud bsdus dngos grub len/ /rin chen

snying po nyi zla dang / /pad+ma rab sbyangs bde chen thob/ /rim bzhin gnod sbyin ne+e'u le mo/ /thod khrag pur ling sbyor bar bshad/ /dbyar dgun ston zla tha chungs dang / /dpyid zla 'bring la rten bzhengs nas/ /'di nyid rgyal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /dam tshig ye shes mnyam sbyor

bya/ /rna ba mnan dang mdangs 'phrog dang / /dgra bo byis pa'i gzugs 'jigs pas/ /rigs ngan gdug pa'i las gsum byed/ /khro zhal phrin las bgegs skrod yin/ /klu rgyal gdon 'grol char 'bebs byed/ /nor bdag gzir bas nor rnams 'phrog /rig

'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed dang / /'jigs skyob rkun po srung ba nyid/ /bu ster tshe ni bsring ba dang / /phyugs skyong bskyed cing gzugs pa dang / /dbang bskur bkra shis gsol ba ste/ /rim bzhin oM nas swA hA'i bar/ /'od dang lhan cig rjes 'gro dang / /slar bzlog yi

ge bcu yis so/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad khros pa yis/ /tsha ba dug dang khrag ske tshe/ /mar khus lus byugs pur ling gdung / /bdun phrag gcig gis spogs na 'grub/ /ye ya d+ha na me d+he baM swA hA/ snyigs dus sgrub rnams rab dbul nyen rnams kyis/ /phan 'dod bzhin yang rang gzhan

don nyams par/ /mthong nas rmugs 'dzin cho ga tshul bzhin bris/ /dge bas kun la 'dod sbyin ster gyur cig/ dpal rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba nag po'i sgrub thabs gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba sbas pa'i bum pa 'khyil ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon nor sbyin gyis mdzad

pa rdzogs so// //dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis/ bod yul gyi dbus/ ngam shod kyi mthil/ bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang rgyal po'i pho brang yid

bzhin nor bu'i mdzod dbu rtse rim gsum lha khang gi steng du bkra shis pa'i nyi ma la bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la kr-iSh+Na sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la nag po sgrub pa'i thabs/ 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /'phags pa dzam+b+ha la bsgrub par 'dod pas/ yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i go 'phang thob par byas te/ sems can thams cad mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba la dgod par bya/ de'i ched du dzam+b+ha la la chu phul la

mchod par bya snyam du sems bskyed la/ gnas dang bdag dang rnal 'byor srung ba ni gzhan dang mthun/ rang gi snying gar yi ge a dkar po 'od zer 'phro ba dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yi ge hUM nang nag la phyi ser ba/ 'od zer ser po

'phro ba bsams la/ de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse dgu pa hUM dang kha dog mtshungs pa bsgom/ de'i lte ba'i nang du hUM bsam/ hUM de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros shing / /ngag tu oM a zhes brjod pas/ phyogs mtshams thams cad nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i u tsuSh+ma

bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs pa la/ dad cing gus pas phyag 'tshal dngos su 'byor pa dang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bdun rnam dag bya/ tshad med pa bzhi bsgom pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pa yin/ de nas yang

rdo rje hUM/ zla ba rnams las 'od 'phros pas snod bcud la phog /de 'od du zhu slar 'od kyi gnas la thim/ mdun gyi 'phags pa'ang oM a zhes brjod pas rdo rje dang hUM dang tha mi dad du gyur/ rang lus kyang 'od du zhu nas rdo rje la sogs pa la thim/ de rnams rmi lam sgyu ma ltar bsam/ de

ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa yin/ rdo rje hUM zla ba utsuSh+ma hUM gi 'od zer de lnga po yongs su gyur pa las/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rnam thos kyi bu sku mdog ser po mgo g.yas su bstan pa/ gan rkyal du nyal ba/ kha nas rin po che sna tshogs skyugs pa/ dbu rgyan la sogs pa rin po che

sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ de'i mgo thur du mnan pa/ 'od zer phreng ba 'khrug cing 'phro ba'i gdan gyi lte bar/ dbang po sbas pa ltar gnag pa'i dza yig yongs su gyur pa las/ utsuSh+ma byis pa'i gzugs can shin tu nag pa/ rna ba ma phug pa/ rna ba thung ba/ skra kham pa gyen

du brdzes pa/ lus thung ba mthug pa/ gsus pa che ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ spyan dmar ba/ khro gnyer bsnyer ba/ spyan zlum pa/ phyag gnyis kyi g.yas pa na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa nu ma g.yas pa la brten cing zhal du gsol ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na

rin po che sna tshogs skyugs pa'i ne'u le pus mo g.yon gyi steng du bzung ba/ zhabs g.yas bskum pas gdan gyi mgo bo mnan pa/ g.yon brkyang bas rkang pa mnan pa/ mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa/ gcer bu thor tshugs la klu mtha' yas nag pos dkris pa/ rna ba/ do shal/ tshangs

skud/ dpung pa/ lag pa/ rked pa/ rkang pa rnams la rim pa ltar/ 'jog po dmar po/ pad+ma chen po dkar po/ stobs kyi rgyu sngon po/ rigs ldan khra bo/ dung skyong ser po/ ba su ki dkar po/ pad+ma dkar po ste klu chen brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar zla ba'i gdan la

rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ de'i lte bar zla ba'i gdan la hUM/ dpral bar oM/ lce la dzaM/ dpung pa g.yas la b+ha/ g.yon la la/ thugs kar dza/ lte ba la len/ ngar gdong g.yas la dra/ g.yon la ye/ bol gong g.yas la swA/ g.yon la hA/ yi ge de rnams zla ba'i gdan dang bcas

pa'o/ /kha dog gnag cing 'od ser po 'phro ba'o/ /yi ge de rnams dang thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang gi hUM zla ba'i gdan rnams las 'od 'phros te/ sems can la reg pas thams cad dzam+b+ha lar gyur nas yid kyis hUM la bsdu/ yang de rnams las 'od 'phros/ rin po che thams cad

bsdus te rlung nang du rngubs pas klu chen brgyad dang / rnam thos bu dang / ne'u le'i kha nang du song / phyir rgyu bas de rnams kyi kha nas skyugs nas rin po che'i phung po chen po byung / yang zos yang skyugs pa lan mang du bsgom/ de rjes su rang gi lag pa g.yas par oM las

DA ki'i gzugs kyi lag pa'i mthil du baM yig las 'od zer 'phros pas skyes bu'i bum pa bzang po'i lag par bsams pa'i bum nang du dzaM/ mkhrig ma la oM/ mdzub mo la b+ha/ gung mo la la/ srin lag la dza/ mthe'u chung la len/ mthe bong la dra/ mkhrig ma'i mtshams su ye/

g.yon la swA/ g.yas la hA/ re re la zla ba'i gdan re'o/ /de nas zangs gzhong la sogs pa'i nang du rten yod na bzhugs/ med na rang dang 'dra ba'i rten mdun du bskyed la/ chu khyor ba gang la/ oM in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ zhes pa lan bdun gyis byin gyis brlab/ chu khyor ba gang

khar blugs par bsams te phul ba khar song bas/ khong nang gi dzaM gyis ser por gyur snying ga'i hUM la sogs pa'i nus pas bdud rtsir gyur pa slar gyen du log ste rang gi lag pa'i mthil du byung ba/ mdun gyi dzam+b+ha la'i zhal du phul bar bsam zhing / oM dz+luM swA hA zhes pa lan re dang chu

khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa 'di gnyis so/ /mjug tu/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA zhes lan bdun brjod la chu khyor ba bdun dbul/ 'di nyid gtor ma'i sngags kyang yin/ de nas rten chu nang nas bton te logs

su bzhugs/ bskyed pa yin na badzra muHsa gshegs/ gtor ma gtsang sar gtang / rgyun du sngags zlos la/ oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye swA hA zhes pa dang na mo rat+na tra yA ya la sogs sngags phreng 'dam kha yin gsung / zla ba drug gis nges par 'grub par the tshom mi dgos gsung /

rjes su bdag gzhan thams cad kyi tshe dang bsod nams 'phel ba dang / dpal 'byor rgyas pa dang / 'khor dang chab srid 'phel ba dang / 'dod pa'i don ci dang ci bsams pa thams cad myur du 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab bsngo ba dang smon lam bya'o/ /dzam+b+ha la nag

po'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa paN chen shAkya shrI'i zhal nas gsungs pa/ gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yi lha/ /mgon po 'gro kun phongs pa sel/ /mi'u thung gzugs can nag po che/ /u tsuSh+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes pa'i

bstod pas bstod par bya'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+ra ye bi she Sha stod tra na ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la khyad par gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor gyi dbang phyug rin

chen gter mnga' ba/ /lcags kyus lcag btab 'dod dgu sbyin par byed/ /nyi shu drug ldan gsang sngags yi ge yis/ /lha min lha dang mi'am cis 'dud rgyal/ /nyi shu lnga yi sman mchog gis gang ba'i/ /tshangs skyogs las grub dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rab 'bab bcud

kyi ril bu sbyin mdzad gang / /nor rgyun lha mos legs bstan khyed la 'dud/ /thabs chen shes rab zab sbyangs rin chen gyi/ /snying po nyi zla'i sbyor ba las byung ba/ /dga' chen ye shes bzhi yi sam bu ti/ /mchog brnyes rmugs 'dzin khyed zhabs rtag tu 'dud/ /dzaM yig las

skyes lha chen yi ge bzhis/ /legs drangs rdo rje'i thugs gsung skur ldan pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan brgya rab ldan pa/ /nyams dgu'i gar gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /Sh+ToM pa Ni ro d+ha'i rna ba mnan/ /phu brgyad kha yis dgra bo'i mdangs 'phrog byed/ /lugs bzlog

lugs 'byung bzhi gnyis yi ge yis/ /byis pa'i srog dang gzugs 'jig mdzad la 'dud/ /klu brgyad rgyan gyis nor bu'i gdon 'grol zhing / /chu 'dzin sprin 'dra'i lus la char chen 'bebs/ /khyod ni nor bdag gzir bas sa gsum gyi/ /nor 'phrog zhal bzhis

bgegs 'joms mdzad la bstod/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod kyi yi ge bcus/ /rig 'dzin dgug dang gter 'byed 'jigs las skyob/ /rkun po srung dang bu ster tshe bsring dang / /phyugs skyong skyed shing dbang bskur shis mdzad 'dud/ /gang phyir sa gsum skye bo rmugs

byed pa'i/ /nor 'dzin sa brgyad dbang phyug yud tsam zhig /mthong nas gus 'phel nyi shus bstod bgyis pas/ /sgrub rnams phrin las nyi shus rgyal gyur cig/ /'phags pa rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po la phrin las nyi shu'i sgo nas khyad par gyi bstod pa zhes bya

ba/ slob dpon chen po nor 'dzin dpal gyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis mang yul gyi grong du 'phags pa wa ti'i pho brang du bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la stotra/ bod skad du/

'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod sbyin brgya pa me lha gdong bzhi dang / /seng ge 'phrog byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis/ /zhabs gnyis la btud bcom ldan sdug bsngal ba/ /bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras

gzigs/ /bcom ldan chab khyor gang gis mnyes 'gyur na/ /thugs rje mnga' ba gzhan gang lags pa gsungs/ /de phyir mchod pa bshams la mi rtsi zhing / /khyod dang 'dra ba phal cher rnyed par dka'/ /brtse bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal btsal nas/ /phongs par gyur pa

bdag la bde mdzad na/ /kho bo mchi ma dag gis gdong sbags pa/ /spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags/ /e ma'o rab tu rgyas pa thugs rje yi/ /gzhu mo mnga' ba khyod lta bzhugs gyur kyang / /skye tshogs bzlog dka' sdug bsngal chom rkun gyi/ /sde yis rnam

par 'joms par ji ltar lags/ /sems can sman slad nor bu rin po che/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dgung char 'bebs drag na/ /kho bo khyod nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa/ /ci ste thigs pa yang ni 'bebs ma lags/ /khyod bzhugs bzhin du me yis 'bar ba ltar/ /kho bo phongs

pas shin tu cher bsreg na/ /khyod kyis lta zhig thugs rje 'jo ba'i ba/ /sa gsum khur du khur ba gang du thal/ /bum pa dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi/ /nor bu sems dpa' dang ldan ma lags pa/ /de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid na/ /thugs rje'i bdag

can bcom ldan smos ci 'tshal/ /gang zhig rmugs 'dzin chu yi dbang po zhes/ /skad cig kyang ni khyod kyi mtshan smos pa/ /de la pad+ma'i 'byung gnas legs bzhin du/ /pad rgyas dpal ni 'jug par bgyid pa lags/ /de ltar bcom ldan srid 'joms khyod spyan sngar/ /cho

nges btab pa'i bsod nams 'byam klas pa/ /gang yin de yis skye bo khyod bzhin du/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par shog /bcom ldan 'das rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa slob dpon chen po btsun pa zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ti ta

shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba tshab nyi ma grags kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzam+b+ha la sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa/ 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan chu

dbang mgon po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis brjid pa'i sku/ /sku mdog sngo nag 'od zer 'phro/ /mi bskyod sangs rgyas dbu la bzhugs/ /klu chen brgyad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dgos 'dod 'byung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag g.yas thod pa khrag bkang bsnams/ /g.yon pa

gter gyi ne'u le 'dzin/ /'gro ba dbul bas rab gdungs pa'i/ /re 'dod skong la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khro bo'i cha lugs dbu skra gyen du brdzes/ /mi'u thung byis pa gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa/ /nor bdag gdan la brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs/ /dgos 'dod ma lus

'byung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mche ba rab gtsigs hUM sgras ma rungs gdul/ /dran pa tsam gyis ci bsams 'grub par mdzad/ /yid bzhin nor bu yon tan kun ldan pa/ /dpal ldan chu dbang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /u tsuSh+ma la gus pas bstod pa yis/ /bsod nams

mtha' yas dam pa gang thob des/ /bdag dang sems can ma lus thams cad kyi/ /dbul phongs sdug bsngal 'ching las grol bar shog /'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa paN+Di ta dz+nyA na badzra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ dzam+b+ha la sto tra/

bod skad du/ dzam+b+ha la'i bstod pa/ dzam+b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dang lha min dri za mi'am ci rnams kyi/ /cod pan 'od kyis zhabs kyi khri ni gsal mdzad pa/ /byang chub mchog tu nges mdzad gnod sbyin dbang phyug la/ /sems can rnams la sman pa'i bsam

pas bdag gis gsol/ /gang zhig brtse ba'i bdag nyid byang chub sbyin mdzad khyod/ /snying rje'i rtsa ba sems can don du rab tu grags/ /mgon khyod sems can rnams la brtse bar mi mdzad na/ /khyod kyis sangs rgyas dran par gang gi 'gyur te 'tshal/ /shin tu mi bzad

dbul ba'i sdug bsngal nang du ni/ /'gro rnams lhung ba khyod kyis mthong bar ma gyur tam/ /rin chen gter chen rnams kyi mtshan nas bzung byas nas/ /khyod kyis chu bo yang ni rdzing gis bcing bar mdzod/ /shin tu dbul ba'i byin za mi bzad drag po yis/ /'gro ba gang zhig

nyin dang mtshan du sreg par byed/ /brtse ba nyid kyis ser sna rnam par spong mdzod la/ /rin chen bdud rtsi'i char gyi char rgyun drag tu phob/ /khyod ni rgod pas brgya byin gyis ni rgyal srid dang / /spyan zur tsam gyis khyab 'jug gis ni dpal mo dang / /mnyes pas dbang phyug

gis ni gangs ri'i gnas kyang thob/ /mgon po sdug phongs 'gron bu tsam yang mi ster ram/ /'gro ba'i dbang phyug rnams la dpag med bde ba rnams/ /rtag tu khyod ster sdug bsngal can la de lta min/ /khyod kyis sngon ma mthong ba snying rje'i yul gyur pa'i/ /dbul ba'i sdug

bsngal can la ji ltar khyod 'jigs sam/ /nor gyis nor slong gus ldan rnams la khyod 'gengs kyi/ /yang dag skal med sdig byas rnams la khyod min zhing / /nor gtong nor gyis nor ldan par ni 'dzin gyur te/ /mgon po slong ba'i tshogs rnams nges par spong byed dam/ /gal te

khyod kyis nor gtong rnams la khyod kyis ster/ /skye bo tsheg ngan rnams la ji ltar khyod 'jigs sam/ /rab tu 'bad pas nges par smra ba de yis mchog /gnod sbyin rgyal po bdag gis gsol ba gsan du gsol/ /rab tu 'bad byas de 'dra'i nor dang ldan gyur nas/ /ji ltar

dbul po'i sgra ni thos par ma gyur cig/ /dbul po'i me ni rab tu 'bar bas 'gro ba rnams/ /sreg par nges mthong yid kyis ngo mtshar nyid du gyur/ /gang zhig bdag gis smras pa'i tshig rtsub tshig rnams ni/ /chu yi dbang pos brtse phyir 'di rnams bzod par mdzod/ /gang zhig

bstod pa 'di yis ni/ /rtag tu 'bad pas dzaM la bstod/ /des ni dbul por mi 'gyur zhing / /shin tu mi g.yo'i dpal thob shog/ /mi'i dbang po nyi ma rnam par gnon pas dzam+b+ha la la bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kal+yA Na mi tra gzhon nu shes rab kyis bskul nas/

rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma d+hA ra dang yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ u tsuSh+ma dzam+b+ha la u pa de sha sto tra/ bod skad du/ rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gi bstod pa/ dpal rdo rje

sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po nam mkha'i mdog can nor gyi char 'bebs pa/ /ma skyes rang bzhin dag pas sku mdog nag por bzhugs/ /khyod ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de bdag dran na/ /khyod la 'dud kyis thugs rjes ci yi phyir mi gzigs/ /lo drug byis pa'i

gzugs la gzhon pa'i sha rgyas pa/ /'dzum la khro la byams pa'i mche ba dkar po gtsigs/ /khro gnyer dpral bar bsnyer zhing ral pa dmar ser langs/ /dbul ba sel mdzad spyan yangs snying rje can la 'dud/ /mi bskyod dbu la bzhugs pas thugs kyi rig 'dzin cing / /

byams pas kun la khros te gcer bu sbrul gyis brgyan/ /oM a las skyes nor sbyin gdan la bzhugs shing 'gying / /re ba skong mdzad dpag bsam shing 'dra khyod la 'dud/ /phyag g.yas snying rjes don mdzad thod pa khrag gis bkang / /phyag g.yon nor sbyin ma bzung ne'u les

rin chen 'bebs/ /g.yas g.yon zhabs kyis rnam thos sras kyi rkang brdzis/ /nor bdag gan rkyal gnon cing brgyad bskum bzhugs la 'dud/ /rna ba ma phug rigs ngan cha lugs lhag ma za/ /lag nas kha ru 'o ma'i bdud rtsi rtsa lam rdo rje nas byung ste/ /gur gum

mdog 'dra zhal du phul bas mnyes mdzod la/ /nyid kyis bdag gi bsam mkhyen re ba myur du skongs/ /yi ge bcu pas byin brlabs me tog dang bcas pas/ /oM las 'od 'phros gdub bu rin chen spras pas brgyan/ /oM las byung ba'i bum pa bzang pos

chu phul nas/ /bcom ldan mgon po ci phyir re ba mi bskong lags/ /'gro drug kun la re bskong nor gyi char pa dag /ci 'dod mang po 'bebs pa'i thugs rje grags lags na/ /bdag gis mos pas khyod kyi yon tan rtag tu brjod/ /thigs pa gcig kyang mi stsol skal ba med dam

ci/ /nyi ma re re bzhin du rtag tu khyod 'bod na/ /bdag ni yi chad sgyid lugs gdong pa dag mod kyang / /khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas thugs rje gang du thal/ /gter chen skal ba med kyang log 'tsho med tsam byin/ /bdag gis snying nas smras kyang da dung ma gzigs na/ /sa gsum

kun la snyoms par dam ni ma bcas sam/ /bdag la skal ba med kyang thugs rjes cis mi gzigs/ /sems can min nam dbul pa'i sdug bsngal bral bar mdzod/ /bdag gis bos pas khyod kyi thugs rje'i zhags pa yis/ /srid 'dir dbul ba sol ba bde chen gnas su

drongs/ /'jigs la 'jigs par mi byed khyod kyis byin brlabs te/ /'di dang pha rol gnyis kar rtag tu bskyab par mdzod/ /rmugs 'dzin 'chol ba'i man ngag gi bstod pa bla ma d+ha byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha cig slob dpon nyi ma sbas pas mdzad do zhes

kyang zer skad do/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ de bI ba su d+ha rI sto tra/ bod skad du/ lha mo nor rgyun ma la bstod pa/ lha mo nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma bum pa rin chen gter ldan steng / /de steng skyon bral nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /gdod nas dag
