dor bar bya'o/ /de nas langs te/ oM b+ha k+Sha swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge lnga'i sngags kyis lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams byin gyis brlabs la/ lag pa'i dbus su dbyangs drug pa rnams par bkod de/ de yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms la/ de'i steng du ba'i 'o ma ltar

mdog dkar po dang ldan pa'i yi ge haM rnam par bkod de/ lag pa des chu la mngon par bsngags la/ ku ru kul+le'i sngags kyis gang gi kha ru chu blugs pa de skad cig de nyid la dug skyug par 'gyur ro/ /brtan pa 'am ni g.yo ba 'am/ /bcos pa yi ni dug kyang rung / /mche ba'i dug gam dran

pa'i ngag reg dang mthong ba'i dug la sogs/ /sbrul dag gis ni zos pa yi/ /dug ni skad cig de la 'joms/ /tha na drag po'i mgrin gnas pa'ang / /ma lus par ni 'joms byed na/ /kA la ku Ta'ang 'joms pa ni/ /'gyur ba ru ni the tshom med/ /de bas mkha' lding mchod pa'i phyir/ /rnal

'byor pas ni gtor ma'i las/ /gzhan la phan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /brtson pa yis ni kun du bya/ /bza' btung khyad par can sogs dang / /gos dang rgyan dang byug pa yis/ /sems can khams ni ma lus pa/ /rab gsol las byung bsod nams gang / /bsod nams de ni sems can gcig /

srog ni yongs su bsrungs las byung / /de bas dug ni gzhom pa'i phyir/ /mkha' lding bdag po'i gtor mar 'dod/ /de ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod las/ /bdag gis gtor ma'i cho ga gsal bar btus/ /mkhas pas sems can la ni phan gdags phyir/ /'bad pa yis ni rtag pa nyid

du bya/ /dpal rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod kyi nang nas btus pa'i mkha' lding gi gtor ma'i cho ga'o// //ro langs gtor ma bsgrub pa ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud las gsungs/ /cho ga yis ni rim bzhin du/ /gsal bar de nas yang dag bshad/ /gtor ma'i las ni thams cad la/ /bsgoms

pa'i stobs kyis 'byung po rnams/ /bskyed nas mgu bar bya zhes grags/ /rnal 'byor pas 'dir de bzhin min/ /dang por ro langs dag gi tshogs/ /sngags kyi mthu yis bslangs nas ni/ /de nas 'das sogs kun dris nas/ /snying rje chen pos gtor ma sbyin/ /re zhig dang por shin tu

'jigs/ /dur khrod ro yis 'jigs byed par/ /song nas dogs med sems kyis ni/ /mtshan mo ro ni btsal bar bya/ /rgyal pos nyes pa la brten nas/ /sgegs par gyur pa gang yin dang / /bsal shing la bskyon yan lag ni/ /ma nyams ro chen btsal bar bya/ /'khyud pa dang

ni'o byas te/ /de bzhin dpyang thag bya ba yis/ /dgyes gang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /'di gsungs mA ma kI la gsungs/ /ro langs chen po bsgrub pa ni/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /mar ngo'i brgyad dam bcu bzhi la/ /mtshan ma gcig gam bzhi mdo 'am/ /shing gcig gam ni dur

khrod dam/ /chu yi 'gram dang ri bo ru/ /bya ba dag ni thams cad bsgrub/ /de bzhin ro langs bslang ba na/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /'gegs nas shi ba gang yin pa/ /gdol pa 'am ni g.yung mo 'ang rung / /sdug cing mdzes la rma med pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis so

dang ldan/ /lo ni nyi shu rtsa lnga lon/ /yang na btsa' ba'i dus su ni/ /shi ba'i bud med bslang bar bya/ /sngags dang sman dang ldan pa yi/ /chu mdog dag gis khrus bya zhing / /tsan+dan dkar po gla rtsi yis/ /de la rnam par byug par bya/ /spos dang me tog dag gis mchod/ /gtor ma

sna tshogs sbyin par bya/ /til mar chen pos byugs nas na/ /nyungs kar gyis ni gdong la rdeg /sgrub pa pos ni he ru ka / zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor de bri bya/ /zla ba phyed pa thod mtshungs pa/ /gzhu bdungs pa yi rnam pa can/ /rig ma brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /thod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes/ /

gzhi ni thod pa dag yin te/ /thams cad kha T+w+'aM ga bsnams pa/ /spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can te/ /spyan drug ral gri phyag bsnams pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'di yi phyi rol du/ /sgo srung dag ni rab tu brtag /ba lang sna dang glang po'i sna/ /bzhin bzangs de bzhin bzhin ngan pa/ /drag po'i zhags

pa lcags kyu thogs/ /mi sdug rnam gtsigs 'jigs rung ba/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /spos dang me tog la sogs bri/ /rol cha rnam pa sna tshogs mchog /dkyil 'khor du ni rim bzhin bri/ /de nas dpa' bo sgrub pa po/ /he ru ka yi gzugs 'dzin pa/ /dud chen dag gis rnam par

brgyan/ /kha na sha chen za byed pa/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ /shin tu rnam gtsigs 'jigs rung bas/ /de ru cang te'u brdung bya zhing / /gar gyis grong khyer 'jug par bya/ /lus la sngags kyis go bgos pas/ /der ni yi ge phaT brjod bya/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni sngar bzhin du/ /

khrag chen po yis bsang gtor bya/ /he ru ka yi sngags chen po/ /sgrub pa pos ni bzlas par bya/ /khro bo bcas nas ro langs ni/ /'brug gi sgra ni sgrogs par 'gyur/ /sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing / /he ru ka ni rjes dran bya/ /he ru ka ni 'jigs rung bshad/ /tshangs pa'i yul sa za

byed brtson/ /drag po chen po lcags bskyod pa/ /'gro ba kun du sdud pa po/ /ha ha zhes ni sgrogs bshad pa/ /'jigs byed ji bzhin 'jigs rung ba/ /rgya mtsho'i gling gi me ltar 'bar/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis dang mtshungs 'od/ /dpa' bo dbang phyug gzugs can dpa'/ /khams gsum dag ni g.yo mdzad

pa/ /sgom pa'i bdag ldan de yi gzugs/ /sgrub pa pos ni dbang po bsam/ /langs par gyur nas ro langs de/ /sgrub pa po la 'di skad smra/ /dpal chen bdag gis ci zhig bgyi/ /rdo rje can mchog bka' stsol cig /ral gri mig sman sa 'og dang / /mkha' spyod phan par bya ba dag /ji ltar

bsgrub par 'dod bzhin bu/ /las de rab tu sgrub par byed/ /yid la 'dod pa'i las gang yin/ /sgrub pa pos ni de la brjod/ /de dag thams cad sgrub par byed/ /pad+ma rgya chen mA ma kI/ /de nas de yi kha las ni/ /'das dang ma 'ongs sogs zhes bya/ /rgyal po la sogs tshe tshad dang / /bdag

nyid kyi yang de las yin/ /sha chen rgun chang zang zing dang / /skye ba bdun pa las byung ba/ /sha ni chen po dag gis kyang / /de nas de la gtor ma sbyin/ /yang na lus ni ma nyams pa/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs can yon tan ldan/ /ba lang kha na ma tho med/ /rnyed nas gtor ma'i snod du gzhug /

bdud rtsi dag gis kha bkang nas/ /he ru ka yi gzugs 'dzin cing / /sngags pa phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ /rdo rje dril bu snyems bcas pas/ /bshang gci khrag ldan bud med gos/ /bdud rtsi gu gul gyis thod par/ /ro bsregs me la spos gtul te/ /sgra yi mchod pa phyir ldan zhing / /

de byas sor gdub dang ldan pas/ /'bebs par byed pa'i mchog 'gyur te/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ shrI he ru ka khA ya bid ma he/ /bid+yA rA dza yA d+hi ma he swA hA/ zhes bya de yis phab nas ni/ /mkha' spyod phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /blo gros chen pos ro

langs la/ /lag pa gnyis su gtor ma sbyin/ /'di yi sngags ni 'di yin te/ /hUM badzra ka ra mu kha ya na maHshrI badzra rA ga sa mA yA na maHkha T+'aM ga badzra pra dza la ya ya na maHshrI badzra g+haN+Da tsa la yA ya na maHlag pa g.yas dang g.yon dag gis/ /sgeg bcas rtsed mo'i gar dag gis/ /bskal bzang rdo rje

ha har bshad/ /gtor ma'i mchod pa sbyin par bya/ /de ni rnal 'byor gyis bteg ste/ /che mchog las byung mchog 'dzin pas/ /dpral ba ru ni bskor byas te/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzung bar bya/ /de nas gar byed phab byas nas/ /lha mo'i rnal 'byor gyis glu dag /blang zhing phyag rgya

brgyad kyis ni/ /de nyid gsang ba la sbyar bya/ /de ltar thams cad byas nas ni/ /gtor ma'i cho ga rab rdzogs nas/ /de nas ro langs de yid ni/ /mgu bar rtogs nas gus bcas pas/ /de la rnal 'byor bde mchog gis/ /tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya/ /khyod kyi mgul nas zhags pa gang / /de ni grogs

mchog nga la byin/ /kha nas byung bar gyur pa yin/ /pe ne 'di ni nga la byin/ /de nas zhags pa pe ne dag/ /de yis de la ster bar 'gyur/ /de dag blangs nas rnal 'byor pa'i/ /rmad chen las ni byed par 'gyur/ /zhags pa'i thal ba blangs nas ni/ /chu grang lhan cig 'thung byed gang / /brjed byed 'jigs pa chen

po las/ /de ni skad cig gis grol 'gyur/ /gtsang ba'i don du gang zhig la/ /sngags pa gang gis pe ne byin/ /de ni lag tu slar ldog par/ /'gyur ba ru ni the tshom med/ /de nas btang bar byas nas ni/ /rnal 'byor rang gi gnas 'gro bya/ /smon lam btab ste dge ba nyid/ /yongs su

bsngos te bde bar gnas/ /de ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud las btus pa'i ro langs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga'o// //dpal ldan gdan bzhi'i rgyud gsungs pa'i/ /cho gas rgyas pa'i las la ni/ /chu yi las bya gtor ma'i las/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa'i lha thos te/ /

chu yi sbyin sreg ji lta bu/ /de nyid chu yi sbyin sreg gi/ /mtshan nyid ji ltar shes par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /chu sogs mtshan nyid yang dag pa/ /rdo rje de nyid yang dag byin/ /bla re dag ni rnam par bres/ /sna tshogs gos ni rab tu 'phyang / /dri dag gis ni kun du byugs/ /gru bzhi

shin tu rgya che ba/ /dbus su snod ni dkar po gzhag /rdzas ni dkar pos byug par bya/ /chu ni 'o ma dang bsres shing / /gtsang ma'i chu yis yongs gang ba/ /dri yi chu yis kun du gang / /lcug ma dag gis brgyan gyur pa/ /bum pa brgyad po dag kyang ni/ /phyogs brgyad du ni gzhag par bya/ /skad

cig rnam pas bskyed pa yi/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid la/ /spos dang me tog dri sogs kyis/ /bdag gi dngos po mchod par bya/ /de nas phyi rol gnas su ni/ /chu yi las rnams bya ba yin/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /pad+ma'i rnam par gzung bar bya/ /oM ka ma la ye swA hA/ /pad+ma'i sngags dang phyag

rgya'o/ /chu'i dbus su pad+ma ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor brgyan pa dgod/ /gdugs ni dkar pos g.yogs pa yi/ /sa bon dbus su bsgom par bya/ /rang gi dbugs las byung gyur pa/ /sa bon gyis ni gzugs bskyed bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas/ /rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /

phyag na rdo rje dbyug pa bsnams/ /sku mdog dkar por rab tu grags/ /bzhad cing khro bo sgeg ldan pa/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bstan bya zhing / /dam tshig sngags ni brjod par bya/ /lag gnyis phan tshun khu tshur bcas/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni rab brkyang zhing / /bkug cing mdud

pa byas pa ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags/ /oM sa ma ye tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o/ /shar gyi bum par nor bu bzang / /lho ru gang ba bzang po ste/ /nor sbyin nub kyi bum par ro/ /de bzhin byang du rnam thos sras/ /rna cha bzang po dbang ldan du/ /rtse ldan zhes bya me phyogs su/ /

bden bral phyogs su phreng ldan nyid/ /mu cor smra ba rlung phyogs su/ /yang dang yang du mngon bsngags nas/ /dzaM b+ha la ni dbus su dgod/ /de ni bum pa dgod pa'o/ /nor 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas/ /de nas lag pa la dgod bya/ /lag pa dri yis byugs pa la/ /nor bu bzang sogs yang dag dgod/ /nor bu

bzang po mdzub mo la/ /gang ba bzang po gung mo la/ /nor sbyin gnod sbyin srin lag la/ /rnam thos sras ni mthe'u chung la/ /mthe bong la ni rna cha bzang / /mkhrig mar rtse ldan phreng can dag /lag pa yi ni lag ngar la/ /kun du mu cor smra dbang phyug /yang dang yang du mngon bsngags te/ /dzaM b+ha

la ni dbus su dgod/ /oM dzuM puM buM sa zhes bya ba'i sa bon rnams gung mo nas brtsams te mthe bong la thug pa la dgod par bya'o/ /de nas so so'i phyag mtshan ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bzhin du bstan/ /spos dang me tog la sogs dris/ /mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ /g.yon pa snying

gar gzhag bya zhing / /g.yas pa gong du gzhag bya ba/ /rtsa yi phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags/ /oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM dziM hUM swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /me tog dkar po kun+da sogs/ /dUr ba mdun du dbul bar bya/ /khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni/ /mkhas pas mgo po'i sting du blugs/ /khyor ba re re zhing ni

blugs/ /lan gcig brjod nas dbul bar bya/ /khri phrag gcig gis de yi las/ /thams cad dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /me tog ka ra bI ra sogs/ /me tog kha dog dkar po 'ang rung / /khyor ba khri phrag gcig phul na/ /khyim ni zhi bar byas par 'gyur/ /yam shing nA ga puSh+pa dag /'o ma dang bsres

dbul bya zhing / /khyor ba khri phrag gcig phul na/ /de bzhin grong ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /las rnams kun la sbyar bya zhing / /pad+ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /khri phrag phul ba tsam gyis ni/ /yul ni zhi bar byas par 'gyur/ /pri yang ku dang bil ba dang / /ut+pal dang ku mu da/ /rgyal po'i skyon la sbyar byas na/ /pha rol yul

'khor 'jig par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nang par brgya rtsa brgyad/ /chu la gtor ma sbyin byed pa/ /sngags pa de la yid 'ong pa'i/ /nor dag rgyas par gyur pa yin/ /de nas snga ma bzhin du gser la sogs pa las byas pa'i snod dgu chu dri zhim pos gang bar byas te de'i nad du 'bru dang rin po che dang sman dang de bzhin du ba'i 'o ma bcug

la/ me tog dang spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag pa mchod de/ /sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgyas kyang mngon par rgyas btab nas dril bu dkrol ba sngon du 'gro bas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya swA hA/ ji srid oM mu khe shwa rA ya swA hA zhes bya ba la thug pa'i sngags dgu

brjod la spyan drang ste/ /de rnams mngon sum du gyur par bltas la gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyir yang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM na mo b+ha ga pa te dzaM b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ i maM ba liM pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM badzra dzaM phaT swA hA/ ma ma hi ra N+ya su bar+Na ma Ni muk+ta rat+na he ma ni d+ha ni de hi mAM/

dzi g+h+ran+tu/ pi ban+tu kha dan+tu/ ma ma shAn+ti puSh+Ti ku ru badzra d+ha ri ka ba liM pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra dzaM dzaM dzaM hUM dzUM dzi dza phaT swA hA zhes bya ba brjod la/ drag tu 'brub pa'i chu bo la gtor ma'i snod dgu po dag dor bar bya'o/ /de nas khyod kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /

de ni gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i man ngag gi rim pa'i chu'i sbyin sreg gi chu'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /de nas gtor ma bsgrub pa dang / /de'i bdag rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / /bu ste rnam thos sras kyi ni/ /de bas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /re zhig dang por rang gi khyim mam/ lha khang ngam mchod

rten gyi gnas sam lha'i khang pa 'am/ gang yang rung bar gnas pas nyin zhag rtag tu bya ba'i rim pas gtor ma'ang bya'o/ /bza' bar bya ba'i dang por yi ge dang po yongs su gyur pa las gnod sbyin ma chen mo 'phrog ma gdong gcig pa lag pa gnyis pa kha'i nang mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs

su rung ba kha na lce 'dril ba/ rkang pa'i cha mi'i pags pas g.yogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pas mi'i mgo bo bzung ba g.yas na ngo mtshar gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa/ gar gyi 'gying tshul byas pa sna tshogs mdog can rnam par bsgoms la/ de bzhin du de'i bdag po rdo rje gnod sbyin de kho na bzhin du byung ba ste/

'on kyang gcer bu skra bshig pa rnam par bsgoms te/ de bzhin du de'i bu rnam thos sras yi ge dang po las byung ba mdog dmar po lag pa gnyis pa gdong gcig pa mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i gdong can seng ge la zhon pa g.yon seng ge'i rgyal mtshan thogs pa/ g.yas na rin po che'i gter

thogs pa/ dung gi gter dang / pad+ma'i gter gnyis sgeg pad dang bcas pa'i lag pa g.yon dang g.yas pa na thogs pa'i rnga yab dkar po g.yob par yang rnam par bsgoms la/ de nas de rnams bod pa'i phyir ut+pa la'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /'dir sngags ni oM e h+ye hi ri te yA pa shu pu tra

sha ta pa ri bA re badzra yak+Sha pri ye asmin san+ni hi to b+ha ba swA hA/ bod pa'i sngags so/ /de nas zas kyi snod nas 'bras chan gyi chang bu gsum byas te sa la gzhag par bya'o/ /chang dang sha la sogs pa ji ltar rnyed par cung zad tsam byin la sngags brjod par bya'o/ /oM ha ri t+yai ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye ha ra ha ra/

sarba pA paM ni k+ShiM sarba yak+Sha ni pra be sha ta pa ri bA ra i maM ba liM gr-i h+na gr-i h+na hUM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra yak+Sha ru dra phaT swA hA/ oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la chu'i snod du bcug ste dben par gzhag par bya'o/ /de ni rtag par bya ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /mkha' spyod gtor ma'i rim pa ni/ /cho ga

rab gsal la brten nas/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud rjes 'brangs nas/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /gtor ma'i las la bya rnams las/ /bya rog gi ni rigs rnams bsngags/ /'di ltar de dag mkhas rnams kyis/ /gtor zan nyid du bshad pa yin/ /sngags pas bza' ba'i sngon rol du/ /dur khrod chen

por song nas ni/ /bya rog lha yi bdag nyid can/ /tshim phyir de ru gtor ma bya/ /mngon brjod bla ma'i rim pa bzhin/ /de ru dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /ge sar lte ba dang ldan pa'i/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam/ /de yi dbus su lha mo dgod/ /drag po'i gzugs can mdangs can ma/ /zhal gcig

phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /thod pa kha T+wAM ga yis brgyan/ /phyag na gri gug ma go bsnams nyid/ /lte ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /spyan gsum smin ma kham ldan pa/ /rol pa'i 'dug stangs gar dang ldan/ /sgeg pa la sogs ro ldan pa/ /gar gyi sbyor ldan bsgom par bya/ /khro bo'i rgyal po stobs

chen rnams/ /phyag rnams kun na tho sogs bsnams/ /mi sdug drag po 'jigs rung ba/ /'dab ma brgyad la rnam dgod bya/ /de nas rang rang sngags rnams dang / /spro dang sdud pa byed pa yin/ /mkha' spyod phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /de nas kun du spyan drang bya/ /spos dang me tog mar me dang / /dri

dang lha bshos lnga rnams dang / /mchod yon zhabs bsil rim gyis ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni mchod par bya/ /khwa yi gdong can mkha' 'gro mar/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bsam par bya/ /ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bzhin/ /'khor rnams brgyad po bsam par bya/ /de nas shing rtse la

gnas pa'i/ /bya rog tshogs rnams gus bcas pas/ /khwa gdong cha byad gzugs can dag /rim pa la ni brten nas bsgom/ /de nas de yi sngags kyis ni/ /de rnams kyang ni spyan drang bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni spyan drangs nas/ /de rnams la ni gtor ma dbul/ /zho dang 'bras chan

yid 'ong bas/ /snod ni rab tu gang byas nas/ /blo ldan gyis ni chang pu dgus/ /gnyis pa yang ni dgang bar bya/ /mchod yon me tog sogs rnams kyis/ /sngar bzhin snod gnyis mchod par bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor mnyam gzhag pa/ /khwa yi gdong can gzugs 'dzin cing / /dpa'

bo'i sems ldan brtse bdag gis/ /gtor ma'i sngags ni brjod par bya/ /de nas thugs kyi 'khor lo gnas/ /mkha' spyod ma yi tshogs ji snyed/ /'od ba bya rog gzugs nyid du/ /de dag thams cad der 'ong 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams gnas pa'i/ /mkha' spyod dag ni ci

'dra dang / /ji snyed yod pa de dag kun/ /bya rog rnam par de gnas 'gyur/ /oM na maH shrI badzra DA kA ya oM kA kA s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ /de yis rab tu gang ba'i snod/ /snying gar rab tu bskor byas nas/ /de nas mdun sbyin [(]rnam [,]rnal [)]'byor pas/ /de ru mtshan ma brtag par bya/ /des ni sa rab g.yo bar

gyur/ /phyogs rnams las ni 'brug sgra 'byung / /gla rtsi mtsho skyes dag gi ni/ /dri bsrung yid du 'ong ba'ang 'byung / /de yis slar yang tshim bya zhing / /se gol bcu po dag gis ni/ /phyogs bcu bcings pa sngon 'gro bas/ /sdom brtson gyis ni sngags 'di brjod/ /oM badzra DA ki nya khe tsa ri ru ka

kA pa s+ya tsi la la ga ru Da i maM ba liM gr-i h+NaM tu sa ma ya rak+Shan+tu/ ya thaiSh+TaM sarba sid+d+hi pra yats+tshan+tu hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas shing gcig drung du ni/ /gtor ma chen po der dor nas/ /sngar bzhin gshegs su gsol byas te/ /bstod pa'i tshigs bcad 'di rnams brjod/ /kun du rtog pa'i 'ching ba bcad/ /

'jig rten bya ba grub byed pa'i/ /ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /de snyed rnams la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los sgyur/ /sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan pa/ /'gro ba skyob mdzad dpal ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ni mkha' gror phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ni mkha' spyod ma'i gzugs can gyi bya rog

gi gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /gang gis sa spyod tshogs dag ni/ /mchog tu tshim par 'gyur pa yi/ /phyi'i gtor ma'i rim pa ni/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /dgon pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ches/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsam par bya/ /sngar bzhin 'dab brgyad dag gis ni/ /yongs su mdzes

byas pad+ma ni/ /de dbus lha mo khyi gdong can/ /snga ma bzhin du bsams nas ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang / /de bzhin kho nar rnam par bsam/ /de nas mchod pa rnam lnga yang / /cho ga ji bzhin mchod byas nas/ /'bras chan sha dang khrag rnams kyis/ /gtor ma'i snod ni rab dgang bya/ /gtor snod

yang dag mchod byas nas/ /phyogs bcing bar ni rab byas nas/ /phyag rgya bcings te bzlas byas la/ /de yis spyan drang nyid kyang bya/ /oM A yan+t+ra yan+tu r+d+ra kin+ya sha na wa gA tra ma ho gra b+hI ma wa pu Sha i maM ba liM b+huny+dza/ dzig+h+ra tha/ pi pa tha/ grih+na twaM/ asma kaM/ /puSh+TiM/ ku ru sa ma ya ma nu sma ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di yis ni spyan

drangs pas/ /phyogs bcu nas ni khyi'i gzugs can/ /khyi gdongs spyod 'khor lo dang / /gtor ma bza' phyir mdun 'ong 'gyur/ /de rnams tshim par byas nas ni/ /smon lam btab nas gshegs gsol te/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag sgrub pa po/ /ci 'dod gzugs kyis gnas par bya/ /yang na cho ga gzhan gyis ni/ /ji ltar

'jig rten thams cad la/ /'bras bu bde 'gro ster 'gyur ba/ /khyi rnams la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i don sgrub phyir/ /'pho zhag gnyis la brten nas ni/ /bza' ba'i sngon du gus bcas pas/ /khyi rnams la ni gtor ma sbyin/ /phyi dro khang pa'i sgo khang du/ /tshon rtsi dkar pos dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru bzhi

shin tu mdzes gyur pa/ /ri mo brgyad par rab tu bya/ /kham phor 'bras chan dag dang gzhan/ /tshod ma yid 'ong de bzhin du/ /lha yi yo byad rnams kyis bkang / /sa las byas pa der gzhag bya/ /gnyis pa chang gis kun du dgang / /snod ni de yi 'gram du gzhag /gsum pa spos dang me tog sogs/ /snod ni g.yas kyi

'gram du'o/ /de nas khyi ni bos nas su/ /dkyil 'khor mdun du gzhag par bya/ /khyi gdong rtsa ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /de la bsang gtor kun du bya/ /de la me tog sngags sogs kyis/ /go rims bzhin du mchod par bya/ /de nas sngags ni 'di dag gis/ /gtor ma mdun du sbyin par bya/ /oM shwa na s+ye b+hu rtsa ri ye i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na

hUM hUM phaT/ ji srid mdun du khyi gtor za/ /de nas bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /zos pa yi ni tha ma ru/ /sngar bzhin rab tu gtang bar bya/ /gtor ma 'di ni nyin re bzhin/ /gal te sngags pas byas na ni/ /blo ldan de yi las rnams ni/ /thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ /tshogs pa med na sngar bshad pa'i/ /rim pa nyid la brtan par

bya/ /yang na zla ba re re zhing / /yar gyi ngo yi bcu gnyis la/ /de ni sa spyod ma'i gzugs can gyi/ khyi'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /gang gis sa ni gser byugs pa/ /rnal 'byor bas ni 'grub 'gyur pa/ /sa 'og gnas pa'i gtor ma'i las/ /de nas nga yis bshad par bya/ /bsod nams 'bras chen thob bya'i phyir/ /nyin re zhing ngam bco

lnga'am/ /bcu gnyis bar gyis gtor ma'i las/ /'di ni rnal 'byor dbang pos bya/ /chu bo'am rgya mtsho'i chu 'gram du/ /sa 'og gnas pa'i sems can rnams/ /tshim par bya phyir rdul tshon gyi/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni chen po bya/ /gau rI nag mo phyag gnyis ma/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ba ste/ /nya dang gri gug bsnams pa mchog/ /nya yi

gdan can nya gsol ba/ /nya yi rgyan dag gis brgyan pa/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod par bya/ /'dab ma gzhan la snga ma bzhin/ /gar gyi 'gying tshul la brtson pa/ /ha ha hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs/ /khro bo'i gzugs dag rnam par dgod/ /de nas dkyil 'khor de nyid ni/ /spos dang me tog lha bshos sogs/ /dri yis cho ga bzhin mchod

nas/ /gtor ma'i las ni yang dag bya/ /gau rI'i gzugs 'dzin rnal 'byor pa/ /sems dpa' gsum dag sku 'dzin pas/ /skad cig gis ni sngar brjod nas/ /cig car du ni phyogs bcing bya/ /skad cig tu ni bsgom par bya/ /de ni dbang rnon rim pa'o/ /de nas yi ge tha las byung / /nya rnams khyab 'jug gzugs can du/ /rnam par

bsams nas sgrub pa pos/ /de rnams sngags kyis bod par bya/ /oM e h+ye hi ma hA ba la biR+Ya par kra ma/ ma hA yo dza na sa hA sra pra laM ba wa pu ShA/ ti li ti mi gi li/ ma hA ti mi gi li pra b+hi ta yo ma hA ma Ni a r+hi pa ta ye/ a tra san ni hi to b+ha ban+tu/ ma ma a b+hi phre tAr+tha sid+d+hi ma bi ta ra n+tu swA hA/ de nas de rnams bod byas nas/ /khar khaN+Da

'bras chan phye/ /la du glo kha sa sogs kyis/ /gtor ma'i snod ni rab tu dgang / /chu ni gtsang ma dri zhim pa/ /srog chags dag ni rnam spangs pa/ /khyab 'jug gis ni chang bsrung phyir/ /chang ma gtogs pa sbyin par bya/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil mchod nang du/ /byin nas me tog la sogs gzhug /byin nas sngags ni 'di nyid kyis/ /

gtor ma'i snod ni dor bar bya/ /oM a A i I u U/ r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au am aH swA hA/ de nas de dag sngar bzhin du/ /myur du btang ba byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rdul tshon de/ /dogs pa med par dor par bya/ /de ltar byas nas sa 'og na/ /gnas pa rnams ni mgu bar 'gyur/ /de la mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs/ /dngos grub yid

'ong ster bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags bral ba stong phrag la/ /nyin re bza' ba mchog phul las/ /byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin de/ /nya rnams tshim par byas las 'byung / /rang rgyal gyi ni dge 'dun la/ /bsod snyoms phul las dge gang 'byung / /nya rnams tshim par byas pa las/ /bsod nams de ni thob par 'gyur/ /de ni sa 'og na gnas

pa'i gzugs can gyi nya'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /gang gi spyod lam rnam bzhi ru/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub 'gyur ba/ /phyogs spyod gtor ma bsgrub pa ni/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /rab tu grags pa'i bzhi mdo ru/ /rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal brten nas/ /rdul tshon kha dog lnga pa yis/ /de ru dkyil 'khor bri

bar bya/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas/ /pad+ma sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis der bri bya/ /dbus su thod pa bri bar bya/ /sdigs mdzub rdo rje 'gying bcas pas/ /shin tu mi bzad 'jigs mdzad pa/ /sprin ni sngon po'i mdog dang ldan/ /'bar ba sngon po rab tu khyab/ /gau rI gau rI'i bdag po yis/ /snying gar g.yas

brkyang zhabs kyis mnan/ /lte ba'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom par bya/ /shar 'dab tshangs pa'i lha mo bsam/ /khyab 'jug gi ni lho na gnas/ /gzhon nu yi ni nub tu bsgom/ /gshin rje byang gi phyogs na gnas/ /srin po'i phyogs su lus ngan po/ /me yi phyogs su tsa mu N+DI/ /dbang ldan phyogs su dbang ldan

ma/ /rlung gi lha mo rang phyogs gnas/ /zhal gcig spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /phyag gnyis gar la rab brtson pa/ /g.yas pa yi ni phyag rnams su/ /phreng ba de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /rtse gsum dbyug pa dbyug to dang / /ral gri mdung dang gos nyid de/ /phyag mtshan 'di rnams bsam par bya/ /spyi blugs dang ni pad+ma dang / /phreng ba dang

ni de bzhin mgo/ /seng ge'i rgyal mtshan thod pa dang / /kha T+wAM ga dang ngo mtshar gzhan/ /g.yon pa rnams su bsam par bya/ /dmar po ljang gu ser dang mtshungs/ /sngon po dmar po dmar dkar 'od/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od ldan pa/ /mi mo mchog ni 'di rnams bsam/ /sngags dang dam tshig phyag rgya yis/ /de ru spyan ni drang bar bya/ /de

nas gtor ma rgya chen po/ /sngags pas sbyin bya lung rje bzhin/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te badzra hUM ka ra/ hrIHSh+T+r-i sarba b+hU ta ni staM b+ha ya swA hA/ oM brah+ma Ni le hUM hUM phaT/ oM baiSh+Na bI ye hrIHphaT/ oM kau mA rI ye hrIHhUM phaT/ oM ya mA nI ye hrIHhUM phaT/ oM ku bai rA ye hrIHhUM phaT/ oM tsA mu N+DA ye hrIHhUM phaT/ oM e Sha b+h+yo hrIHhUM phaT/ oM ba ya byai hrIHhUM phaT/

lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su/ /gung mo'i rtsa bar mthe bong dag/ /thal sbyar tshig 'don sbyor ba ni/ /tshangs pa'i phyag rgyar rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas/ /mdzub mo rna cha'i dbyibs byas pa/ /khyab 'jug lha mo'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yas pa'i khu

tshur gzhon nu ma'i/ /kha tshur gnyis ni gshin rje ma'i/ /gnyis kyis mchog sbyin nor sbyin ma'i/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcings byas nas/ /mdzub gnyis bsgreng ba tsA muN+DI'i/ /mthe'u chung mthe bong dag bkug nas/ /gzhan dag bsgreng ba dbang ldan ma'i/ /gos kyi rol pas lag pa gnyis/ /

spyi bo ru ni gzhag par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rlung gi ste/ /de ni phyag rgya'i tshogs rim pa/ /de nas snod ni gang ba dgu/ /khyad par du ni bdud rtsi ldan/ /snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /ba lang khyim bya las byung dang / /bong mi rus sbal rnga mo dang / /khyi dang ce spyang rta las byung / /sha rnams kyis ni go

rims bzhin/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dgang bar bya/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /spos dang me tog sogs phul nas/ /sngar bshad sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /de rnams lam gyi bzhi mdor dor/ /ma mo rnams ni rang gnas su/ /de nas gshegs su gsol byas nas/ /bsod nams

bsngos te rnal 'byor pa/ /skyes mchog ji ltar 'dod gnas bya/ /'gro ba 'am ni 'greng yang rung / /gnyid log pa'am sad pa'ang rung / /mi gtsang ba'am gtsang yang rung / /ma mo rnams ni bsrung bar 'gyur/ /blo mchog rnams ni zhi rgyas sogs/ /las ni cung zad gang byed pa/ /de la gtor

ma dag gis ni/ /mnyes nas de yi grogs byed 'gyur/ /de yi bka' nod la brtson pa/ /bgegs la sogs pa 'ga' yang rung / /de rnams kyang ni de nyid la/ /srung dang skyob dang sbed par 'gyur/ /mar ngo yi ni tshes brgyad dam/ /yang na tshes ni bcu bzhi la/ /mtshan phyed la ni gtor ma bya/ /de ni

dus kyi cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /de ni phyogs na spyod pa'i sgo nas ma mo rnams kyi gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /byas na bsod nams mtha' yas pa/ /mi zad gang du 'byung 'gyur ba/ /gang zhig thang la spyod rnams kyi/ /gtor ma gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /thang spyod rnams kyi nang nas ni/ /ba lang mchod pa rab

tu bsngags/ /skyugs ldang byed pa'i lha yin pas/ /bde mchog las ni bcom ldan gsungs/ /sgrub pa pos ni yar ngo yi/ /bcu bzhi la ni sngar langs te/ /chu bo dri med chu ldan par/ /song nas khrus ni kun du bya/ /mdo las gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /lus ni rab tu bkru bar bya/ /sdom brtson gyis ni

gdong la sogs/ /dben bar bshang gci dor byas te/ /mtshan mar bdun dang 'phongs su bdun/ /lag par sa phur bdun blugs shing / /de nas chu yis bkrus nas ni/ /de nas lan gsum 'thor 'thung bya/ /rna sogs lte ba la thug par/ /lan bdun nye reg byas nas ni/ /dbang bskur

byas pas lan gsum du/ /chu la byi zul byas nas ni/ /khyor ba dag ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /dzaM b+ha la la sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la'ang / /chu ni snyim pa gsum dag nyid/ /re re zhing ni rang sngags kyis/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis dbul bar bya/ /de nas snyim

par gsum gyis ni/ /yi ge brgya pas tshim par bsngo/ /yi dgas rnams la chu snyim lnga/ /'jig rten dbang po'i sngags kyis ni/ /de nas langs te ba brgyad ni/ /khyu mchog mthon po dang ldan pa/ /'khor lo'i tshul du bzhag nas ni/ /dbus su khyu mchog mthon po gzhag /de nas

mchod yon dag gi snod/ /ba'i rnam lngas dgang bar bya/ /dUr ba'i chun pos bsangs nas ni/ /mkha' 'gra drag mo ro langs ma/ /de bzhin gzhan yang gtum mo dang / /seng mo stag mo 'ug pa mo/ /de bzhin gzhan yang ce spyang ma'i/ /sa bon de dag la dgod bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sa bon gyis/

dbus su khyu mchog byin rlabs bya/ /de la sa bon ni 'di rnams yin te/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi sa bon ni yi ge hUM/ /drag mo'i sa bon ni yi ge k+ShuM/ /ro langs ma'i sa bon ni yi ge yuM/ /gtum mo'i sa bon ni yi ge hUM/ seng mo'i sa bon ni yi ge s+m+r+yuM/ stag mo'i sa bon ni yi ge k+Sh+m+r+yuM 'ug pa mo'i sa bon ni yi ge

y+m+yuM ce spyang ma'i sa bon ni yi ge k+Sh+m+r+yuM/ sa bon brgyad po de dag dang / /dgu pa ye shes sa bon ni/ /de dag snying gar bkod nas ni/ /de nas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /'bras chan chang bu rnams kyis kyang / /snod ni dgu dag dgang bar bya/ /'o thug lan tshwa dang ldan pa/ /de rnams kyi ni nang du ba/ /de rnams logs

su sa la ni/ /chu ni snyim pa gsum blugs bya/ /me tog spos la sogs rnams kyis/ /mnyam par gzhag pas mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid zhi bar mthu ldan pa/ /bcom ldan sgrol ma dbang phyug ma/ /ma du lung ga rtse gsum bsnams/ /khyu mchog la ni bcings par bsgom/ /de nas gsang sngags 'di

yis ni/ /gang gi sems can khams rnams ni/ /bde byed rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur/ /gtor ma de yi mdun du sbyin/ /oM a A aM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+hA r+m+mA NAM Ad+ya nu t+pa n+na twA ta/ zhes bya ba yi sngags 'di yis/ /gtor ma'i snod ni gus bcas pas/ /lan gsum byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /de nas de

rnams la sbyin bya/ /ji srid pa la za 'gyur pa/ /bzhi pa'i mthu ldan sgrol ma yi/ /de nyid gsum dang yongs spel ba'i/ /sngags 'di de srid brjod par bya/ /oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re AHhUM phaT swA hA/ muH'i mtha' can sngags kyis ni/ /de nas sngags pas gshegs gsol bya/ /gus pa yis ni bza' ba dag/

dge slong dge 'dun dag phul nas/ /dge ba bsngos te bstod pa dag /brjod nas sgrol ma'i rigs dag la/ /phyag byas na ni kun langs te/ /de nas ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas/ /de ni thang la spyod pa'i gzugs can gyi ba lang rnams kyi gtor ma'o/ /gang gis 'khor lo gsum mkha' 'gro/ /sgrub

pa po la kun du srung / /gzhon nu ma yi gtor sgrub pa/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /re zhig dang por nam mkha' nyi ma'i steng gi zla ba'i mchod rten gyi dbus su yi ge maM las yongs su sprul pa gzhon nu ma'i gzugs can/ gser btso ma lta bu nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba stong phrag 'phro ba'i

me tog ban+tu dzi ba ka dang / dza ba lta bu'i gos dang ldan pa/ ang ga rag dang stod g.yogs dmar po rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ lag gdub dang / rna rgyan dang / ske rags dang / rkang gdub dang / g.yer ka rnams kyi sgra dang / sor gdub kha dog sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dag gis rnams par brgyan pa/ rnam par

snang mdzad kyis dbu rgyan byas pa/ mgo la mya ngan med pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa phyag g.yon pa rnams na gzhu dang / shing mya ngan med pa dang / skud pa dang zhags pa bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa rnams na rdo rje 'bar ba dang / khab dang / lcags kyu

dang / mda' gsor ba la brtson pa/ zhal dang po zhi ba pad+ma kha rab tu bye ba lta bu gser rab tu ser po'i me tog can/ mig rab tu yangs pa/ mchu li khri'i phye ma bzhin du dmar ba sgeg cing rol pa dang bcas pa/ zhal g.yon pa phag gi gdong can khro ba dang bcas shing rnam par gtsigs pa la/ mi sdug cing drag

po 'jigs su rung ba in+d+ra nI la'i mdog dang mtshungs pa mthing shun ltar snang ba/ nyi ma stong phrag bcu gnyis dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ khro gnyer gtsigs pa dang bcas pa 'jigs par mdzad pa/ zhal g.yas pa pad+ma rA ga ltar shin tu dmar ba mchog tu 'bar ba'i nyi ma stong phrag

ltar rab tu gsal zhi'i zhi ba mchod rten gyi bum pa las byung ba'i shing mya ngan med pa'i me tog gis g.yogs pa/ de'i 'og tu rnam par snang mdzad ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan cing zhi ba/ gser rab tu ser po'i mdog ltar 'bar ba/ byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang yongs su ldan par

bzhugs pa/ phag pa'i gdan la g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gzhon nu ma'i tshod du bzhugs pa/ de'i 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor la yi ge raM las yongs su sprul pa'i gza' chen po sgra gcan nyin dang / mtshan du zla ba dang nyi ma dag za bar byed pa rnam par bsgoms la/ rang gi sngags

kyis bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ oM mArI ts+yai swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas mdun du khye'u gcig dang bu mo brgyad bkug ste go rims bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi rim pas rnam par bzhag la/ de dag lo ni bcu gnyis lon pa'i mig yangs rab tu mdzes rnyed nas/ /

sa phyogs dben par khrus legs byas shing gos ni gar dgar gon pa yi/ /gur kum dang ni gla rtsi la sogs byugs shing spos kyis rab bdugs la/ /de dag thams cad de kho na bzhin nye bar byugs te bdug byas nas/ /de'i mdun sa gzhi ba yi lci bas byugs te de nyid du bzhag la/ /

gu gul bdug pa rab byin gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas bsgrub bya yi/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod de de yi steng du yi ge maM/ /rnam par bkod pas 'od zer can gyi nga rgyal rab tu bsnyems tshul gyis/ /dril bu'i sgra dang gu gul bdugs pas skad cig de nyid la

'bab 'gyur/ /'dir ni sngags kyang 'byung ba ste/ oM mA rI ts+yai A be sha ya A be sha ya/ kaM pa kaM pa/ d+hu na d+hu na/ gr-ih+na gr-i h+na/ hUM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis phab ste/ de nas de rnams la me tog dang spos la sogs pas ji ltar rjes su mthun pa nyid kyi sngags rnams kyis

byin la/ me tog phreng ba gtsug phud kyi nang du bcug ste mdun du bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba la sogs pas yongs su gang ba'i snod gzhon nu ma'i grangs dang mnyam pa rnams oM mA rI ts+yai ba ra li ba da li/ bat+ta li bA rA hA mu khI sarba du Sh+Ta pra du Sh+TA nAM mu khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ i maM bi liM pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ya ma nu

sma ra AHhUM swA hA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas ji srid gtor ma za ba de srid du bcom ldan 'das ma'i rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /zas kyi bya ba'i mtha' mar 'gron bu dang / star ka'i 'bras bu dang / tshon sna lnga'i skud pa sna tshogs pa dang / rna ba dang lag pa dang / mgul rgyan ci

'byor pa'i yo byad byin te/ khyed kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad kyis btang ste/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol nas 'od zer can gyi nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o/ /de ni gzhon nu ma'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /gang gis sa gnyi ji srid par/ /mchod rten rgyal ba'i gnas srung

'gyur/ /nag po chen po'i gtor ma'i rim/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya/ /lha khang la sogs zin nas ni/ /rab gnas rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ /cho gas de rab gnas byas te/ /de nas gtor ma kun du bya/ /rgyal ba'i gnas ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /gtsug lag khang gi sgor gnas shing / /

dri gtsang khang gi nang gnas par/ /nag po che dgod rnal 'byor pas/ /sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa/ /lto ba chen po phyag bcu pa/ /nam mkha'i gos can stag lpags kyis/ /smad kyi cha ni rab dkris pa/ /dbu la thod pa'i phreng bar ldan/ /mche ba gtsigs shing mi bzad pa/ /thod pa'i phreng ba

bkod pa yis/ /mgrin pa rkang pa rnam brgyan pa/ /smin ma kham pa'i smin 'khyug dang / /spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par spras/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po mtshungs/ /g.yas pa sngon por snang ba ste/ /g.yon pa dmar po shin tu mdzes/ /nyi ma khri dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /rgyab ni dri bcas du ba'i

mdog /de yi gdong ni bsam par bya/ /ral gri dang ni tho ba dang / /rtse gsum rgyud mangs dag gi rgyud/ /sbreng ba la ni brtson 'gyur ba/ /de yi g.yas kyi phyag tu bsam/ /g.yon du thod pa kha T+wAM ga /pi wang de bzhin gar byed pa/ /mi yi pags pa khrag 'dzag pa/ /steng gi phyag dag na bsnams

shing / /g.yas brkyang 'dug stang sa gar byed pa/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin du ni de yi 'khor/ /mi sdug gdong can mkha' 'gro ma/ /seng ge glang po dred dang sbrul/ /byi la khyi yi gdong can te/ /ha ha zhes sgrogs ca co'i sgras/ /rmongs pa rnams ni skrag byed pa/ /

thod pa'i nang du blugs pa'i khrag /'thung byed pa ni bsgom par bya/ /de ltar bsams nas rnal 'byor dbang / /bdag nyid ma he la zhon cing / /drag po chen po gshin rje gshed/ /gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa/ /zhal drug dang ni zhabs drug dang / /phyag drug nyid kyis rnam brgyan

pa/ /lha dang lha min za byed pa/ /g.yas pa'i phyag rnams na tho ba/ /ral gri lcags kyu bsnams sdigs mdzub/ /zhags pa dang ni dril bu yis/ /g.yon pa rnams ni mdzes byas pa/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang dang / /de bzhin mnyam pa'i 'dug stangs kyis/ /lha yi tshogs

rnams drug po yi/ /stobs ni kun du mnan nas bzhugs/ /snying ga'i yi ge hUM las byung / /'od zer 'khor lo 'bar ba las/ /khro ba'i sprin gyi tshogs dag ni/ /cha byad mtshungs pa'i tshogs rnams spro/ /in+d+ra nI la ltar snang bsam/ /de 'dra'i gzugs su gnas nas ni/ /nag po chen po

snying 'gas par/ /brtson par gyur pa'i sngags 'di yang / /khro bo'i tshig gis brjod par bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T-iHbi kr-i tA na na sarba sha truM nA sha ya staM b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ de'i rjes la 'di skad du bka' bsgo bar bya'o/ /sngar bshad pa'i sngags nyid kyis bkug ste bcings/ de dbang du byas nas

gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor nyid kyis bka' bsgo bar bya ste/ kye nag po chen po gtsug lag khang 'di ji srid gnas pa de srid du khyod kyis bsrung bar bya zhing 'khor dang bcas pa khyod kyis 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi bka' yang mnyan par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la rnal 'byor pa de nyid kyis

yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir de la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /zangs la sogs pa las byas pa'i snod tshad chen po dang ldan pa tsan+dan dmar po las byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bzhag ste/ thug pa nag po dang / glo ba dang / 'o thug dang / rlon pa dang / btsos pa dang /

bsregs pa'i dbye bas nya'i sha rnam pa gsum dang / khrag dang / zhag dang / klad pa dang / tshil rnams dang / rgun chang dang / 'bru'i chang dang / nya'i gzugs brnyan dang / 'greng bu'i chun po dang / sgog pa'i bye brag bdun dang / snum khur dang / nas dang / gro la sogs pa'i bye

brag gi 'bru rnams dang / zangs dang / lcags las byas pa'i khab kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bkang la/ me tog dang spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa lngas yongs su mchod de/ gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgyas kyang mngon par btab la phyogs bcing ba bya ste/ khros pa'i sems dang

ldan zhing dril bu dang rdo rje gsor ba la brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pas sngags 'dis spyan drang bar bya'o/ /oM ma hA kA la a ya ti ma hA bi ha ra pA la nA ya/ sarba DA ki nI yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa sa pa ri wA rA na tra sinan hi to b+ha ba swA hA/ de'i rjes la sngags 'di dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas tshim par bya

pa'i phyir gtor ma byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM AHda sha dika th+wa saM bya ba s+thi tA/ sarba da sha di ka d+hA tu pa ra ma Nu pa ran+ta ra ba ti sarba ba ti ka lo ka pA la/ ma hA kA la badzra A yu d+ha mA yA badzra/ badzrA na la/ badzra kA la/ badzra mu sa la/ nA ga badzra/ badzra nil/ badzra shauN+Da/ badzra b+he

ra wa/ badzra kro d+ha/ badzra kuN+Da le/ badzra pra b+ha/ mo na badzra/ be ma tse tri/ pr-i thi bai de ba tA/ sarba i t+yu pa sarba u pa shAn+ta ye/ sarba gan+d+ha puSh+pa d+hU pa/ dI pa/ nai bi t+ya/ sarbo pa tra a laM ka ra di na sh+tsa pra tIts+tsha/ u pa pU dz+ya/ sarba Sha naM/ kA ya wA ka tsi t+taM/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ ma ma sarba A shaM pa ri pU

ra ya thA ya ba dA saM sA ra/ ma ma sarba satwA nAM tsa/ sat+su kha sid+d+ha ye sa ha ya kA b+ha ban+tu hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod la/ gtor ma'i snod sgrub pa'i grogs mchog thor tshugs bcings pa'i lag tu byin te dur khrod chen por dor bar bya'o/ /de nas nag po chen po ni/ /'khor dang bcas pa mnyes gyur nas/ /

ji srid nam mkha' nyi zla dang / /ji srid skar ma dag dang sa/ /ji srid rgya mtsho dang ni gling / /ji srid 'gro ba rigs drug gnas/ /de srid rgyal bcas gtsug lag khang / /mchod rten bcas pa des srung 'gyur/ /de ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun yang / /tshe ni ring por byed par 'gyur/ /

me la sogs pa bgegs kyi tshogs/ /'byung ba de yis 'jigs par byed/ /rab gnas dus su rnal 'byor pas/ /gtor ma 'di ni yang dag bya/ /phan phyir bya ba'i rgyud las ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs/ /de ni nag po chen po'i gtor ma'o/ /skye bo sdig pa byed pa rnams/ /

gang gis bde 'gror skye 'gyur ba/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi gtor ma ni/ /bzang po de nas bshad par bya/ /blo gros chen pos bud med dam/ /skyes pa shi ba mthong nas ni/ /de tshe bdag nyid byang chub sems/ /phyag na rdo rje bsam par bya/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa/ /ut+pal sngon po'i

'dab 'dra'i 'od/ /mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa ste/ /sgeg pa yi ni ro yis brgyan/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang ldan zhing / /g.yas pa rdo rje gsor mdzad pa/ /gar bcas de dag mtshungs nyid kyis/ /'dren pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /sa snying la sogs sa bon gyis/ /yan lag

drug gi go cha dgod/ /mig la sogs pa byin brlabs na/ /de nas lha yi mig sogs 'gyur/ /de yi mgo dang logs sogs su/ /de yis gshin rje'i pho nya mthong / /pag pa dbyug pa'i tho ba can/ /de nas mthong nas 'di ltar bsdigs/ /gshin rje pho nya khyed rnams ni/ /'di ni

mdun nas 'gro bar gyis/ /nga ni gnas pa 'di ru khyed/ /skad cig tsam yang gnas skabs med/ /de min rdo rje rnon po yis/ /khrag dang rnag rdzab 'jigs rung bar/ /khyod kyi mgo ni 'gas par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yi tshig de thos nas ni/ /mi bzad gshin

rje'i pho nya sogs/ /phyogs rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur/ /de nas de yi snying ga nas/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rlung dag dang / /rnam par shes pa tshim bya'i phyir/ /gtor ma dag ni bya ba yin/ /rna ba'i drung du sngags 'di ni/ /rnal 'byor rigs pas gsang nas ni/ /bzlas na de las

rdor 'dzin dang / /mtshungs pa nyid du 'grub bar 'gyur/ /oM [(]namo [,]na mo [)]b+ha ga ba te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te/ samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+yo ma bya bi ni/ b+h+yo ma ru spA ya/ sarba b+h+ya bi ne/ shri ba ya hriM/ bra h+ma mA ha/ hrIM biSh+Nu da yai te/ k+Sh+yaM ru du k+Sha bi sarbi ni

hUM ru tra sa ru pe/ hri nA dA A ta ma ke/ hUM bin+du sha rI re ai shag saM ya dza ni ma b+h+yo ma yo dza ni/ bI shA ta ke be l+ye pa de bra h+ma bi d+h+ye na maH/ yuM rluM lbuM k+ShaM k+Sh+m+yuM na mA tha oM oM IM a mUM b+h+yo ma bya ba ni b+h+yo ma bya ba ni b+h+ya phaT/ de nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /mi skyong gnas ni nyams dga' ba/ /rga dang 'chi ba rnams spangs par/ /

rnam par shes pa byung nas 'gro/ /de yi tshangs pa'i sgo nas ni/ /rnam shes myur du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bzhin ni rab tu 'dzum byed cing / /ngo ni ngo mtshar phyag rgyar ldan/ /rlung rnams kyi sngags 'di yis ni/ /oM hUM pra nA ya swA hA/ oM aM pA nA ya swA hA/ oM a sa mA nA

ya swA hA/ oM sa u d+ha nA ya swA hA/ oM hA byA nA ya swA hA/ oM k+ShaM ud wa ha ya swA hA/ oM dzraM bi wa ha yA swA hA/ oM gaM saM wa hA yA swA hA/ oM k+ShaSh+Ta ni wa hA ya swA hA/ oM saM bi dz+nyA na ya a ru pi ni ga ga na rU pa ya/ e h+ye hi pra b+hA swA hA b+hA ba badzra d+ha ra rU pi Ne hUM bo shaT/ sngags mchog bzang po 'di rnams kyis/ /tshigs

dag nas ni rlung 'byung bas/ /skye bo bde bar byed par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin du mar 'gyur/ /de'i rjes la nam mkhar srid pa bar ma'i yi ge hoHgnyis kyis brten pa rnam par bsgoms te de'i mngon sum kho nar shi ba'i ro bsreg par bya'o/ /'phags pa 'khyil pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /

byin gyis brlabs nas chus bsangs te/ /de nas chu bor khrus byas nas/ /ba yi rnam lngas dgang bar bya/ /de nas dri ma dag byugs te/ /kha ru go la gzhug par bya/ /me tog spos la sogs rnams kyis/ /mchod byas nas ni spos kyis dkris/ /glu dang rol mo yid 'ong bas/ /de la rab tu

mchod par bya/ /yig gsum byin brlabs me lha ni/ /sbyin sreg las bshad cho gas gzhag/ /tshig par gyur gyi bar du ni/ /mkhas pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ /stong ngam khri ni bzlas nas ni/ /'di ni shi ba'i mchog rim pa/ /rus pa blangs nas dag byas de/ /rdul ni chu bo la dor bya/ /

rdul tshon kha dog dmar po yis/ /khro bo'i gzugs can gshin rje gshed/ /dkyil 'khor de ru bri bar bya/ /khro bo brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /sngar bshad sku mdog phyag mtshan sogs/ /gdan bcas khro bo'i sku 'dzin pa/ /de nas mnyam gzhag gyur pa yis/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod sngon

'gro ba'i/ /me tog la sogs yid 'ong ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor de ru bri bar bya/ /khro bo brgyad dang yang dag ldan/ /sngar bshad sku mdog phyag mtshan sogs/ /gdan bcas khro bo'i sku 'dzin pa/ /de nas mnyam gzhag gyur pa yis/ /sngags kyi bzlas brjod sngon 'gro ba'i/ /me tog

la sogs yid 'ong ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor pa yang mchod nas ni/ /mar me dag gi snod rnams ni/ /brgyad po go rims bzhin du 'bul/ /dbus su yang ni mar me'i snod/ /cho ga bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /mchod pa byas nas gtor ma sbyin/ /kham pa'i snod ni bcu gcig dang / /'o ma sbrang rtsi

de bzhin du/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i chus bkang ste/ /me tog bkram pa mdzes gyur ba'i/ /pa yi rnam lngas dag byas nas/ /de nas 'bras chan chang bu gcig /snod gcig tu ni gzhag par bya/ /gnyis pa gnyis te gsum pa la/ /de bzhin gsum ste bcu gcig par/ /bcu gcig par

du gzhag pa 'di/ /gtor ma sbyin pa'i chog rim pa/ /sngar bshad sngags ni bcu drug gis/ /byin gyis brlabs nas me tog spos/ /sogs pas de rnams rab mchod de/ /de nas chu bor dor bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol nas kyang / /rdul tshon chu bor dor nas na/ /

nam mkha' srid pa phar ma ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pas yongs bskor cing / /chos ston pa ni lhur len pa/ /mi bskyod gzugs can blta bar bya/ /de nas langs nas de nyid kyi/ /rus pa blangs te phye mar bya/ /sa las byas pa'i mchod rten gyi/ /nang du rab tu gzhug par bya/ /de la

rim pa 'di yin te/ /oM wa ra d+he dzin go le ya sho te sarba bud+d+ha a d+hi Sh+Thi te swA hA/ 'jim pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te mchod rten bya'o/ /oM badzra A yu She swA hA zhes byas pas skol phor du gzhug par bya/ /mchod rten 'byin pa na yang 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu gar+b+he

swA hA/ oM a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba d+har+m+ma te swA hA/ oM pra marda nA ya swA hA/ oM su pra tiSh+Tha ta stU pe swA hA/ oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te ak+Sho b+h+yA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/

ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsi li ban+d+ha mi mi li ban+d+ha mi tsi li mi li ban+d+ha mi/ si maM ban+d+ha mi/ /si maM de ba dAt+ta sh+tsa ma ka shin bya ti kra ma tu swa hA/ sngags 'dis nyungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te phyogs bcur gtor na phyogs bcing pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /des ni

mchod rten rab tu gnas par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i sngon du sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA ta ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ma hA te dza ya/ ma hA te dza ya/ ma hA ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha/ bi ki ra Na bi d+h+wAM sa ya/ ba

dra pa ya/ dzA Ti laM bod ra/ uts+tshu sma kro d+ha d+hUM phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ dzI baM ma ma de ba da t+ta s+ya tsa sarba bai yo pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/ 'dis bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas langs te ci bder gnas par bya'o/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /de nas zos pa'i mtha' ma ru/ /gang gi

rnal 'byor zhi ba dang / /rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ni/ /lhag ma zhes bya rab bshad bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lor zos pa yang / /yang na rang gis zos pa'i mthar/ /bza' ba la sogs kun 'dus te/ /snod gcig tu ni gzhug par bya/ /chang dang 'bru yi chang lhag gang / /de yang gcig tu

blugs par bya/ /de ru 'bras kyi phye ma yis/ /de ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya/ /dbus su dang po'i dbyangs dgod cing / /zur gsum du ni yi ge gsum/ /bcom ldan 'khor ba las sgrol ba/ /dbus su sgrol ma bsam par bya/ /spyan ni rtag pa dang ldan pa/ /oM gyi grwa ru yang dag bsam/ /AH

yi grwa ru lha mo ni/ /gos dkar mo ni bsgom par bya/ /mi bskyod dang ldan mA ma kI/ /hUM gi grwa ru yang dag bsam/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing dag/ /gru gsum mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su bum pa ni/ /sa las byas pa la sogs gzhag/ /bza' dang bca' ba sogs gang de/ /bum pa

de ru rab tu gzhug/ /de nas gru gsum mtha' ma ru/ /dur khrod chen po bsam par bya/ /kha T+wAM ga dang mgo la sogs/ /thod pa rnams kyis yongs su brgyan/ /shing gcig dang ni ldan pa nyid/ /khro dang khyi sogs rnam 'jigs pa/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyis/ /nye bar spras pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /keng

rus mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni/ /dur khrod gnas par de bsgom bya/ /drag mo gri gug snod thogs pa/ /skra bshig spyan ni gsum pa ste/ /kha ni yi dwags za byed cing / /rgyas pa mi bzang gsus pa 'phyang / /stag gi pags pa'i gos kyis ni/ /smad kyi cha ni rnam par brgyan/ /mgo po'i steng du rkang pa gnyis/ /

gar gyi 'gying tshul la brtson pa/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /rgyu ma'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /yi dgas klad pa tshil dang zhag/ /rab tu byugs pa la dgyes pa/ /mi yi rus pa'i phreng ldan pa'i/ /ska rags khrag gi thig le can/ /lag 'gro chen po'i rna cha can/ /brang 'gro'i rkang gdub

'jigs rung ba/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar pa'i tshogs/ /gzi brjid thub par dka' ba yi/ /shin tu mi bzad khros pa yis/ /gnod sbyin la sogs sdigs byed pa/ /yak+Sha chen po'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /sha za la sogs rnams kyis bskor/ /de bltas nas ni rtse gsum gyi/ /phyag rgya bcings nas

rnal 'byor pas/ /spyan 'dren sngags ni bzlas bya zhing / /chang gi btung ba dbul bar bya/ /oM e h+ye hi sh+ma shA na wa si ni ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya rak+ShaM ku ru i ha sa n+ni hi to b+ha ba swA hA/ rang rang sngags kyis go rims bzhin/ /de nas me tog sogs phul nas/ /sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /de la

gtor ma dbul bar bya/ /oM ku ru ku ru/ wa tA li ma hA wa t+ta li/ sit+ta mu khi sh+ma shA na wa si ni/ pre ta wA da ni tsaN+Da ka rA li ru d+hi ra pri ye/ sa ma ya rak+Shi ta/ yo ga d+ha ri/ ki li ki li/ ra bai badzra pri ti wa ma na d+he pU dza taM/ bak+ti gU ha na dU te/ hUM maM ga gra ri/ tsaN+Da ka rA li/ /tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha i maM uts+tsha ShaT ba liM gr-i h+na sarba du Sh+Ta na

b+ha kaSha ya/ ho phruM phreM phaT swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i lhag ma'i sngags brjod la/ gtor ma'i snod lan gsum bskor la mtshan ma gcig par dor bar bya'o/ /de nas langs te lag pa dang kha bkrus la dkyil 'khor phyis te/ snga ma bzhin du gshegs gsol la ci bder nyal bar bya'o/ /de ni lhag ma'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/

nyal ba'i dus sam rab gnas sam/ /sbyin sreg mthar yang rnal 'byor pas/ /phyogs bcu tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i gtor ma bya/ /gshin rje mthar byed nas brtsams te/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po la thug pa/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan cha lugs ni/ /ji bzhin khro bo bcu po

bsgom/ /mdun du dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /yang na rdo rgyus dag gis bri/ /mtsho skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa ste/ /de la khro bo rnam par bsam/ /dbus su dpal ldan rdo rje sems/ /gshin rje gtsug tor la thug rnams/ /go rims bzhin du shar phyogs dang / /'og dang steng gi phyogs su bsam/ sha dang

'bras chan chang btung bas/ /gang bar gyur pa'i snod bcu dag /rim pa bzhin du gzhag bya zhing / /mchod yon phul te de nas mchod/ /sngags 'di yis ni sgrub pa pos/ /de nas spyan ni drang bar bya/ /oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ i hA b+hak+t+ya tsa sa ma ye na tsa ar+g+haM puSh+pa pra tI ts+tsha i daM pUM dza wA d+yaM pra sA da mi/ de nas rang rang

gi sngags bcu po kho nas gtor ma'i snod rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badzra mung+ga ra hastA ya tsan+d+ra maN+Da la a kaSho pa rA ya hUM phaT/ gshin rje gshed kyi'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ma ha na d+ha ra/ bi bi d+ha/ so ra so ra/ ba ra da na bud+d+ha/ nirma tha ni rma tha hUM phaT/ shes rab mthar byed

kyi'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo hu lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mi tA ku ru ma hA bi sha na A/ pad+ma mthar byed kyi'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ho b+h+yo/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daM Sh+T+ra ung+ga te b+hai ra bA ya/ badzra san+d+d+ha ra pA ya/ a mraM ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/ bgegs mthar byed kyi'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ya ma daN+DA ya/ tu ru tu ru//

mu ru mu ru/ sarba du ShaT mA ra ya hUM phaT/ dbyug pa sngon po can gyi'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo ma hA ba lA ya uts+tshu Sh+ma kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ sarba nA ga nAM hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ stobs po che'i'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo a tsa la ka na tse Ta tse Ta/ mu T+Ta mu T+Ta/ tu Ta tu Ta/ g+ha ta g+ha ta/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta yaM hUM phaT/ mi g.yo

ba'i'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM Ta k+ki hUM dza/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i'o/ /oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na bid+ya rA dzA hUM phaT/ gnod mdzes rgyal po'i'o/ /oM na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta d+har+m+mA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta saM g+hA nAM/ oM si tA ta pa tre/ oM bi ma la/

oM shaM ka ra/ oM pra t+ya ng+gi ra/ badzra uSh+NI Sha tsakra warti sarba yan+t+ra man+t+ra mU la karma/ ban+d+ha nAM/ tA Da naM/ kI la naM wA/ ma ma kr-i t+ya ya na ke na tsit+ta kr-i taM tat+sarbAn+du/ ts+tshen+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i'o/ /thams cad

srung bar byed pa'o/ /sngags mchog bzang po 'di rnams kyis/ /khro bo'i rgyal po bcu bo ni/ /rdzogs par tshim par byas par 'gyur/ /de nas shar sogs phyogs rnams su/ /sngags kyi go rims [(]ngi [,]ji [)]bzhin du/ /khro bo rnams kyi go rims bzhin/ /gtor ma'i snod rnams dor bar bya/ /de yis nam

yang rmi lam ni/ /ngan pa nyid ni mthong mi 'gyur/ /khro bo tshim las rnal 'byor dbang / /rmi lam bzang po nyid mthong 'gyur/ /rab gnas mtha' mar gtor ma 'dis/ /lha khang shin tu brtan par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg mtha' ma mkha' 'gro ma/ /stobs chen ma dag rab mnyes 'gyur/ /gang phyir sna

tshogs ma lus 'di/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can dang bcas pa/ /khro rgyal gyis ni rang gi mthus/ /rtag tu pham par byas te gnas/ /da phyir de ni tshim byas pas/ /klu dang 'byung po drang srong dang / /gnod sbyin lha min bcas 'gro ba/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu tshim par 'gyur/ /rang gi 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor

ram/ /rta yi rgyal po'i rim gyis ni/ /rtse gcig sems ldan sgrub pa pos/ /khro rgyal rnams la gtor ma dbul/ /des khro bo'i rgyal po bcu'i gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /gang zhig byas pas rnal 'byor dbang / /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur/ /gang gi gtor ma zhes bya ba/ /de bas gzhan yang rab

bshad bya/ /bzhin bzangs mig ni rab yangs pa'i/ /si h+la ga pur dag gis brgyan/ /pang pa ru ni gzhag bya ste/ /nu ma gzung bar rab tu bsam/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'o byas shing / /rdo rje bskyod pas mnye bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khyud nas ni/ /rdo rje mchu ni rab tu gzhib/ /rdo rje sor mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje gnas ni rab tu bskyod/ /

rdo rje sems ni rab phyung nas/ /rdo rje'i lce yis bza' bar bya/ /de nas de yi bde chen du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gzhug/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i mchod pa rab tu brtsam/ /rdo rje sems dpa' thob pa na/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rdor sems spro/ /pad+ma'i me tog yang dag ldan/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /pad+ma

mnyes gyur rdo rje can/ /pad+ma dmar pos khyad par du/ /dri lnga yi ni sbyor ba dang / /spos dang ga bur mchod pas so/ /'di yis rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ /stobs dang mthu dang rtsal ldan 'gyur/ /bltas pa tsam gyis bskul nas ni/ /'jig rten dag ni dbang du 'gyur/ /shes rab yan lag sbyor ba yis/ /nang gi gtor

ma'i rim 'di bshad/ /gzhan yang bza' ba'i sbyor bas kyang / /nang gi gtor ma bshad par bya/ /ji skad du dpal ldan lha mo bzhis chos kyi dbyings zhus pa las lha mo sgrol ma'i the tshom bsal ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis te/ rdzas kyi sgrub pa yan lag brgyad/ /chos rnams bsgrub pa bshad par bya/ /mi dang

glang po rta dang ni/ /ba lang khyi dang bod bu nyid/ /rnga mo dang ni ma he nyid/ /cha dag mnyam par byas nas ni/ /mthe bong gi ni rtse mo tsam/ /mnyam par mnyam pas nges par sbyar/ /bshang gci khrag dang khu ba dag /nas kyi 'bru yi tshad tsam yang / /sngags kyi sgo nas sbyar bya zhing / /byin gyis kyang ni brlab par bya/ /oM dang

yi ge AHdang ni/ /dbus su yi ge hUM nyid dang / dz+wa la dz+wa la ya hri ste/ /'di ni dgu par rab tu grags/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /sngags 'di brjod pas gdags par bya/ /tshes brgyad dam ni bcu bzhi la/ /lnga lnga dang ni bsre bya zhing / /nyungs kar lnga yi tshad tsam gyis/ /de nas ri la dag byas nas/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag nas su/ /

stong phrag brgya ni bzlas par bya/ /nyin re bzhin du bza' bya zhing / /thun bzhi dag tu bsgoms byas na/ /bskal pa'i mtha' la thug par ru/ /dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur/ /ri lu chen po zos pa yis/ /mdog dang gzi brjid stobs dang mthu/ /lnga ba smon lam nyid dang ni/ /mngon par shes pa lnga thog 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/ /

de ltar nang gi gtor ma ni/ /rtag tu bya ba rnal 'byor pas/ /'dir ni dpal ldan rdo rje sems/ /rga shi med pa'i gnas myur 'grub/ /de ni nang gi gtor ma'i cho ga'o/ /sna tshogs rgyud kyi rgya mtsho las/ /bdag gis gtor ma'i cho ga ni/ /ma lus thams cad mnyes byed pa/ /rin chen tshogs mtshungs sum cu btus/ /rgya chen rgyud 'dzin

'jigs pa la/ /gzhung tshad dgu brgyad dang ldan pa/ /lag mthil 'bras mtshungs gtor ma yi/ /sgrub thabs 'di ni bdag gis byas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rgyud las btus/ /ngal bar gyur pa bdag gis ni/ /phan dang bde phyogs yang dag sgrub byed gtor ma'i sgrub thabs byas pa las/ /de ring zla ba'i 'od mtshungs shin tu rgya chen dge

ba gang bsags pa/ /de yis deng sang skye bo mang po bde gshegs nyid ni rab thob shog /bdag kyang srid pa 'di rung ni/ /rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur par shog /ma lus bde gshegs bsam bya ba/ /lha chen sogs kyis bsdam mi khyab/ /rtog pa'i rlabs ni 'joms byed blo mchog skye bo ye/ /snying la rtag tu

shin tu brtan par gnas par byed par shog /rgyud sna tshogs las btus pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal klu sgyur gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badzra'i zhal snga nas dang / /lo tsA ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /sarba d+har+m+ma pA la ba lin+ta bi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ /chos skyong thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga /dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams tshogs sogs bar chad zhi/ /phrin las rnam bzhi 'grub pa dang / /chos skyong thams cad mnyes par 'gyur/ /de phyir gtor ma'i cho ga rtsom/ /

dad dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /snying rje che zhing gzhan phan dga'/ /ser sna med cing gtor brtsams pas/ /gsang ba'i btung ba lcags kyu rnams/ /nya dang khur ba 'bras chan rnams/ /la phug la sogs bza' btung rnams/ /brtson pas nye bar tshogs pa na/ /'dod lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas/ /

dben zhing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor rnam lngas byug /de steng pad snod mdzes pa'i nang / /sngar bsags rdzas kyis yongs su dgang / /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la/ /'og tu g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de stengs 'bar ba gru gsum bsam/ /'bru gsum steng du pad snod

bsam/ /rlung bskyod me 'bar rdzas rnams zhu/ /thog mar nyi ma shar lta bu/ /de nas sbyang dang sbar rtogs ni/ /zla ba rdo rje oM gyis bsgrub/ /ye shes bdud rtsis sangs rgyas sogs/ /'bad pas de nyid thim par bsam/ /sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlab bya/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams na/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /chos skyong srung ma thams cad rnams/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la/ /thog mar zhal bsil bsang gtor bya/ /de nas me tog sogs lnga mchod/ /rjes su gtor ma dbul ba ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i steng bzhag

nas/ /dad pa'i blo yis kun la bstabs/ /thams cad dgyes pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /ljags kyi myu gus drangs gsol bsam/ /oM sarba d+ha r+m+ma pA la/ /sarba k+She tra pA la/ /a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+ha r+m+ma NAM A d+ya nu t+pa n+na twA ta oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ sarba shAn+tiM ku ru/ sarba pu Sh+TiM ku ru/ sarba me ba

sha na ya hoH/ /sarba du Sh+TA na mA ra ya hUM phaT ces brjod la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas gsol gdab las bcol bya/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mtha' yas na/ /bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems/ /gnyis med thugs rje'i dbang gis ni/ /dpal dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs su sprul/ /'bar ba'i sku

rnams khro gtum che/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mthu stobs ldan/ /rab zhi 'od gsal thugs chud kyang / /thabs mang thugs rjes 'gro 'dul ba'i/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i tshogs rnams la/ /bsnyen bkur gtor ma yid 'ong 'bul/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung du gsol/ /bdag cag sgrub pa po rnams la/ /zhi rgyas

dbang dang mngon spyod kyi/ /phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub stsol/ /sgrub la bar chad byed pa yi/ /dgra bgegs thams cad zhi bar mdzod/ /bsod nams tshogs chen bsags las byung / /rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu/ /lag na rdo rje gos sngon tshogs/ /gzhan yang mthu rtsal che ldan pa'i/ /lha dang lha min mi'am ci/ /

lto 'phye grul bum nam mkha' lding / /sha za srin po phra med tshogs/ /sman dang btsan la sogs pa yi/ /chos la dga' ba'i dge bsnyen rnams/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song nas/ /bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs pa'i/ /dge bsnyen pho mo thams cad la/ /bsnyen bkur gtor ma rgya chen dbul/ /bstan pa gnyen po bsrung du

gsol/ /bdag cag sgrub pa po rnams la/ /rang rang las kyi dngos sgrub stsol/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' nyon la/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi las bcol sgrubs/ /log 'dren thams cad tshar bcad nas/ /kun kyang dam tshig la gnas te/ /rtag par tshogs gnyis rab bsags nas/ /'phags pa rnams kyis brnyes pa yi/ /rab zhi bde chen thob

par shog/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod la oM AHhUM badzra muH/ zhes pas thams cad gshegs su gsol/ /gtor ma sum mdo'am bzhi mdor sa gtsang sar bskyal lo/ /chos skyong thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon chen po ba liM A tsar+yas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ba li mA li kA/ na mA mi badzra satwa s+ya tsa ra NA m+be ru ha dwa yi/ /sA d+ha kA nA ny+tsa si d+d+h+ya r+thaM li khya ta ba li mA li kA/ ye nai ba ba li dA ne na prI NItaHsarba dza nu baH/ rak+ShA tsa krA di kaM sarbaM sho d+ha naM bo d+ha naM ta taH/

@##/ /bod skad du/ gtor ma'i phreng ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis kyi/ chu skyes la ni phyag 'tshal te/ /dngos grub bsgrub par bya don du/ /gtor ma'i phreng ba bri bar bya/ /gang gis gtor ma byin pa yis/ /skye bo thams cad tshim 'gyur ba/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo sogs kun dang / /de nas sbyang dang rtogs pa yis/ /

ba li ta twaM ma ma kr-i te dz+nyA ta byaM sA d+hu sam+ma taiH/ /shAn+ti kaM pau Sh+Ti kaM ya ts+tsha ba sh+yA b+hi tsA ru kaM ta thA/ /ba l+yu pa hA ra mA tre Na sA d+h+ya te nA tra saM sha yaH/ /ma yA ma ti siM he na gran+thi tA ba li mA li kA/ /tsin+tA ma Ni ri pA b+hA ti kaN+Tha s+thA ma n+t+ri NAM sa dA/

gtor ma'i de nyid bdag gis bya/ /legs 'dod rnams kyis shes par bya/ /gang yang zhi dang rgyas pa dang / /de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod kyang / /gtor ma'i mchod pa tsam gyis ni/ /'dir ni the tshom med par 'grub/ /blo bzang seng ge bdag gis ni/ /gtor ma'i phreng ba yi ni rgyud/ /rtag tu sngags pa'i mgrin gnas na/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gsal/ /

a tra su ba hu tan+t+ro k+ta gA thA g+hi rba li kaM sr-i dze tA/ pi Ta kaiH/ /sha ka Tai r+b+hA rai ran+ta sho \u0f85ny+dza li b+hi sta thA/ /da twe ka tra ba li ny+tsA r+g+ha gan+d+ha to yA di kaM ba de ta/ /de bA su rAHsarba b+hu dzaM ga sid+d+ha stA r+k+ShAHsu par+N+NAHka Ta pU ta nA sh+tsa/ gan+d+ha rba

'dir ni rgyud mang las gsungs pa'i/ /tshigs bcad rnams kyis gtor ma btang / /zangs gzhong shing rta khur rnams dang / /de bzhin tha na thal mos kyang / /gcig tu gtor mar mchod yon dang / /dri yi chu sogs byin nas gsol/ /lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po/ /dri za srin po

sid+d+hA gra ha dzA ha ya shA yi ge pi d+hU mau ni ba san+ti di byAH/ n+yaste ka dzA nuHpr-i thi bI ta le ha kr-i tA ny+dza li rbi dz+nya pa yA mi tAM s+t+wa nra/ sa pu tra dA raiHsa ha b+h+r-i t+ya saM g+haiHshru twA i hA yAn+t+wa nu gra hA r+thaM/ /ye me ru pr-i Sh+The ni ba san+ti b+hU tA ye na n+da ne ye tsa su rA la ye Shu/

gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang / /gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can/ /bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyi/ /gsan nas phan gdags slad du 'dir gshegs shig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / /dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang / /

ye tso da yAste gi ri man+da re tsa na ge Shu parbe Shu tsa ye ba san+ti/ /sa rit+su sarbA su tsa saM g+ha me Shu rat+nA la ye tsA d+hi kr-i tA d+hi bA sAH/ /bA pI ta DA ge Shu tsa sa la le Shu kU pe Shu badzre Shu tsa ni r+dz+ha re Shu/ /ye grA ma g+ho She su ra kA na ne tsa shU n+yA la ye de wa gr-i he Shu ye tsa/ bi hA ra tsai t+yA ba sa

shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang / /ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang / /rin chen gling na lhag par gang gnas dang / /chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang / /mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang / /g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang / /grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang / /khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang / /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas

thA sha me Shu ma tse Shu shA lA su tsa ku ny+dza rA NAM/ /ye b+hA b+h+r-i tAM tsi tra gr-i he ba san+ti ra th+yA su bI thI Shu tsa tsa twA re Shu/ /ye tsai ka pr-i k+She Shu ma hA pa the Shu ma hA sh+ma shA ne Shu ma hA ba ne Shu/ /siM he b+ha ri k+ShA d+h+yu Shi tA su ye tsa ba san+ti g+ho rA ru ma hA Ta b-I Shu/ dwI phe Shu di

rnams dang / /dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres gnas dang / /rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang / /lam srang sum mdo dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung / /dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang / /seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas rnams dang / /'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang / /gang dag gling

bye Shu kr-i tA la yash+tsa mai raush+ma shA ne ni ba san+ti ye tsa/ hr-i Sh+TAHpra sa n+nAHsra dza gan+d+ha mA l+yaM d+hU paM ba liM d+hi pa bi d+hi ny+tsa b+ha k+t+yA/ gr-ih+Na n+tu b+hu ny+dza n+tu pi wa n+tu tse da mi dany+tsa ka rma sa pha laM yu Sha n+tu/ ma hA ba liH// //oM badzra yo gi nI hrIHru ru ru khaHkhaH

mchog dag na gnas pa dang / /lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams/ /rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su/ /phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang / /bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul na/ /'di dag gsol zhing legs par bzhes nas kyang / /bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// gtor ma chen po'o// //rdo rje rnal 'byor ma bdag la

khaHpheM pheM pheM/ aM aM aM/ oM oM oM/ ma ma ma naHsi d+d+hiM pra yats+tsha ba liM grih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ shu klA ga ga na k+She pA ba liH// 2 /oM bi shA tsi par+Na sha wa ri sarbo pa dra ba nA shi ni sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni sarba b+ha ya bi nA shi ni i daM ba liM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba du Sh+Ta mA rA na mA ra mA ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/

yid bzhin dngos grub stsol/ gtor ma bzhes gtor ma bzhes/ nam mkha' dkar po la 'thor ba'i gtor ma'o/ /sha za ma ri khrod lo ma can nyer 'tshe thams cad sel ma/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma 'jigs pa thams cad sel ma/ gtor ma 'di zung zung zo zo zo shig zo shig gdug pa'i bdud thams cad/ gsod gsod/ chings chings/

ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ par+Na sha ba rI ba liH// 3 //oM ma hA kA lA ya shA sa no pa kA ri Na\u0f85 pa sh+tsI ma kA lo mi daM rat+na tra yA ba kA ri NaM ya di pra ti dz+nyaM sma ra si ta dA i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ sarba du Sh+Ta sa twA nA/

snun snun/ sregs sregs/ tshos tshos/ gsad par gyis gsad par gyis/ ri khrod lo ma can gyi gtor ma'o// //nag po chen po bstan pa la phan 'dogs pa phyi ma ma yin pa'i dus 'di dang 'dir dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa gal te byung / de'i tshe dam bca' dran par gyis gtor ma 'di zung zung / gdug pa'i sems can thams cad

mA ra mA ra/ /gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na/ /ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ /ha na ha na/ /da ha da ha/ /pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ke na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ma hA kA la ba liH// 4//oM AH hUM hoHu Sh+NI Sha sum+b+ha rA dza ya mAn+ta ka/ /pra dz+nyA n+ta ka/ /pad+mA n+ta ka/ big+h+nA n+ta ka a tsa la/ Ta k+ki rA dza/ nI la daN+Da/ ma hA

sod sod/ thung thung / chings chings/ snun snun/ sregs sregs/ tshos tshos/ nyi ma gcig gis nag po chen po'i gtor ma'o// //gtsug tor gnod mdzes rgyal po/ gshin rje mthar byed/ pad+ma mthar byed/ bgegs mthar byed/ /mi g.yo ba/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po/ dbyug sngon/ stobs po che

ba le b+h+yaH/ sa pa ri bA re b+h+yaH/ i daM ba liMH/ gan+d+haM/ puSh+paM/ d+hU paM/ dI pany+tsA k+Sha taM da dA ma he/ te tsA ga t+ya sa pa ri wA rAHshI g+h+ra mi daM ba liM gr-ih+Na n+tu khA da n+tu/ dzaHhUM baM hoHs-in+t+ra p+tA ma ma sarba satwA nA ny+tsa shAn+tiM pu Sh+TiM rak+ShA ba ra Na gu p+tiM kurban+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/

rnams/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'di gtor ma/ dri me tog bdug pa/ mar me ma nyams pa sbyin gyis de rnams kyang byon nas 'khor bcas myur bar gtor ma 'di gzung du gsol bzhes shig 'thung shig/ yang dag par tshim ste/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang spa ba mdzod/ /rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin du/ /

da sha kro d+ha ba liH// 5//oM AHhUM hoHi hA ba s+thi te b+h+yaHk+She tra pA le b+h+yo n+ya b+h+ya sh+tsa i daM gan+d+haM/ pu Sh+paM/ d+hU paM/ dI paM/ ma k+Sha taM da dA ma he/ te tsA ga t+ya sa pa ri wA rAHshI g+h+ra mi daM ba liM gr-ih+Na khA dan+tu pi ban+tu dzaHhUM baM hoH/ san+t+r-i p+tA ma ma sarba satwA nA ny+tsa shAn+tiM pu Sh+TiM rak+ShA ba ra Na gu btiM ku rba n+tu hUM hUM

khro bo bcu'i gtor ma'o// //'dir gnas pa'i zhing skyong rnams dang gzhan rnams la yang 'di dri dang me tog bdug pa mar me dang ma nyams pa sbyin gyi de rnams kyang byon nas 'khor dang bcas pa rnams myur bar gtor ma 'di zung gsol 'thung kun du tshim ste bdag dang sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa

phaT phaT/ badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ k+She tra pA la ba liH/ / 6//oM na maHsu rU pA ya ta thA ga tA yA r+ha te sa mya k+saM bu d+d+hA ya/ tapya thA/ oM su ru su ru/ pra su ru pra su ru/ ta ra ta ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/ sma ra

dang sba ba mdzod/ rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin du/ /zhing skyong gi gtor ma'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ gzugs mdzes gzugs mdzes/ gzugs rab tu mdzes gzugs rab tu mdzes/ 'od 'od/ gso ba gso ba/ yang dag par 'dzin pa yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dran pa

sma ra/ san+ta r+pa ya san+tarba ya/ sarba pre tA nAM swA hA/ a pa sa ra ran+t+wa ba tA ra pre k+Shi No da dA mya haM sarba lo ka d+hA tu ni bA si nAM pre tA nA mA hA ra mi ti/ pre ta ba liH// 7//oM da sha dig+b+ya bas+thi te b+h+yaHi hA bas+thi te byaHsu ra ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tso n+mA dA pa sma ra

dran pa/ kun du tshim par gyis kun du tshim par gyis/ yid dgas thams cad song zhig /glags lta ba rnams/ sbyin gyis ngas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i yi dgas rnams la bza' ba/ yi dgas kyi gtor ma'o// //phyogs bcur rnam par gnas pa rnams dang 'dir gnas pa'i lha dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang

o stA ra kA di b+h+yo/ ba liM dA pa ya mi/ i daM/ pu Sh+paM/ d+hU paM/ dI paM/ gan+d+haM/ nai be d+yA di saM yuk+taM gr-i hi twA/ su kha so ma na s+ya lA b+hi nu b+ha ban+tu s+thA na ny+tsa ni ru pa dra paM ku rban+tu sarba bud+d+hA d+hi Sh+ThA ne ne ti/ oM AHhUM i da ma mr-i ta pi N+DaM b+hu k+t+wA ma ma

'byung po dang yi dgas dang sha za dang smyo byed dang brjod byed dang gnon po la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma sbyin gyis/ me tog bdug pa mar me dri dang zhal zas la sogs ldan pa 'di bzung nas/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur te/ gnas su nye bar 'tshe ba med par mdzod/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bdud rtsi'i gong bu 'di zos nas/

sarba sa twA nA ny+tsa shAn+tiM kurban+tu swa sti swA hA/ sa mA dzi kA nAM sArba b+hau ti ba liH// 8//ai n+d+yA n+tu badzri sa ha b+hU ta saM g+hai ri many+tsa gr-ih+Nan+tu ba liM be shi Sh+TaM/ ag+ni r+ya mo nai r-i ti b+hU pa ti sh+tsa a pAM pa tirbA yu d+ha nA d+hi pa sh+tsa/ I shA nA b+hU tA d+hi pa ti sh+tsa

bdag dang sems can thams cad la zhi ba dang bde legs su mdzod cig /'dus pa ba rnams kyi 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'o// //shar phyogs rdo rje can gyi lho tshogs 'khor dang bcas/ /gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ /me dang gshin rje bden bral 'byung po'i bdag /chu bdag rlung dang nor gyi bdag po dang / /dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po

de bA U r+d+ha ny+tsa tsan+d+rA rka pi tA ma ha sh+tsa/ de bAHsa mA stA b+hu bi ye tsa nA gA d+ha rA d+ha rA gu h+ya ga naiHsa me tAH/ pra ti pat+ti ka ni be da ny+tsa swa ka swa ka swe ba di shA su b+hU tAH/ gr-ih+Nan+tu tu Sh+TAHsa ba laHsa se n+yA sa pu tra mi tra swa dza naiHsa me tAH/ pu Sh+paM ba liM d+hU pa ni be da na ny+tsa

dang / /steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang / /lha rnams kun dang gang dag sa steng klu/ /ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs bcas la/ /sa sa so sor phul ba 'di dag kun/ /rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur pa yis/ /rang rang phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas kyang / /rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun bcas/ /gtor ma me tog bdug pa 'bul lags na/ /

b+hu ny+dza n+tu dzi gran+tu pu ban+tu tse da mi daM tsa ka rma sa pha laM yu Sha n+tu/ di k+pA la ba liH// 9//oM pheM pheM pheM pheM hri hUM dzaH ba liM rak+ta puSh+pa kA ma rA dza sarba sid+d+hi pra yats+tsha ma ma bi ru d+d+hi tsit+ta kA na b+ha smi ku ru sa p+ta pA ta la ga ha sha trUn pA da ta laM ku ru sarba dza no pa

'di dag gsol zhing bzhes te bsnams nas kyang / /bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ /phyogs skyong gi gtor ma'o// //gtor ma dmar po/ me tog 'dod pa'i rgyal po dngos grub thams cad stsol/ bdag la 'gal bar sems pa rnams thal bar gyis/ sa 'og rin pa bdun du dgra rnams rkang pa'i mthil du gyis/ skye bo thams cad la

shAn+tiM ku ru phaT swA hA/ kA ma rA dza pa liM// 10//oM hrIHe h+ye hi e ka dza TI/ ma mo pa n+yu tA na shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ ma hA ya k+ShA d+hi pa ta ye/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya/ pa ra bi d+yAM A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ tru Ta tru Ta/ mru Ta mru Ta/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ u gra tA rA ba liH// 11//oM AHhrIM hrIM

nye bar zhi ba mdzod cig/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gtor ma'o// //tshur byon ral gcig ma/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la zhi bar mdzod/ rgyas par mdzod/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po/ 'di gtor ma zung zung / 'dzin du chug 'dzin du chug/ /gzhan gyi rig pa khug khug/ /chod chod/ /choms choms/ sgrol ma drag mo'i gtor ma'o// //rigs su byed ma sems can

ku ru ku l+le sarba sa twAM ba shaM ka ri/ sarba b+ha ya b+ha yaM ka ri/ i daM ba liM gan+d+haM puSh+paM d+hU paM dI pany+tsA k+Sha taM da dA ma he sarba/ de ba nA ga ya k+Sha gan+d+ha rbA su ra ga ru Da kin+na ra ma ho ra gA da yo/ ya thai Sh+TaM b+hu ny+dza tha/ khA da tha pi ba tha dziM g+h+ra tha ma ma ma naHsid+d+hiM pra ya ts+tsha tha oM AHhUM hrI hUM phaT swA hA/ ku ru ku l+la

thams cad dbang du byed ma/ 'jigs pa thams cad 'jigs par byed ma/ gtor ma dri dang me tog bdug pa mar me dang ma nyams pa 'di 'bul gyi/ lha klu gnod sbyin dri za lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs thams cad/ ci 'dod zo shig /'cho shig /'thungs dri snom/ bdag gi yid la dngos grub stsol cig /rigs su byed pa'i gtor

ba liH// 12//oM na mo b+ha ga wa te shrI tsa N+Da ma hA ro Sha NA ya/ de bA su ra na ra trA sa nA ya/ sa ka la mA ra ba la bi nA sa nA ya a ta sI ku su ma wa pu She/ a k+Sho b+ha kr-i ta she Sha rA ya/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ma ma sarba big+h+nA na tsa tu rmA rA n+ni bA ra ya ni bA ra ya/ trA sa ya

ma'o// //bcom ldan 'das dpal gtum po 'jigs rung chen po/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang mi rnams skrag par mdzad pa/ bdud dpung mtha' dag gi stobs rnam par 'joms gzar ma'i me tog lta bu'i sku can/ /mi bskyod pas cod pan mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtor ma 'di zung zung / bdag gi bgegs thams cad bdud bzhi po rnams bzlog par gyis bzlog par gyis/ skrag par gyis

trA sa ya/ b+h+rA ma b+h+rA ma/ ts+tshi n+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ nA sha nA sha/ tA pa tA pa/ sho Sha sho Sha/ ts+tshe da ts+tshe da/ b+he da b+he da/ du Sh+Ta sa twA na ma ma bi ru d+d+ha tsi t+ta kA na b+ha smi ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ba liH// 13//oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+d+rA ya/ ma hA d+ha nA ya ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye i daM ba liM pany+tsA mr-i taM

skrag par gyis/ skor skor/ chod chod/ phug phug/ bshig bshig/ sregs sregs/ skoms skoms/ chod chod/ phye phye/ gdug pa'i sems can bdag la 'gal bar sems pa rnams thal bar mdzod/ gtum po 'jigs rung chen po'i gtor ma'o// //rmugs 'dzin chu'i dbang po/ nor chen po/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la/ bdud rtsi

gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na kha kha khA hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ dzaHdzaHhUM hUM phaT swA hA/ dza m+b+ha la ba liH// 14// oM rak+ta mu kuTA ya/ /rak+ta dza tA ya/ /rak+ta mu khA ya/ /rak+ta sha rI rA ya/ /rak+ta b+hu dzA ya/ /rak+ta hA ra ba li mA lA ya/ rak+ta ra tha sa mA rU d+hA ya/ rak+tA na nA ya/ /rak+ta b+ha ra Na b+hU Shi tA ya/ /i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ma ma sarba big+h+nA na/

lnga'i gtor ma 'di/ dam tshig rjes su dran par gyis/ rmugs 'dzin gyi gtor ma'o// //cod pan dmar po/ ral pa dmar po/ sku lus dmar po/ phyag dmar po/ do shal phreng ba dmar por ldan pa/ shing rta dmar po la yang dag par bzhugs pa gdong dmar/ rgyan cha dmar pos brgyan pa la/ gtor ma 'di zung zung / bdag gi bgegs thams cad

ha ra ha ra/ tsa turmA ran/ ni bA ra ya ni bA ra ya/ trA sa trA sa/ b+h+rA ma b+h+rA ma/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ts+tshe da ts+tshe da/ b+he da b+he da hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ pash+tsA ta pra t+yaM she na tsA ra ye tra// //oM in+d+rA ya na maHhrIH/ ya mA ya na maHSh+T+rIH/ ba ru NA ya na maHbi/ ku be rA ya na maHkr-i/

phrogs phrogs/ bdud bzhi rnams bzlog par gyis bzlog par gyis/ skrag par gyis skrag par gyis/ skor skor/ chod chod/ phug phug/ nyams par gyis nyams par gyis/ skoms shig skoms shig/ chod chod/ phye phye/ de nas cha shas so sos brjod par bya ste/ dbang po la 'dud/ gshin rje la 'dud/ chu lha la 'dud/ lus ngan la 'dud/

ag+na ye na maHta/ I shwa rA ya na maHA/ /nai r+r-i ta ye na maHna/ bA ya be na maHna/ /tsan+d+rA ya na maHhUM/ /a rkA ya na maHhUM/ /brah+ma Ne na maHphaT/ ba su d+hA rA yai na maH phaT/ be ma tsi tri Ne na maHswA/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo na maH hA/ ha hA hi hI/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rak+ta ya mA ri ba liH// 15//oM tA ri Ni sarba duH kha

me lha la 'dud/ dbang phyug la 'dud/ bden bral la 'dud/ rlung lha la 'dud/ zla ba la 'dud/ nyi ma la 'dud/ tshangs pa la 'dud/ nor rgyun ma la 'dud/ thags bzangs ris la 'dud/ 'byung po rnams la 'dud/ gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i gtor ma'o/ /sgrol ma sdug bsngal dang

b+ha ya hA ri Ni/ /tsa ru rmA ra ni bA ri Ni sarba de bA su ra na ra/ gan+d+ha rba kin+nar ma ho ra gA d+yu pa pra pa pra mard ni b+hU ta/ pra ta/ yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa/ DA ka DA ki n+yA di b+ha ya bi d+h+wa n+sa ni pa ra kr-i ta yan+t+ra ma n+t+ra

'jigs pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ bdud bzhi bzlog par mdzad ma/ lha dang lha ma yin dang mi dang dri za dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i nyer 'tshe rab tu 'joms ma/ 'byung po dang yi dgas dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa rnams 'joms ma/ gzhan gyis byas pa'i 'khrul

tan+t+ra pra yo ga bi nA shi ni/ b+ha ga wa ti du rgo t+tA ri Ni/ A ga ts+tsha A ga ts+tsha/ i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ma ma sarba sha trU na/ ha na ha na/ khA hi khA hi/ /sarba ban+d+ha na byA d+hi gra hA na/ da ha da ha/ ts+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya/ b+he da ya b+he da ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ sbo Ta ya bo Ta ya/ /sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha shAn+tiM pu Sh+TiM

'khor dang sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba rnam par 'jig ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma ngan 'gro las sgrol ma/ tshur byon tshur byon/ gtor ma 'di zung zung bdag gi dgra rnams/ 'ching ba dang nad dang gdon thams cad choms choms khos khos/ dngos grub thams cad bdag la rab tu stsol/
